1.content:
Now offering gift points for lengthy and quality submissions. Message me if you are interested.

Please be sure you have read the rules, which are below again. Chapters that do not meet them will be edited or deleted. It is your responsibility to know the rules if you do not want this to happen to your chapters.

Keep the ages of the characters between 10 and 19 as they are supposed to be young mothers.
No mpreg. Sorry folks.
No sex for characters under the age of 18.
Let's not kill people please.
Unless it is a choice chapter please give t least a few sentences.
Proper grammar and punctuation, or at least an attempt at it, is required. I reserve the right to delete or edit chapters to make them more easily readable.
Rapid pregnancy is allowed but let's keep things sensible. (No getting pregnant with hundred of babies at nine months in five seconds...)
Let's also keep the baby number in general sensible. Dozens of 20 pound children or whatever? No please. Not naturally anyway.
Other things may be in the womb like eggs and such but it must be in relation to pregnancy and not in the stomach.
Please no describing an under 18's breasts in a sexual way. If you want to say that they have grown them or are producing milk now that's fine but please no lengthy or detailed descriptions.
Unbirth is allowed but only over 18.
Birth is allowed but please do not be detailed about child emergence under 18.
You may reserve one of the routes on a chapter that you have added by adding a (R) to the end of the choice (I will remove this when you have added the chapter.). The reservation is valid for one month. It will be removed if not added to by that time.

Now that that is all out of the way, how old will your young mother be?
1.title: The Beginning

11.content:
Maria - 10 - Maria goes to a private school and lives in the dorms there. The new structure of the sex education curriculum states that at least one girl in each class will be impregnated and used as an observation subject for the rest of their class. Will Maria be the lucky girl?

Ruth - 10 - Ruth is a young witch who is working with a dragon egg and trying to keep it warm. She might just figure out that teleporting it into her womb is the perfect way to keep it heated.

Rose - 11 - Rose is a young girl that still believes in wishing on stars. She decides to wish on a star one night for a puppy and this is the one night that her wish is granted by an unknown force. Unfortunately, her wish is granted in an unexpected way. She'll be getting her puppy by giving birth to a litter.

111.content:
Maria walked down the halls of her school towards her classroom. Today was the day where they would start their health unit on sex education and pregnancy. The new way that it was being taught nationwide was for each class to have one or more girls from the class impregnated for the rest of the class to observe over the course of the process. The child would then be given to an adoptive family. Maria's parents had finally sent in her permission form so that she could be eligible to be the pregnant student in her class.
Maria straightened the skirt of her uniform as she stepped into the classroom and made her way to her desk. Her teacher, Mrs. Smith was just calling for everyone's attention. "Alright ladies. I have the injections that will create our observation subjects," she said happily as she held up a small white box. "Now, would any of you like to volunteer for the job?"
111.title: Maria

choices: Maria isn't so sure but Sophia is willing.
1111.content: Maria shot her hand up in the air right away. "Okay, Maria will be one of our mothers. Anyone else?" One other girl timidly raised her hand. "Alright. Thank you Sophia. Both of you come with me." Mrs. Smith led the pair to another room and had them both lay down on a pair of couches there and unbutton the bottom half of their shirts. "We have three injectors here to use so if one of you girls is willing to have two injections then we can compare how it is to have twins to one baby."
1111.title: Raise hand. (Willing and excited)

11111.content:
"I would like to have two of them!" Maria volunteered quickly with a bright smile. Mrs. Smith nodded and smiled before wiping her belly with some disinfectant. She placed a small device over her lower abdomen and it gave her a sharp stinging stab before the entire process was repeated again. Mrs. Smith then did the same to Sophia.
"Alright. You girls just lay and relax here until I come and get you. Your babies have to get fully implanted."
11111.title: I want twins!

choices: Get moved into the pregnancy dorm
Call her parents with the news
111111.content:
Maria stayed as she was, just waiting as the implantation worked, child taking root in her womb. She laid a hand on her stomach as she waited before looking to the door as it opened again a few minutes later. "Okay girls. Your implantations should be all finished now. You get the rest of today off for having them in you." Mrs. Smith said cheerily as she helped them both to sit up. "The babies in you are actually in their second week now since they were put together in a test tube before being put in your bodies. I want you to go and get a whole lot of rest for the rest of the day. Some older students are going help you move into the pregnancy dorm today."

"Yes Ma'am." Maria said, giving Mrs. Smith and Sophia a bright smile before leaving the room and making her way back to the dorms. She wasn't the only one out of class though. Girls from other classes were also headed to the dorms. Most were used to this as those who got pregnant tended to keep doing it so they were already settled in the pregnancy dorm.
111111.title: Wait quietly

choices: School finishes and you head back to the dorms
111112.content:
Your stomach start to churn as the injection started to seep in but you were too excited about being a mother that you tolerated your lower half going through the transition. You looked at the small pin-pricks of the two and giggled with joy.

"I guess you were excited Maria?" You hear Sophia ask quietly in her timid voice. You turn to her and look at the unbuttoned shirt and her belly. It was smooth and pale with a small trickle of blood came from the little tick bit of a hole but nothing more, it soon stops.

"Yeah I'm excited. I get to be a mummy with two babies in my tummy... Are you exited to be a mummy?" You look at her as she holds her hands tightly and pushes them onto her lap. "You are going to have a baby growing in your tummy." You enthusiastically pat your belly but slightly regret that as you almost puke as the injections move their way around her womb.

"I'm...I'm doing this for a friend...she...wanted to see baby in person." She shifts about the as you asked her the question. "I'm slightly excited. Is it OK if we stick together? I think...it would be easier to make another friend with a person who is going through the same." You reel back slightly as you belly feel warm with her touch but you accept that and as a sign of a sisterly bond you put your hand on on her belly.

"Friend." You smile to her as Mrs. Smith walks in.

"OK let take a...why are you Touching each other's bellies?" She points at the gesture you two were doing as you quickly pull your hand back. "Don't worry Maria. This wont change anything her tummy...she'll be fine." Mrs. Smith smiles as she hold her clip board tight to her chest, squeezing her large breasts between in the process. She walks over to you and lifts your shirt to see your belly. "The bleeding has stopped. Good." She grabs some bandages and plasters them to your belly. "Do you feel OK?" she looks at you while plastering Sophia's belly.

"My tummy feels a bit funny." You rub your abdomen.

"That's fine honey. That means your babies are on the way." She pats your belly as you stand up with Sophia and start to walk to the door "Just to let you know. You will be examined tomorrow. I hope you are not afraid of being in front of the class." She looks at her clipboard as you both turn to her.

"O...OK. Thank you Mrs. Smith." Sophia still shaken.

"Now. I have written you both an excuses to skip P.E and are allowed to go to the toilet when ever you want. But do keep in some sort of shape, we can't monitor the progression of your babies and bellies if it is just fat." She hands you a slip which read

:THIS STUDENT IS ALLOWED TO GO TO THE TOILET AND MUST SKIP P.E DUE TO THEM BEING THE PREGNANT OBSERVATION STUDENT OF THE SEX EDUCATION EXPERIMENT.

"There. Now back to class you two." She points to the door as you two walk out. "Hum... Sophia has a sister...maybe I can get her to participate." She looks at Sophia's profile and whispered quietly.
111112.title: Chit-chat with a pregnant Friend

choices: Snacks (most like eat the whole cafe)
Follow Mrs. Smith for a bit
1111121.content:
Sophia walks through the sliding doors before you. You look behind you expected Mrs. Smith to be following right behind you but were left wondering why she was just entering the hallway. "Mrs..."

"Do not worry Maria. Just get back to class, we can discuss anything about your belly in class or back at the dorm." She looked at you and smiles.

"But i..." she cut you off as she entered the class room, you followed suit and went toward your seat next to some of you friend and settled in.

"OK everyone thank you for waiting." Mrs. Smith speaks as she stand behind her desk. "We have now got out two observation subject ready." She points towards Sophia who was sitting at the middle column near the back. She then point to you. Your stomach churns once more but this time it was from slight embarrassment rather than the injection, nether the less you scratch your bandages "Don't do that Missy." she wags her fingers as she points to you. "That might hurt the babies."

"um..." You finishes scratching your belly and looked straight at Mrs. Smiths. "Sorry Mrs"

"We want to see you though your pregnancy, not watch you terminate it." She says as she holds her head in her hands. "OK so sex education will start tomorrow when both subject's pregnancy is confirmed we can look at them tomorrow. I hope you will not embarrass Maria and Sophia." You see Sophia sink away into her seat. " I will discuss the clothing attire with the girls and you shall see this tomorrow." She smile slightly. "Now we shall start our math lesson." She says as the whole class sighs as she start to chalked up the simple maths equations.

As the math lesson continued your bellies start to churn again. You look to Sophia as you hold your belly. You see that she is also got her hand on her stomach, she must be felling the churning too... The injection must had taken fully affect as you could feel really small but distinct movement from your womb. You shoot your hand up with Sophia also doing hers.

"Ah ladies. Do you have the answer?" Mrs. Smith look at you as she hold a book open in one hand with chalk in the other.

"No... I've got to" You feel some puke advance up your esophagus as you hold your hand over your mouth.

"Oh... You two are excused." You two bash out of the classroom drawing attention from the rest of the girls in the class. You run to a stall which wasn't helping your sick as you vomit your inside into the bowl. You held your head over the toilet as you hear Sophia being sick in the next stall.

half an hour of puking later you return to the class without Sophia. Mrs. Smith notice you walking and bough you to the side to talk. "Are you ok... it must be some form of morning sickness."

"morning sickness?" You mother never mention it to you and why should she... you were 10 and you would learn it at school.

"We can discuss it with class tomorrow. That will be a good talking point." she pondered then she looked at your belly. she put her hand under your shirt and felt it. The feeling of warmth floated around her hand as it touched your belly. "The injection materialized the babies quickly but now it will be the long 9 mouths for your pregnancy."

"ummm." You had learn some of this so not all of it was a shock...but the materializing this was strange."

"Were is Sophia."

"Here Mrs." Sophia emerge into the class with some sick still on her lip.

"Let me get that." Mrs. Smith got a handkerchief and wiped it off. "OK I can go over this equation for you." The class progressed
1111121.title: Heading to maths with a belly full of joy

11111211.content:
The day was long. and it didn't help as you stomach kept churning with the injection taking it toll. Lunch was fun, You got a special lunch which was specific to the pregnant student (mainly bigger portions). While around the lunch hall you see other girls with there belly showing with plasters on then. There was alot of talking but you couldn't hear them.

The student day draw to a close as you get into the playground to exit the school ground and head to your dorm. The dorms are simple, You have two different dorms for genders and many different for the years so 16 dorms in total. There might be a pregnant dorm but it was not on the dorm roster.

You wait on the playground for Sophia and hear other student talking.

"Really...they pick me to be a pregnant student again...that 4 years in a row." A 14 year old girl talked to her friend. She rub her belly.

"Ah cool. Now i get to show Shaun these puppies and his future children." Said a 18 year old student who was also taking part in the pregnancy program. She grabbed her already swollen Breast and squished them.

Sophia ran up to you slightly out of breath. "Sorry to keep you waiting Maria." She looks at you as you look around and listen. "Did you hear. All classes from all year are taking part in the pregnancy program. They actually give more baby juice to the staff for older classes and in year 12....when you are 18...You have to be.....naked!" She blurted that part out as she shuddered slightly.

"Really?" You say to her as you start to walk with her as she discusses the future pregnant project.

You enter the dorm and see the caretaker that was there to take care (it in the name) of the student living there. Her name was Crystal. She was 20 years old, previous student and helper of the school. "Ah look it out new mothers." She said as she looks at you and Sophia. "How many have you got in there?" She looks at you belly and rubs your belly. You don't reject....you actually accept it with warm jolt going trough her as she touch your belly.

"I.....i......twins." You say as she rubs.

"Twins? Wow! You must be proud." You nod your head rhythmically with her rubs. "How about you Sophia?" She turned to Sophia as she lift her shirt up to allow her to rub it as well.

"Just....one...." Sophia said.

"Ah thats soooooo cute." She was so uplifting as she greeted you and pokes Sophia's belly. You smiled as you walked up the stairs and into your room. There you see a letter addressed to you.

To Maria

I am writing to you to tell you that your father and I will be visiting your dorm tomorrow after school. I hope you were picked for the pregnancy monitoring. I know how much this would mean to you and I know that you really wanted to be pregnant and feel the pleasure of having a baby inside you. We might have news of our very own depending if it is correct. Hope to see you soon.

Lot of love mum

You finished reading as Sophia walked in. "My mum is coming tomorrow! I get to show her that i am going to be a mummy!!" You are overjoyed as you and Sophia bounce about.

"And my sister is also coming around and looking at my belly." Both of you were excited. both of you bellies touch,babies close together.

Crystal Knocks on the Door. "Girls? Time to get some sleep."

"Ok" you both say as you say goodbye to Sophia and tuck in for the night.
11111211.title: Homeward bound

1112.content:
Maria made sure to keep her hand down as she squirmed in her seat. This project was done for every class every year and she knew that most of the time girls who did it one time ended up doing it for the rest of the time they were in school because there wouldn't be someone else who would take over the responsibility. She didn't fancy spending the next several years of her life having babies. Even if her parents had put the permission form in that didn't mean that she had to be the one that got pregnant.
"No one's volunteering? Normally we have at least one or two girls that would like to give it a try..." Mrs. Smith said with a sigh before she grabbed a small bowl and set it on a desk in front of her. "I suppose I'll just have to pick a name then. Any volunteers now? No? Okay." She swirled her fingers through the slips of paper in the bowl before pulling out one of them. "Maria!" She said happily as the little girl's jaw dropped. "Come on now darling. Time to get that baby put into your belly." She gave Maria a slip to go to the nurses office and the young girl resignedly took it and went along. There was no getting out of things now.
1112.title: Have name picked (Reluctant)

choices: A short time later - during the end of class
11121.content:
Upon entering the nurse's office, the woman in all white turned around and gave Maria a big smile while putting on a pair of latex gloves. "Oh, hello there, Maria! Come, take a seat!" she chirped, turning around fully. With a nod, the young girl shyly walked up to the examination table and laid down slowly and unsure of what was to come.

The nurse lifted Maria's shirt up to her breast and prepped the bottom-rightmost quarter of her currently flat stomach with a swab of iodine and a band aid at the ready. "Now just relax, this won't hurt a bit." the nurse said calmly as she got the jab ready, squirting a small amount out to get the plunger to the max line. Then, taking a hold of the schoolgirl's hip with her free hand, the nurse inserted the needle right in the center of the iodized circle, pressing down on the plunger quickly and taking the needle out just as such. To Maria, the initial jab stung slightly and enough to make her wince, but not enough to form a tear in her eye. The nurse then quickly washed off the excess iodine and placed the circular band aid over the entry wound. "There. Now run along, Maria. I'll be sure to keep you and your child happy and healthy for the weeks to come."

Nodding, Maria rushed back to class.
11121.title: To the nurse's office

11122.content:
"Maria would you come forward please? It's time for us to go over development with you as visual aid now that you're starting to show." Maria sighed a little and nodded, carefully getting up from her seat and making her way to the front of the class. Her uniform had fit her well before but now it was getting tight across her belly and her skirt was a bit too tight to button. She had to hold it shut with a safety pin most of the time.

Maria unbuttoned her blazer and draped it over the table before unbuttoning the bottom half of the buttons on her shirt underneath and holding it open so that people could see her now clearly there bump.

"Maria is twelve weeks pregnant now everyone. That means that the baby inside her is about the size of a lime right now." Mrs. Smith said happily as she had Maria step up on a small platform and turn sideways. "And because of that her womb is starting to push her belly out because there's only so much space on the inside. Maria's belly is started to push out now at about the right point for three months into a pregnancy with just one like we gave her. But from now on it's going to grow faster than it was before so keep an eye on things." She said cheerily before looking to Maria. "Tell us a little bit about how your breasts are doing." The teacher said nodding to where the development of breasts were becoming obvious on Maria's chest. The girl blushed.

"Um...I have to wear bras now and they're a bit sore. My nipples got darker too." She mumbled making the teacher nod and look to the class.

"Maria is developing right on time. Everyone write down your observations in your notebooks." Maria fidgeted a little and looked down to her rounding belly. It was a bit bigger on her due to not being the size of an adult but she had to admit she was kind of liking the feeling of having a baby grow inside her belly.
11122.title: 12 weeks

111221.content:
Lunchtime. Maria's favorite time of the school day.

She eagerly got a tray from the canteen entrance, waiting behind the long line of students who had just as eagerly rushed in post-class. Things were going as normal as student after fellow student got their lunches and found a spot to sit at one of the multiple tables behind them.

It was when it was her turn to get food that the lunch ladies gave her almost double the portions of the foods she wanted: a two-layered burger Big Mac style, extra fries, extra chicken strips and an extra yogurt. "You're eating for two, so the extras are on the house." she winked. Maria smiled and went to find a free seat.

Barely a few seconds into her lunch, a group of girls crowded around her and started indistinctly asking questions,
"How does it feel?"
"Are you really pregnant?"
"Is it kicking?"
"Can I feel?"

Maria was starting to blush heavily, feeling embarrassed and nervous about the attention she was getting. Sure it was a little heartwarming from getting so much attention, but she was in a position where she just wanted to eat in peace...which seemed less and less likely by the second. "Ok, back it up, girls!" a male teacher said, breaking the ever increasing group up to give the pregnant girl some space. "Are you ok?" he asked, crouching down to her level.

"Y-Yeah...just...y'know..." she meekly replied, shrugging. The teacher nodded and patted her shoulder before leaving.
111221.title: Go to lunch

111222.content:
Before the end of the day, Maria got called into the principal's office.

"Maria! Come in!" the male principal called out as the student meekly opened the door. Inside the relatively small, brown room was both the head of the school and a blonde woman in full suit, tie & heels. "I've noticed your uniform is getting a little snug on you, so I had the local tailor come in to measure you up." he explained.

Maria's heart started fluttering at the observation. Even now, her white shirt was hanging on by the thread of her buttons, the pin not doing much to hold it in any more. "O-Ok!" the student stammered. The tailor helped her over to a small plastic hop-up so the former could have an easier time measuring Maria. "Would you mind taking your shirt and skirt off, dear? It's so I can get to your body better for measuring."

Pulling out a white tape measure, the tailor measured Maria's gut and waist first, then her arms, thighs, and finishing with her feet, noting the dimensions on a scrap of lined paper.

"Ok, there we go!" the older woman smiled, packing away her tape and notes. "We'll be in touch." she added to the principal, shaking his hand upon leaving.

"Get yourself decent and head on home, Maria. Don't worry about uniform tomorrow, come in whatever you're comfortable with."
111222.title: New uniform

choices: Hang out with friends after school
1112221.content:
Few days later, during class the Mrs. Smith handed Maria her new school uniform taking it as she sat down on her assigned desk.

"Before class begins today. Maria can you go change into your maternity uniform please." Mrs. Smith nodded to Maria as she stood up and left class to change into the school uniform. However it was not what she expected, her mother told her maternity clothing fit the body of an expecting mother. This was not going to fit her. Her belly now swollen enough for people to know she was carrying a child, breast plump and dark around her areola.

Wearing the revealing uniform that barely covered her 3 month belly. It embarrassed Maria but at least her skirt fit perfectly. Stepping back into class Maria felt shame running down her 10 years old face. All eyes were not on her face but her baby belly.
"Mrs. Smith... This is embarrassing me..." Hands covering her face as she was looking down to hide the humiliation that brought her.
"This is normal my dear mother. You have six more months, your baby belly looks healthy honey." Mrs. Smith held onto her shoulder and moved her hands away from Maria's face.

Mrs. Smith knelt down and whispered into Maria's ear. " Would you want today's observation to have everyone touch your belly?" Nodding yes as she felt more comfortable now.

"In today's observation everyone will be able to touch Ms. Maria's belly. But you will have to write down and describe how it feels and for the girls you will have to write a comparison to your midriff. Now stand in single file line in front of Ms. Maria ." Class was just starting and Maria had a full day ahead of her.
1112221.title: Revealing uniform

choices: Need to sit down. Too heavy
111223.content:
"Alright class. Observation journaling time." Mrs. Smirth chirped happily as Maria pushed back her chair from her desk and started trying to get up through the weight of the baby in her belly was making it hard. "I don't have any new information for you this week to write down but remember that Maria is thirty weeks pregnant today. That means that there are only ten more weeks to go. Birth day is in the last week of school after all."

Maria sighed once she was on her feet and waddled to the front of the classroom. The school hadn't ordered a maternity uniform this year so she was just wearing a skirt of the right size and then the bottom half of her shirt buttons were left open all the time to leave her belly hanging freely out in the open. She put a hand in the small of her aching back and stepped onto her little platform as she felt the baby kicking at her bladder...again.
111223.title: 30 weeks

1112231.content:
While standing on the platform, the baby continues to kick her bladder. Maria looks distressed as she stares at Mrs. Smith. “May I go to the bathroom?” knowing well that she needs to go toilet. “Yes you may, Mrs. Maria.” She books it to the door as her legs starts to leak. Making it in time to the potty as she unzips her skirt that is barely clinging on, lowering her panties as well. But her middle was getting big hence, she couldn't pull it all the way. Posturing herself to the toilet bowl. Now seated, she takes a leak as her leg is spread wide accommodating the heavy belly. Feeling relieved she waddles back to the classroom. Opening the door back to class, Maria pushes herself up to the platform posing with her hands on her behind.

“How was the trip to the washroom?” Mrs. Smith questioned.

“It was challenging, I almost didn't make in time.” Maria said quietly. To her right she sees Sophia, noticing her pregnant figure from the side. Her tummy is now gotten considerably sizable, she pats her abdomen in a circling motion. The class is just about ending the observation journal. The school bells rings.
1112231.title: Run to the bathroom

choices: Tummy starts hurting, go to nurses dormitory
1112232.content:
Maria feels the burdan of pregnancy. Everywhere is aching and the baby won't stop kicking making her feel uncomfortable. "Can I sit down, my tummy is heavy and the baby won't stop kicking me" asked Maria "sure go ahead" Mrs. Smith nodded "I know your tummy hurts and your bodies ache."

Maria sits down on the platform rubbing their gravid orb. The teacher never told the pregnant pre-teen or even the class that having stomach cramps were braxton hick contractions. Maria thought it was bad food she ate the night before. Journal observation over school bell rang on cue.
1112232.title: Need to sit down. Too heavy

1112233.content:
Mrs. Smith tells Maria and Sophia to come to the front of the classroom for another observation journal time. Maria moved her table as her gravid body is making it hard to move. Standing and walking becomes more of an exercise at this point. In the front of the class, Maria saw Sophia grasping her massive pregnant belly as she waddles her way to the platform. Maria has now entered the 40th week of pregnancy. She has now become gigantic, her breast has even doubled in cup size. As she waddle your way up to the platform. Mr. Smith steps behind Maria and Sophia kneeling down she places her hands around Maria's and Sophia's expecting belly. “Class this is what you will look like at 40 weeks.” Continuing “ They are ready to see their baby really soon.”

Mrs. Smith stands back up while the two are still standing on the platform. She heads to the whiteboard drawing a diagram of what the 40 week belly looks like. She starts talking “This here is the umbilical cord, that connects the baby to the mother's placenta.” Sophia is stroking the swollen under belly, while looking like she is in agonizing pain.

“My tummy hurtsssaaaauhh.!!!” as Sophia interrupts the class listening to Mrs. Smith lecture. Dropping onto her knees while one hand is on her gravid body and the other gripping the platform. Maria is in shock at how her friend is hurting so much. Yet she can't do anything but watch as more contractions hit her. Many of the girls in the class immediately stop writing in the observation journal, runs up to Sophia lifting her up as she moans loudly while a forceful contraction is her pushing her insides. Mrs. Smith dismissed half the class to go home, while the other observe the whole process of birth. Maria walking back to the dorm can hear Sophia screaming and moaning as you are worried about her.
1112233.title: Later in the pregnancy

11122332.content:
Last night Maria's swollen belly had started to compress. She has started her contractions ignoring the pain. She woke up still having the awful cramps under the belly as she feels the baby is every so slowly lowering into your pelvis. She waddled herself to classroom while dealing with the occasional tightening of the belly. She was startled that Sophia is still in her labor pains. Mrs. Smith tells Maria to relax your heavy round abdomen while observing Sophia's childbirth. Sophia starts whining as she is almost at the end of her birth. Maria starts to the most intense contraction, your moaning becomes intense. Half the class is now looking at Maria, while the other half is assisting Sophia as the midwives.

Both the powerful groan from Sophia and Maria every growing moan fills the room. You hear Sophia give birth “OH MY BABYYYyyyyy....” Sophia saying as she is thrilled to see the baby that has been inside her for 9 months. One of the girls noticed that Maria’s water broke as she eases from the compression of her belly. Sophia is distracted by feeding the new born child as Maria starts screeching in the middle of never ending contractions. The few seconds of the contractions she asked bthe girls watching her.

“help me----” moaning as a series of contractions is making her stomach hard as stone

“I need to find a better positi----” Crying in pain. Girls help her up from the seat which you rested upon. Once standing all the girls let go of Maria. As she felt another contraction coming on, she rested both hands on your table as a considerable amount of contractions tore through herbwomb. Many hours passed and Maria gave birth to a beautiful baby girl. When both Maria and Sophia is breast feeding the babies. Mr. Smith asked the both of them if they will participate again for the next grade.

“Yes, we want to do this again next year!” Sophia and Maria said in a thrilled manner

“Will you hand me the babies? The whole class wants to say hi to them and hold them.”

As the two babies were being handed by every girl in the class. They return to Maria and Sophia in which both of them hand the baby to Mrs. Smith. Knowing fully well that they will be put in loving and caring family.
11122332.title: Head to morning class

112.content:
Ruth was a young witch with shoulder length black hair green eyes and light skin she wore a black shirt with a grey skirt and nee high socks with blavk shoes.
she was a witch in training who wanted to be the best witch of all she was very cocky and enjoyed showing off and she would try magic that other witches considered risky unsafe or forbidden.
Ruth lived in a very normal town her family and most people in town were just normal humans with no magical powers.
her father mother and sister Jenny knew all about Ruth's dark magical powers and they were accepting of it.

Ruth's parents were proud of her even if there daughter did use some very strange and dangers magic.
for the most part Ruth kept her magic to herself unless she wanted to show off she had a large basement under the house where she performed her magic and today Ruth was busy taken care of a dragon egg she had found the egg a few weeks ago when she took it from a dragons nest.

she loved dragons and was very excited to be taken care of one Ruth was in the basement looking after the big dragon egg it had been 3 weeks since she was tasked with taken care of the egg Ruth patted the large egg "ummm seems healthy so far if I keep this up this dragon should be born perfectly healthy."
Ruth was looking forward to having her own dragon not many witches could say they owned a dragon but while Ruth was looking throw her spell book suddenly the egg started to shake Ruth was confused "what? what's happening!

Ruth examined the shaking egg and saw that there was a serious problem Ruth hadn't been giving it a enouth warmth as she thought she did "no.. NO this cant be happening!"
Ruth was scared for her baby dragon she couldn't let it die she had to find a way to make it warm quickly thinking Ruth thought about human mothers and human pregnancy's.
Ruth thought about it for a second and just decided to try it if it meant saving the baby dragon using her magic she telported the egg right into her small womb.

Ruth felt a heavy feeling inside her belly that quickly expanded her belly felt very got a hurt a lot she tried to bare throw it but quickly Ruth fell on her back and passed out from the sudden pain.
with the last thing she saw being her expanding belly hours later Ruth awoke from her slumber.
Ruth looked down and was shocked to see her belly looked,,,
112.title: Ruth

choices: The night she makes her wish and the litter is concieved.
113.content:
Rose is a young girl that still believes in wishing on stars. She decides to wish on a star one night for a puppy and this is the one night that her wish is granted by an unknown force. Unfortunately, her wish is granted in an unexpected way. She'll be getting her puppy by giving birth to a litter.

How far along in her pregnancy will we be joining Rose? A dog's pregnancy is 12 weeks long.
113.title: Rose

choices: Her screams wake up her mom.
Rose started to feel more changes (choose behaviour or physical)
1131.content:
After making her wish, Rose started to feel tired. Not even a minute after she makes the wish, she was falling asleep on her bed.

Rose's Dream
Rose was standing on a garden of beautiful sunflowers, she seemed like she was trying to catch something that was trying to run away from her.
"Hey! Wait up!" Rose tried to catch the attention of the creature that was following. The figure seemed to be more smaller than her, it wasn't more big than the sunflowers of the garden so it was herd for her to saw who was the figure. After struggling a few moments when she was a few feet of it. So she decided to jump to catch it and when she finally wrap it around her arms to see the creature she was following then...
End of the dream
"*groans* mmmh..." in the real world Rose started to move around uncomfortabily, while the single light of the moon that came from the window illuminating her.
"Ahhh!" A sudden pain started to awake her from the belly ache she started to feel.
She put her hands on her belly trying to feel where was the pain. She started to notice that her belly was having a little pump that was growing little by little. After a few 15 minutes of constant pain, the sudden ache disappeared but now the little Rose looked shocked with her now "bigger position".Her pajamas was now ripping appart on the lower part and a few buttons exploded for the sudden growing, revealing a big belly with stretch marks possibly for the growing of 15 minutes. Not to mention that her bellybutton looked like was ready to pop out of its place.
"Wha-what is happening to me?!" Rose screamed for the sudden transformation on her body clearly worried.
When suddenly...
1131.title: When your dreams come true.

1132.content:
"So, Rose," the doctor asked, "what seems to be the problem?"

"My stomach hurts," 11-year-old Rose replied, "and I get awful sick."

"She's been throwing up for weeks," Rose's mother added. "And now there's this swelling."

What Rose's mother had said was true. She had been throwing up for three weeks, and now her belly and chest seemed to be swelling. What she didn't say - what nobody but Rose knew - was that, four weeks ago, she had made a wish on a falling star: a wish that she might have a puppy of her very own. She had had to wish for one, since her mom absolutely refused to buy her one, questioning whether Rose was ready to care for a dog.

The doctor examined Rose, paying close attention to her swellings. "There's definitely something inside," she told Rose and her mother. "I'm going to order a sonogram. That should tell us what we're dealing with."

The doctor wheeled in the sonogram, and smeared cold gel over Rose's belly. Then she switched on the machine, and ran a special wand over where the gel was smeared, while the image appeared on the monitor. "Oh my," the doctor said.

"It can't be... " Rose's mother said. "Doctor, that... that looks like a... "

"Puppy," Rose said, finishing her mother's sentence. She had wished to have a puppy of her own, but she didn't mean she had intended to actually give birth to any.

"Is that even possible?" Mom asked.

"It has to be," replied the doctor, "because we're seeing it." She began moving the wand over Rose's whole belly. "Let's see how many she's expecting."
1132.title: 4 weeks pregnant

choices: Rose's mother refuses. They'll handle it at home themselves.
Rose's mother refuses. She'll just pay the veterinary costs.
Rose's mother agrees, so long as it's all hush hush and private.
11323.content:
The doctor was silent for several moments as he moved the wand around on Rose's stomach, getting a good look at the litter of puppies that filled her womb. "It's hard to tell since there's so many... I would have to say that there's at least seven. Possibly eight." He sighed, eyes still fixed on the screen.

Rose felt her cheeks heat up at the thought that that many puppies were inside her belly. The doctor licked his lips and pushed his free hand through his hair. "Listen, I don't know what's going on here but it's pretty evident that your daughter is pregnant with a litter of puppies. I've got a cousin who's a vet. Let me give her a call and have her come down to take a look at the situation. I can tell she's pregnant but not how long or how long it will be like this..." He said carefully as he shut off the machine.

"You can't tell me more?" Rose's mom asked worriedly, stroking her young daughter's hair as she sat on a chair beside her.

"Afraid not. This is obviously a unique situation, after all." He said slowly. All eyes in the room went to Rose's stomach. Now that the truth was revealed to them, it was quite clear that it wasn't swelling or gained weight, but instead closer to an eighteen week pregnancy bump.

~~~

"Oh wow..." The vet breathed as about a half hour later, the eleven year old was having her second sonogram. She leaned over to look at the screen, eyes wide. "That's really a litter of puppies. How many did you count?"

"Seven or eight. It's hard to tell."

"Big litter then. Most get six max." The vet mused. "I can't tell the breed and we likely won't be able to until they come, but this looks like they're about four weeks in development. Did you have any encounter with a dog about a month ago sweetie?"

"No." Rose said softly. She hadn't brought up her wish on the star, thinking the adults around her wouldn't accept it as the cause of her puppies. She had thought it was a little silly herself when she had done it, after all.

"Huh..." The vet frowned and looked back to the screen a moment. "Jaime, would you mind if I took on her as my patient? I get the feeling this is going to go more like a dog's pregnancy anyway. It would be better if we handled this at my office." The doctor nodded as he shut off the sonogram and got up.

"Of course. I'll leave you to it, then." He gave them all a nod and stepped out of the exam room. The vet smiled kindly and helped Rose clean off her belly and sit up. Rose pulled her shirt down, but it didn't fully cover her stomach, leaving some skin visible above where her pants were held shut with a safety pin.

"I don't think we've really be properly introduced, my cousin wanted to get my input so bad. I'm Dr. Juniper." She chirped happily, shaking Rose's mother's hand before sitting down opposite her. "Now, I know this is scary, but it's something we can deal with. Since a puppy is smaller than a newborn, I don't think it would be a danger for Rose to deliver them like a human child would. Assuming you're not going to have this terminated, of course."

"I would rather not have to explain this to someone else. It's embarrassing enough already." Rose's mother said bluntly as Rose rested a hand on her stomach. "I'll have to find some excuse to pull her from school until this is... over."

"I understand. We'll keep it as quiet as possible. I own my own vet clinic so you can bring Rose in to see me after hours so nobody else has to know." Dr. Juniper assured. "Assuming this keeps on track with a dog's pregnancy, she'll be due in eight more weeks. I'd like to see Rose weekly to make sure she's well and still on track. This is a big litter so we do have to be a little careful." Rose's mother nodded stiffly. "Good. Now, there is one thing to talk about before you bring Rose around for her first checkup with me. I'd like to document this case. It's so bizarre that I do want to study what's happening. Nothing invasive, but I'd like your permission to take photos, measurements, and do other small tests. I'll keep your privacy by referring to Rose as Subject R and keeping her face out of the photos. In return, I won't charge you a penny for my services." Rose looked at the vet in surprise, holding her belly with both hands. Her? A research subject?
11323.title: A Big Litter (7-8 puppies)

113233.content:
At Dr. Juniper's veterinary clinic, Rose and her mother entered through the back door, ensuring as few people would see them as possible. Dr. Juniper took pictures of Rose from multiple angles, focusing on her belly and breasts. These, along with Rose's height, weight, and other measurements, went into a file marked SUBJECT R.

"Well, Rose," Dr. Juniper said, "my cousin tells me that you're perfectly healthy, with the possible exception of your delicate condition. He also says that you're bright for your age."

Rose smiled at the compliment.

"I would like to return to the topic that has brought us together," the vet said. "Such a bright girl surely knows that human babies don't just appear in their mother's womb, and that puppies in a human womb is a completely unprecedented occurrence. So, Rose, I want you to think back to last month. I want you to tell me about anything out of the ordinary you did a month ago, no matter how insignificant it may seem to you."

Rose knew that this was it. She had kept her wish a secret, but, given what was happening, she couldn't keep it secret any longer. "I made a wish on a falling star."

Dr. Juniper blinked. "That's it?"

Rose nodded. "I wished I could have a puppy." She put her hands on her belly.

"And that's the only thing you did, that you don't normally do?"

"Doctor," Mom said, "do you really believe that my daughter is pregnant with puppies because... because of a wish?"

"Mrs. Newsome," the vet said, "if you had told me before yesterday that I would be examining an 11-year-old girl who was pregnant with a litter of puppies, I would never have believed you. But that is the case, nevertheless. With this wish being the only explanation currently available, I have to accept that it... it's no stranger than the current situation."

Dr. Juniper left the room, then came back with some pill bottles. "These are prenatal vitamins that we normally give to dogs. Give her these according to the directions on the bottles." She turned to Rose. "If I tell you to take them, your mother won't have to hide them in a slice of cheese, will she?" she asked with a smile.

Rose laughed.

"Alright. I'll expect you in a week. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to call."
113233.title: Rose's mother agrees, so long as it's a...

1132332.content:
"Look at you, sweetie." Dr. Juniper chirped happily as she looked over to see Rose coming in the back door of the office. "Where's your mom?"

"Grocery shopping. She doesn't want anyone seeing her car here or something."

"Really cares about appearances, huh?" Juniper muttered under her breath with a shake of her head before helping Rose up onto an exam table. "You're getting pretty big." She chuckled as she looked over the young girl. In just the seven days since she had last seen Rose, the girl's belly had swelled forth a few more inches, leaving her looking 25 weeks pregnant, despite only being 5 weeks along.

"Uh-huh. I felt the puppies move too." She said with wide eyes as she touched her round belly. There clearly hadn't been an opportunity to find maternity clothes for Rose yet as her stomach was bulging from under her t-shirt, the top only covering a third of her baby bump. The stretchy waistband of the sweatpants the girl wore were also stretched to their limit underneath the bump. Juniper gave a hum and laid one hand on each side of the bump as she examined it.

"Yep. You're gonna feel that a lot more coming up. You've got a whole lot of babies in this belly of yours." She said with a wide smile. "Bet this isn't what you were looking for when you wished for a puppy, huh?" Rose shook her head as she looked down at herself, feeling the light flutters of the puppies in her womb. "Well, hopefully your mom let's you keep one of them after you went through all this." Dr. Juniper said cheerily before stepping away to grab her camera and other supplies so they could take the information needed for the Subject R file.
1132332.title: Next Week

11323321.content:
"How'd it go at the clinic?" Rose's mother asked on the way home.

"It went well," Rose answered. "The puppies are right where they should be at five weeks."

"Any new instructions?"

"No." She paused. "Mom, are you ashamed of me?"

"What? Honey, where did you get that idea?"

"You don't want anybody to see me. And now, you don't want to be seen with me."

Mom took several deep breaths. Then, she said, "Rose, I don't know how everyone else would react to finding out that you're going to have a litter of puppies. But I know how they could react, and I want to protect you from that. So I keep you inside, and I don't let anybody get curious about my license plate. But you're my daughter, Rose. You're my little girl, even as you get bigger every day. I love you, Rose. I'm sorry I ever made you doubt that."

When they got home, Mom said, "I've got a surprise for you, Rose: I went to more than just the grocery store." She handed Rose two bags. "Take these up to your room and take a look."

Rose did as her mother said. Putting the bags on her bed, she reached into one and pulled something out.

It was a dress, one piece from neck to hem. It was bigger in front than in the back.

A maternity dress.

She tried it on, and it covered her perfectly. Looking in the mirror, she saw that it clung to her belly and breasts, showing how her body was getting ready for bringing these puppies into the world.

There were other clothing options as well: T-shirts and jeans, bib overalls, even sleepwear. I'll have to get mighty big to outgrow all of these, she thought.

But then, with as many puppies as she was having, and considering how big she'd already grown, that seemed pretty likely.
11323321.title: Back at home

choices: The other girls want puppies too
The other girls promise to keep visiting
113233211.content:
After being out of school for a whole week, it was inevitable that Rose's friends would want to visit. Her mother always turned them away, though, not wanting anyone else to find out the family secret. Rose was just... very sick. That was why Abby and May watched the house until Rose's mom had left for the afternoon before sneaking in to see their friend.

"Rose!" Abby said excitedly as she burst into the eleven year old's bedroom, only to see Rose standing in front of her mirror, maternity dress rucked up over the top of her pregnant belly. Rose blushed bright red, both hands on her exposed stomach for a moment before she pushed the dress down, though that did nothing to hide her fertile shape. "What..."

Rose invited her friends into her room before sitting down with them and carefully explaining everything that had happened. "And so... I'm going to be away from school for the next seven weeks until my puppies come." She finished, holding her puppy filled mound.
113233211.title: Rose's Friends Learn Her Secret

1132332113.content:
"Are... are you going to be okay?" Abby asked.

Rose nodded. "My doctor says I'm healthy. So does Dr. Juniper."

"I never heard of Dr. Juniper," May said. "Is she a baby doctor?"

"For me, she is. She's a vet."

"And you're okay with having puppies?"

"I was surprised when I found out. Who wouldn't be? But, after a week, I'm getting used to the idea. And I get a kick out of feeling them move around inside me."

Abby raised a hand cautiously. "Can... can I touch it?"

Rose nodded. "You won't feel them moving. Mom says it's too soon for anybody but me to feel them. But I don't mind you touching my belly."

Abby put her hand on Rose's pregnant mound. So did May.

And that was the position Rose's mother found them in when she returned. "What in the... ?"

"My friends came to see me," Rose said. "And I'm glad they did. I know you love me, Mom, but I need more than you and Dr. Juniper in my life."

"I suppose it's okay," Mom said, "now that the cat's out of the bag. But you girls have to promise me that you won't tell anyone about this."

"We promise," Abby said.

"We'd never want to hurt Rose," May added.

Mom sighed. "It's actually kind of a relief. I'm not the only one taking care of you anymore."

"Mom," Rose asked, "can... can I keep the puppies once they're born?"

"Well, they have to be with you for eight weeks, until they're weaned. But, once they're off the spout and eating solid food, I will promise you at least one."

Abby spoke again. "Could I get one of the puppies?"

"Me, too?" asked May.

"Alright, girls. That's two more I won't have to worry about finding homes for."

Rose was overjoyed. As Dr. Juniper said, it wasn't the way she envisioned it when she made that wish, but she would have a dog of her very own.
1132332113.title: The other girls promise to keep visiting

11323321131.content:
"My, my, my, look at you, momma!" Dr. Juniper teased as Rose waddled into the clinic. The girl had grown quite a bit again, a 30 week pregnant bump jutting out from her body, Her shirt tight to the mound. "How are you feeling?"

"Full and heavy." Rose huffed as she reached the exam table, leaning on it as she caught her breath. It was getting to be more of a workout to waddle distances like those from the back lot to the exam room as she was weighed down by the litter of pups in her belly. Dr. Juniper smiled at the pregnant girl and rubbed a hand over her back.

"Well, look on the bright side. You're halfway finished cooking them in there." She chuckled before helping Rose up onto the table where her shirt was removed so images could be taken. Only three weeks in and they had a routine. Juniper gave a hum as she realized that Rose now had a bra. Her tiny breasts had been too small to need one yet before, but now they had filled in a bit more, a sign that her body was really preparing to be mother to this litter. "How's everything else going?"

"I'm hungry a lot more." Rose offered up as she rubbed her swollen belly. "And I sleep a lot. Mom said that's normal for pregnant ladies, even if it's not puppies."

"She's right. Just make sure you're eating healthy and not eating too much. Getting rest is important, though. Your body needs lots of energy to get those puppies in you growing." She hummed, cupping Rose's stomach in her hands with a smile. The girl really was a marvel, managing to get so heavily pregnant in only six weeks.
11323321131.title: Halfway to Birth

113233211313.content:
"Look. At. You," Dr. Juniper said as Rose waddled in, looking as if she were in her eighth month instead of her seventh week. "Those puppies just keep getting bigger, don't they?"

"That's what her best friends say," Rose's mother said. The two of them helped Rose up onto the examination table.

"The puppies aren't all that's bigger," Rose said. "I'm wearing one of Mom's bras."

"I suppose that's to be expected," said Dr. Juniper. "You're going to have eight hungry mouths to feed, with only two ways to get the milk."

Like always, Dr. Juniper hummed as she took Rose's measurements. When she was finished, she said, "I'm glad you came with Rose today, Mrs. Newsome. There's something I'd like to discuss with you."

"Rose is alright, isn't she?" Mom asked.

"Rose is fine," the vet replied. "However, as you can see, she's having a difficult time getting around. It's only going to get harder as she gets bigger, and she's got five weeks to go."

"What do you suggest?"

"I'd like to suggest that, starting next week, I come to your house to examine Rose. Everything I need, I can easily bring with me. And I'll be going there anyway, once it's time for her to whelp."

"What do you think, honey?"

Rose nodded. "It's already getting hard to take a full breath, and I'm going to the bathroom constantly. Staying home will make it easier."

Mom nodded. "Alright, Dr. Juniper. We'll see you at our house next week. I'll give you directions."
113233211313.title: Next week

choices: Rose's friends show up during the exam
1132332113132.content:
Dr. Juniper thanked Rose's mother as she was let into he house and made her way to the living room where she was told that Rose would be. "Oh my..." She said as she found the young girl reclined on the couch with her feet up. Despite still having another four weeks to go and being only eight weeks pregnant, Rose looked full term. If Juniper didn't know any better, she would think the young girl was about to pop at any moment.

"Hi doctor!" Rose puffed as she pushed herself to sit up a little more. Clearly the girl had gotten comfortable since her sweatpants were slung low over her heavy bump and her t-shirt had rucked up to expose more than half of it, including her bellybutton which had popped out like a timer on a roasting turkey, though too soon in this case. Juniper smiled and moved to help get the girl on her feet as she started examining her.

"You look ready to burst." She chuckled, though her amusment faded slightly at the panicked look on Rose's face. "Don't worry. It's just an expression. You're not going to pop. I just mean that you're getting really big. If this was a human baby, you'd be finishing up now." She explained as she knelt down in front of Rose and felt the girl's hips, which had widened in response to her pregnancy.Her womb was resting low and heavy in their cradle, leaving rose with a wide stance and a severe waddle as her pelvis was filled. It was no wonder she didn't have much bladder capacity anymore.

"They move around a lot now..." Rose murmured and Juniper laid a hand over the stretch marks on the side of the girl's belly, feeling the shifting movements of a litter of puppies under her palm.

"They sure are. And they're going to get more active and kick a lot from here on. They're pretty packed tight in there and they want to try moving in their mama."
1132332113132.title: Next Week

11323321131321.content:
Rose puffed as she stood up from the toilet. She had long before lost count of how many times she had gone today.

As she washed her hands, she looked at her outfit in the mirror. It was designed for a woman who was full term, and the top was creeping up her belly. Clearly, it was not designed for someone carrying a litter of eight puppies. Sighing, she dried her hands and waddled to the living room.

"Surprise!"

While Rose was in the bathroom, Abby, May, and Mom had hung decorations and brought in several wrapped gifts. "What's going on?" Rose asked.

"We wanted to do something nice for you," Abby said, "so we asked your mom for ideas."

Mom nodded. "I told them that, when I was pregnant with you, my friends threw me a baby shower, to help me get ready for you."

"So we modified the idea," May said, "and decided to throw the world's first puppy shower."

"A puppy shower," Rose said, settling into her chair. "How about that?"

Rose received just about everything she would need for taking care of a puppy for a year: food bowls, water bowls, training pads, waste bags, a collar, and a leash. She was deeply grateful, and hugged her mother and her friends as closely as her massive belly allowed.
11323321131321.title: The puppy shower

choices: Rose starts getting some instincts and building a nest to give birth in
113233211313211.content:
Nine weeks was the point where Rose really started struggling with the burden of the puppies inside her. She groaned lowly as she hefted herself off the couch, only to hold her belly as she sucked in a sharp breath. Juniper rubbed the small of her patient's back. "My belly hurts sometimes..." She complained with a frown.

"So... When a baby is born, the momma's belly squeezes tight to help it get out. It's called a contraction. You're pregnant enough that your body is starting to practice it's contractions just a little bit. The real ones will feel different but, it's like your belly is working out to get ready for when the puppies come." She explained, patting the girl's overdue belly like she was a prize heifer. She nearly was, really, for all the benefits that would come with this research project.

"Okay." Rose hummed before waddling a few steps away from the couch, each step slow and heavy.

"Wow. It's getting really hard for you to move around now, huh?" It was only to be expected from the girl's shape and weight ballooning so quickly, really. Rose nodded, hands propped in the small of her back as she turned.

"I feel really full and they're so heavy." She groaned, cheeks lightly flushed. She didn't want to say it out loud, but she really liked feeling her belly full of squirming puppies weighing her down. Whenever she laid down, she could feel them shift inside her and she loved waking up to them wiggling and kicking energetically. Juniper smiled a little and knelt down in front of the heavily pregnant girl, pushing her shirt up over her belly to where her milky breasts were perched above it.

"Well, only three more weeks until you have them, momma. Then you've got to wait until you have a real baby to get this big and heavy again." She hummed as Rose licked her lips and looked down at the roundness that jutted out from her.
113233211313211.title: Next Week

choices: Yes, Rose would love to make another wish!
Rose decides it's better not to make another wish.
1132332113132111.content:
A few hours after Dr.Juniper's visit, Rose was in her bed relaxing. Under the covers, her hands stroked her overdue pregnant bump, feeling her litter of pups kick at her hands. She giggled, unable to be mad at them even if she knew that they would still be squirming around when she wanted to go to bed later in the night.

"Three more weeks..." She sighed.

Rose didn't know how much bigger she was going to be by the time she had her litter. Dr.Juniper didn't know and neither did her mother. Everyone who knew about her puppy pregnancy was left in the dark just like she was when it came to what would happen next. With a yawn, Rose decided not to think too much on the subject. The girl gave her tummy a pat and turned over on her side to look out of her bedroom window. As she turned over, she could feel the pups inside of her kicking out in protest and she put her hand back on her belly to calm them down once she was safely on her side.

Suddenly, out of the corner of Rose's eye, she saw something glittering. She gasped and her unborn occupants fell still. There was another star shooting across the sky! She knew that the last one she had seen nine weeks ago had given her the puppy she always wanted (and some others) which told the eleven year old that her wish would certainly come true if she made another one. The next question that came to her mind was if she would actually make another wish.
1132332113132111.title: Rose sees another shooting star

choices: Rose wants to have more puppies in her belly.
11323321131321111.content:
Rose took a deep breath and cast the blanket off of herself before she shimmied to the edge of her bed. Swinging her feet to the floor, Rose grunted and stood up, pressing into the small of her back as she stretched. Waddling over to the windowsill, the pregnant girl's eyes were wide as she watched the shooting star. When her belly gently hit her wall, she turned to the side and got closer to the window.

         "I know you can grant my wish." She said, patting her puppy filled mound as proof. "Even if it's granted a little odd, I don't mind. I don't mind at all!" Rose said aloud.

         She put a hand on her belly and gently rubbed over the top of it. Slowly, the young girl took in a gulp of the crisp night air coming from her window and bit her bottom lip in thought. She might not get another wish. This could be the last one she ever gets and the wish could be taken out of context in some unforeseen way. With a shudder, Rose let go of the breath she had been holding and decided on her wish.
11323321131321111.title: Yes, Rose would love to make another wish!

choices: Rose wants a baker's dozen of pups. (12-13 total)
Rose wants to carry even more than a baker's dozen!
113233211313211111.content:
Eight puppies just wasn't enough for the eleven year old. She cupped the underside of her belly and then gave her pregnant belly a hug before whispering "I hope you don't mind sharing mommy with some more siblings."

         Rose kissed her swollen belly and then stood back up. She couldn't wait to make her wish and see if it would come true! She looked back up to the star and began to think really hard. All she had to do was decide just how many more puppies she would be having but she also had to word it so she would get just what she wanted.
113233211313211111.title: Rose wants to have more puppies in her belly.

choices: Rose is going to double her current litter! (16 pups)
Doubling the litter still won't be enough for Rose. She wants more!
1132332113132111112.content:
Rose mulled over the idea of having what her mother called 'A baker's dozen' or, 13 pups, inside of her. She shook her head in the end. 13 puppies wouldn't be enough. She wanted to watch her belly grow with even more puppies than that but she couldn't put a finger on just how many she really wanted to be stuffed with.

         She assumed she was going to have eight puppies when her pregnancy was over and she looked overdue right now with one human baby according to the doctor. What if she doubled her pups? Maybe that would be just the right amount of puppies and the right tummy size to put her at ease.
1132332113132111112.title: Rose wants to carry even more than a baker'...

choices: Rose wished to have her litter quadrupled. (32 pups)
She wished to have the most pups in a single litter!
11323321131321111122.content:
Rose rubbed her belly and gave a little whine through her lips. 16 puppies would definitely make her look really pregnant but something in the back of her mind told her she should have even more. She could carry even more than two litters worth of pups at a time! She just knew it.

         "Stay there!" Rose commanded, pointing to the shooting star before she waddled out of the room.

         As Rose made her way through the house, she could picture the shocked look on Dr.Juniper and her mother when they found out just how many puppies they had 'missed' for five weeks. She was going to be huge- NO! She was going to be massive by the time her extended litter was born. After looking something up on her mother's I-Pad, the eleven year old squealed with joy.

         "I need to hurry back to my room before the star goes away!" She cried.

         Rose tossed the I-Pad on the couch and began waddling as fast as she could with her round, overdue sized belly weighing her down. Rose didn't know exactly what compelled her to want even more puppies, let alone the amount she was thinking of in her head right now, but she knew that in the end, it would be the best experience of her entire life.

         Finally, Rose made it back to the windowsill and turned to her side, pressing her puppy filled form against the wall as if her life depended on it. She scanned the night sky for the shooting star and found it as it entered the center of the Big Dipper. She licked her lips and tried to control her breathing as much as she could before she cleared her throat and made her wish.
11323321131321111122.title: Doubling the litter still won't be enough for Rose

choices: Rose lies.Says she wanted a few more pups.(24)
Rose comes clean and says she made another wish.
113233211313211111222.content:
"I wish to have as many puppies as I can fit into my pregnant belly!" Rose declared.

         After she made her wish, Rose gasped as she saw the shooting star reverse its path and go into the little dipper. It began to shine and fill the inside of the constellation quickly before suddenly fading out. Rose let go of the grip she had on her top, not realizing she had been holding it in-between her budding breasts. As she stood there, nothing seemed to be happening. Rose pushed away from the wall and went to her full body mirror to look at herself.

         She prodded her swollen stomach with a finger but got no response from her puppies. She frowned, looking down at her belly in worry. Had her wish done something bad to her puppies? What would her mother think about this? Dr.Juniper? She shook her head. It had to work. She was certain it had worked and as long as she believed, it would be alright. With a long exhale Rose pulled her pajama top down as far as it would go and decided to head to bed.

----------------

         When Rose woke up, she felt extremely tired. More tired than she had ever felt before. She groaned and got up onto her feet with ease. The girl yawned and did her best to rub the sleep from her eyes. Rose didn't feel sleepy. It was more-so the fact that she felt lethargic and she didn't want to move around that much at all.

         "Rose honey? Are you alright in there? You're normally up by now and I know you need your rest but-" Rose's mother was interjected as the pregnant girl herself let out a groan yet again.

         A second didn't even go by before the woman burst into the room. Rose looked at her mother and they locked eyes. "Mommy..." Rose said in between deep breaths. "I think I need to see Dr.Juniper."

----------------

         Dr.Juniper's face looked puzzled as Rose studied it. "Rose sweetie?" The vet began. "Can you tell me how you're feeling? Once you tell me I think I'll run an ultrasound on you. Actually, I am definitely going to run an ultrasound." The woman bent down and lifted Rose's shirt, waiting for her to begin telling her what was going on.

         "I feel really tired." The eleven year old started. "And my tummy feels like I ate a lot but I know I didn't! I just..." Rose trailed off, her pointer fingers pressed into one another as she felt Dr.Juniper's fingertips begin gently pressing into her swollen form. "Mommy won't let me look at my belly in the mirror either." She pouted. "Do you know what's going on?" Rose asked the vet, her eyes pleading for an answer.

         "W-Well... Let me start up the the machine. You have to promise me you won't be upset okay? Promise?" Dr.Juniper said.

         Rose looked to her mother and watched her look away, her brow furrowing in deep thought. Her mind immediately went to her puppies and she asked if they were alright. The wand was put to her belly and Dr.Juniper assured her that they were but, Rose knew something wasn't right. She asked to hear the heartbeats and the vet pursed her lips, turning up the noise on the ultrasound so everyone could hear.

         Rose's mother shook her head and started pacing but Rose's eyes went wide. "I-It worked... It worked! Mommy can you hear them? Can you hear them Dr.Juniper?" The little girl began to laugh, her second wish had really come true!

         Rose could feel her mother and the vet staring at her with intense looks but she didn't care. She knew all of her puppies were healthy and she was definitely very happy. Rose couldn't pick out the individual heartbeats but she could tell that there was a whole lot of them. The machine was promptly shut off and Dr.Juniper wiped the gel from her patient's belly before helping her sit up.

         "Rose. Your puppies aren't as far along as they were two days ago when I last saw you. Do you mind telling me exactly what you mean by 'It worked'?" Dr.Juniper had her arms crossed under her bosom and she was tapping her foot as she glared at Subject R and her smaller five month looking belly.
113233211313211111222.title: She wished to have the most pups she could at once

1132332113132111112222.content:
There was a long pregnant pause before Rose put a hand on the front of her belly and began to smile. "I got to make another wish." The girl said. "I don't see what's so bad about that." It was true, she didn't think it was that big of a deal.

         "Rose? What exactly did you wish for?" Dr.Juniper asked worriedly. "You need to be honest with me as this is very very serious."

         Rose could tell that the doctor wasn't kidding around now. "I-I wished to have as many puppies as I could have in my belly." The young mother said. "Please don't be mad Dr.Juniper. I didn't mean to cause trouble, honest! I just wanted my tummy to get really big and swollen with lots of puppies..." Rose trailed off and began to sniffle.

         "Oh sweetie!" Rose's mother rushed over to her baby who was full of even more babies, to give her a big, reassuring hug. "If I had known this would happen I would have watched you more carefully. It's my fault you're going through this. I'm so sorry." The woman began to stroke Rose's hair as she pulled her close, letting the pregnant child cry into her shoulder.

         Dr.Juniper eventually got both of the females to calm down enough to break the hug. She began to explain that because of Rose's wish, the puppies inside of her not only multiplied, but they had also become smaller. Now all of Rose's puppies were only at most a week and a half to two weeks along. That meant that Rose was going to be pregnant for ten more weeks now if she gave birth on time. The veterinarian explained that because this was uncharted territory yet again, she would prefer to visit every other day now as Rose would be growing at an extremely fast rate and she was worried for the eleven year old's safety. Rose's mother asked if her daughter would be alright since the previous wish seemed to help her adapt to her original eight pups just fine.

         Turning to look at Rose's mother, Dr.Juniper shrugged her shoulders. "Just because some sort of magic is involved doesn't mean Rose will be out of harms way. Maybe this time the wish won't be able to help her adjust quick enough because it made her so pregnant." The woman kneaded the back of her head and began to speak again. "If she grows too much and can't handle it, I'll have to terminate the pregnan-"

         "No! I won't let you!" Rose yelled. "I believe in my wish and I know nothing bad will happen. You won't hurt my precious puppies do you understand me?" Rose growled, holding her bump in her arms to shield it from the vet. She wouldn't let the lady hurt her unborn puppies. Not ever! Rose would do whatever she had to do just to keep all of the pups inside of her belly until they were ready.

         "Fine fine. I'll make sure I do everything I can to make sure you deliver all of your little ones safely okay mommy? I'll pinky promise." The vet said, holding out her pinky. Rose took it with her own and planned to hold Dr.Juniper to it. "What a hectic day! Well I guess I'll see you in two days to check in on you and the pups Rose! Please stay safe." With that said, Dr.Juniper took the pictures needed for the Subject R file and left, leaving mother and heavily pregnant daughter to themselves.


|*Author's note: Rose's wish has made her pregnant with at least 56 puppies, up to 64 puppies. She can not handle anymore pups in her belly Period.|
1132332113132111112222.title: Rose comes clean and says she made another wish.

choices: She wishes that after these puppies come she would keep having more litters
She wishes for a human baby after her puppies come
113233211313211112.content: What does Rose wish for instead?
113233211313211112.title: A different wish.

1132332113132111123.content: She wishes her puppies can talk?
1132332113132111123.title: More wishes

1132332113132112.content:
Rose's nightgown strained at her belly. The puppies were active, and her belly visibly squirmed with their movements within her. Just a few more weeks...

She began heading toward the stairs, but she stopped when she reached the guest bedroom. Looking in, she saw an expanse of unfurnished floor space that appealed to her.

Taking the quilt, sheets, and pillows off the bed, she spread the quilt on the floor, then spread the sheets over the quilt. She didn't know why she did it this way, only that something within told her that it must be this way. Putting the pillows against the wall, she stepped back and looked at her handiwork.

"Nice, isn't it?"

Rose turned slowly. "Mom! I, uh, I didn't see you there! I was just... I mean, I, uh,... "

"You don't really know why you did that, do you?"

Rose shook her head.

"They call it the nesting instinct," Mom explained. "When I was pregnant with you, I wanted to clean every surface in the house with Q-Tips, and I fretted over whether I had everything I was going to need for you. In your case, your needs are simple: an out-of-the-way place to bring your puppies into the world." Mom wrapped her arm around Rose. "How about I get your sheets and pillows, pick out some clothes, and you start sleeping here? You won't have to traipse all over the house for the next few weeks, and you'll be close to your nest, either to put on the finishing touches or to give birth when the time comes. What do you say?"

Rose didn't say anything. She was just glad that Mom understood her, even when she didn't understand herself.
1132332113132112.title: Rose starts getting some instincts and building...

choices: Rose's friends come for a visit
11323321131321122.content:
"Just like that. Good." Dr. Juniper said proudly as she sat beside Rose in the nest she had built the week before. She had decided now that the young girl was ten weeks pregnant, it was high time that she give the girl a little birthing coaching. They had gone over a few potential positions she could give birth in, such as squatting or being on all fours, but right now Rose was reclined on a mountain of pillows piled up in the corner of the room, knees bent and legs wide apart. "This is how most people have a human baby."

She took the opportunity to feel the underside of Rose's puppy filled mound. Things were starting to prepare for their arrival. Rose hadn't dropped yet, but her womb was settling lower in her hips in preparation, and Rose's mother had told her the girl had started lactating just the day before. Juniper had readied herself to always be on call, just in case Rose's young body went into a premature labor and had already stashed her needed supplies in the nearby closet.

Rose, for her part, was really getting used to being so heavily pregnant. She felt absolutely massive and the puppies had had a bit of a growth spurt in the last week, so her belly loomed high over her body. She had officially outgrown a lot of her maternity wear this week and with so little left, they had decided to just make what they had work, so she rotated the few pairs of sweatpants that fit under her belly and let her belly hang out under her shirts.

"I... I think I'm ready for this. I'm ready to be a mommy." Rose realized in that moment, that last sentence felt really good to say.
11323321131321122.title: Next Week

113233211313211223.content:
"You're into the home stretch, Rose," Dr. Juniper said after examining the pregnant 11-year-old. "Your estimated due date is just seven days away. This means you could go into labor sooner than expected, or you might wind up waiting longer. Or maybe my next scheduled visit could have me on hand when it's time."

Rose nodded. Her maternity tops didn't cover her enormous belly anymore, so she only wore sweatpants and a nursing bra that Mom found, with pads to absorb the milk leaking out of her.

"So," Dr. Juniper asked, "what all goes through your mind when you think back to that wish you made?"

"I never thought wishing for a puppy would turn out like this," she said, rubbing her vast,squirming mound. "And I never imagined I would... "

Juniper prodded her unique patient. "Go on... "

"I never thought I would love it so much. I'm ready to give birth, and I don't want this to last any longer than it has to. But I think I'm going to miss it when it's all over."

Mom put her arm around Rose. "I felt the same way, when I had you."

"Think of this as a terrific story you'll get to tell a special someone one day," the vet said.

"And we know a little more about what to expect," Abby said, "when we're old enough to have babies of our own."

"Alright then," Dr . Juniper said, gathering her things. "I'll see you next week, unless you call me before then."
113233211313211223.title: The next week

1132332113132112231.content:
Rose was awakened by the worst pain she had ever felt. It felt like her belly was in a vise, and she cried out.

Mom came running. "Are you alright, Rose? What is it?"

"Hurts," was all the girl could say.

Mom lifted the covers. "Rose, honey," she said, "your water broke." With that, she left the room.

Rose knew what that meant: it was time for her puppies to be born. She took off everything and went to her nest.

Mom came back into the room. "Dr. Juniper is on her way."

She came 15 minutes later. "How are we doing?" she asked.

"Her contractions are two minutes apart," Mom said.

Dr. Juniper settled down close to her patient. "Ready to be a mommy?"

Rose nodded, then groaned with another contraction.

Juniper checked her out. "Alright, Rose," she said, "don't try to fight it. On your next contraction, I want you to start pushing. Understand?"

She nodded.

Less than five minutes later, the first of Rose's puppies was born.

If Rose had been a dog having puppies, she would have bitten the umbilical cord and licked the puppy clean. Instead, Dr. Juniper cut the cord, and Mom cleaned it with a towel, then handed it to Rose, who held it to her breast.

The same thing happened with the next puppy. Subsequent pups had to wait until the first two had drunk their fill.
