When it was over, Dr. Juniper said, "Congratulations, Rose. You are the mother of eight Siberian Huskies. Four male, four female."

When Abby and May came, they cooed over Rose and her puppies.
1132332113132112231.title: It's Time

11323321131321122311.content:
The next day, Rose put her puppies into a cardboard box, and cared for them in there. She didn't leave the room often, only to go to the bathroom. Mom brought her food. Rose nursed her puppies two at a time, and got nervous if someone other than her got too close to them.

When they opened their eyes, the pups began exploring their world, and Rose became more appreciative of others'help wrangling them. When their teeth started coming in, they began to bite, and Rose introduced them to more solid food.

After eight weeks, the puppies were all weaned, and it was time to find homes for them. Abby and May each took one of the girls, and Dr. Juniper adopted one and helped find homes for four more. As Mom promised, Rose got to keep one: her firstborn, a male pup who she named Shadow.

Some girls commented on her breasts, but she just smiled and said, "Your time will come." A few commented on her stretch marks, but she ignored them.

She herself made no more wishes on stars, but she certainly planned to let her human children grow up wishing.
11323321131321122311.title: The End of It

choices: She knows that something is wrong (skip to the Doctor's visit)
She liked it ( keep with thoughts and behaviour)
11323321133.content:
The next days Rose started to feel "odd", she started to feel uncomfortable on her own bed, for some reason Rose had an...urge to sleep on the floor, she didn't know why,but almost like was an instict, trying to whispering in her head that it was a good idea, after debating herself about this,she started to move pillows, plushies and blankets to sleep more comfortable on it, every single night. On the first time,when she was sure that everyone was asleep Rose had some difficult searching for any potition to sleep, to the point that it take her a few hours to finally position herself, she sudden started curl herself on the floor mostly because of the feeling of the big weight of the little litters trying to get themselves some space on the little tummy of her.

Rose feel a warm coming from her belly that sometimes bugging her on the mornings, thankfully, in that cold night that warmth was making her falling asleep thanks to the relaxing temperature that her own body was making, unconsiously, reaching her upper body to her big belly trying to be the most closest to her own puppies.

The next morning after she woke up and picked up her things on the floor to put it on the bed. During the morning after she eated her breakfast and her mother left for work, not without remind her to not left the house for any reason, Rose decided to spent her time playing on the garden of her house, trying to imagine herself after all of this with her own puppy. During her small walk, she couldn't help but touch her belly barely cover for the blue dress she was using.
"I wonder wich one of you, will be the one that my mommy will let me have." Rose started to say to her belly, even if she knew that her litters couldn't listen her.
"I can't wait to meet you, all of you. I can't wait the day to...playing with you, carrying you around, feeding it with...my...milk" Rose started to number the things that she was imagine to do with them, not realizing of what she just said thanks to the next thing.
During this minutes Rose started to feel the hot sun starting to affecting her more than usual, at first she didn't care believing it was for the summer than just her.
Rose started to return to the house beleiving that the sudden heat will come out once she was on her comfy house...it didn't.
The heat was worse, to the point Rose started to sweat up and run to the shower to wash herself to cool down. After grabbing a towel to cover her big belly and hair,Rose returned to her bed to find new clothes to put on, but like yesterday something happened, she stopped to search from the pile of clothes on her closet becuase another pleasent idea came to her, she didn't knew why but the moment she put the tower aside, the idea of being just naked like this when no one was around sounded good all of the sudden.
"My mother just told to not be seeing by anyone but her friends, while Iwas expecting the puppies,...but she didn't say anything else, right?" She said to herself trying to convice herself. "What would be the problem if I do this on the house? Besides if I do this when I'm alone mommy won't worry about it, I don't want to be more worried that she already is." She said confident, not seeing anything bad or off about her way of think. In fact she believed that it was normal.
The Dr. Juniper tried to explained to her that women suffers of behaviour changes, and starting to like things she didn't liked before thanks to the babies forming inside of them. But Rose didn't get it completely,beliving that applied by everything she did,from her point of view because she was getting puppies she believed it was normal for her to have that kind of urges.
This misunderstanding lead to path ideas that affected her behaviour more and more.
During the currently week Rose started to develop in secret a conduct, that even the most refined person would describe as a dog behaviour.
First it was just being naked and sleeping on the comfy floor. For the third day she started to feel that her back has killing her and started to go on four, feeling that the sudden weight of puppies she was carrying and expanding day by day, was less painful than being on her two feet.
She started to do almost every single thing on that position, sleeping,eating, moving around the house.
When May and Abby visit her she started to ask questions about it, the questions went from how it feel, to some changes that she was having. At some point Rose commented new likes and her sudden routine to her best friends, fortunately thet seemed to be ok, finding themselves fascinated with the pregnancy of her friend promising that they will kept this to themselves beleiving it was part of keeping this on secret like the mother of Rose wanted.
On their spare time the girls started to rub her friend's belly, this happened because the constant grunts and complains of Rose about the sudden incomformity that sometimes she had with the big bump she was always carrying around and the obvious curiosity of the enormous belly with little litters that were residing inside of her.
Even if at first the three of them were shy about the idea, it didn't take too much for them to gain comfort and started to rub on every corner of her expanding skin that they could put their hand on.
Rose on the other hand was discovering some pleasant feeling on being laying on her back while hands rubbed the big sack attached to her.
The movement of the little ones was making insde of her was now easying more and more with each rub she was recieving in return. She actually...feel good.
"*whimper**moan*"
Abby and May suddenly stooped her "rubbing show" when she heard Rose make high noises and moving by reflex one of her legs. The suddenly stop of this make Rose recover her senses, seeing Abby and May looked at her clearly surprised.
"What? Girls, why did you stop?" Rose said clearly oblivious of her previous state.
"Rose, you started to make cute noises" Abby said to her friend while trying to not chuckled like May for the sudden action of her friend.
Rose feeling a little embarrased tried to make an excuse of being just a behavious she gained with the pregnancy. Before she could even continue May interrupted her putting a pair of fingers on her overreacting friend.
"Don't worry, in fact we find it kind of cute, actually." May finalized making Rose a little more relieved.
"You don't mind?" Rose said a little surprised. "No, you are our friend and we will always love you no matter what." Abby continued where May was.
After a small talk Rose's mom returned asking for the girls to leave for the day.
During the fifth day day, Rose experienced some weird sensitivity not only on her ears but also on her nose, hearing the sudden tap of her mother shoes echoing on the hall waking her up to eat, just in time to put everything on the place for the day, to the recognizable smell of pancakes that she was just sniffed from her room.
The same went when she smell the pressence of Abby and May approaching them and then suddenly heard them arriving just at the corner of her house.
The last straw that finished her complete behaviour was when she started to have to urge to go to the bathroom every single time after she finished to eat.
During the night thanks to having problems to sleep, so she decided to view some videos of how take care of the dogs, specifically the new born ones, apparently the newborn litters needed to be washed up, get some sleep, but also they need to be feed by the mother in order to gain nutrients, and need a place where they need to be trained on how they need to go to do their needs,in order to not getting the place...dirty.
At some point Rose was ok with the idea until the video mentioned that it was recommended that the parents of the puppies could do it in order to give an example to the babies and make more easy to train them to do it.
Rose was nervous about the fact but more about the sudden realization that she almost forget during her time in this whole thing. She was the mother of the puppies.
Every single one of them are thecnically her babies, even though her Mother told her that they only to behave themselves right?
The sudden thought of something happened to the little creatures gained over the doubt if there was something wrong with doing that.
Sneaking up to the garden, naked without a shame on her face started to slowly to crawl to the tree that was on the center of the garden.
'This for the puppies right? At these hours no one will be looking nor are outside of the house, so I won't be seeing by anyone just like mommy wanted, so I'm not doing anything wrong right? Right?' she debated with herself trying to be the most careful that she can be.
When she was at the tree she taked a few deep breaths before starting to raise clumsily her leg, trying to remember the words that her mom said when she tried to go for the bathroom the first time
'Just breath,*inhale* *exhale* and then imagine a waterfall falling on a river making a sound like a...'
*drip drip*
After a few moments Rose finished up and started to get herself up not caring to sudden hurt of being on her two feet and finally run to her bedroom jumping to the bed and covering on the blankets.
Rose's face reflected a complete shock after the sudden things she started to do recently.
Almost like if her words and body were on different side she only could think was...
'What did-d I j-just do?' Rose said with a blush that cover in red her face.
"I know that was something weird but the Dr. Juniper told me this was normal, so... Why do I feel so weird about it? Even though...it felt...so good.~*bark!**pant*" Rose suddenly get complete silent when she just heard herself. She did just bark, like , like a...puppy. During the last hours Rose tried to force herself to sleep expecting that find the answer when she woke up in the morning.
Maybe all that she needed was a moment of peace to think clearly right? Right?
11323321133.title: Only puppies have puppies

choices: Rose has a doctor's appointment today
Rose is going to the pool today
All plans on hold because something feels funny.
1133.content:
Rose smiled to herself as she woke to the feeling of movement in her midsection. It had become a common feeling to her ever since her litter of puppies had started to move inside her pregnant belly. The wish she had made had to be one of the best things she had ever done. She knew magic had to be real and the changes taking place in her proved it. It had started with feeling sick a mere eight weeks ago, followed by her belly starting to grow. An ultrasound had revealed the litter of puppies nestled safe inside her womb and determined that her pregnancy would likely only last as long as that of a dog.

The best part had been that there were no questions. Everyone had just gone with things like it was perfectly normal for an 11 year old girl to turn up pregnant with puppies. Rose was grateful that her wish had done that for her, saving her so much trouble. She blew out a breath as she carefully pushed herself to sit up, one hand cradling her belly that had started to grow heavy as it grew and filled.

With still four weeks to go until she birthed her litter, Rose looked as though she were 8 months pregnant with a single child. Her bump was free to the air as any pajamas that she owned would not cover the heavy pup filled mound. She perched on the edge of the bed, rubbing at the bare skin with a smile as she marveled at it. Her fingers poked at her popped out belly button for a moment before she hefted herself to her feet. She was lucky school had let out for summer in the second week of her pregnancy when she was just starting to grow. There was no way her uniform would fit her now and she was in no mood to attend classes while so heavily pregnant.

Rose waddled back and forth for a moment as she marveled at her pregnant body. As scary as it had been at first when she found out she would be mother to puppies, she was finding herself very much enjoying the feeling now. Perhaps the wishing star had granted her wish better than she initially thought.
1133.title: 8 weeks pregnant

11332.content: Rose was going to be heading out to the town's public pool to hang out and have fun today. Rose had always enjoyed swimming, as it was, but the growing weight of her swelling belly, comboed with the steadily-climbing summer heat had given her plenty of further reason to indulge in the activity, as of late. As she was prepping her bag with her spare towels, flip-flops, comb, sunscreen, and other accessories and accouterments, she once again mulled how especially lucky and thankful she was that her wish had rendered the town's populace completely indifferent and accepting of her puppy-filled condition, because - otherwise - she'd likely be hard-pressed to leave her house at all, let alone go out to a highly-public place like the pool, to hang with her friends. With her bag now packed, it was now time to turn to the most important aspect of her pool-time preparation... Just which of her swimsuits to wear? She had recently acquired several new maternity ones appropriate for her gravid status, but just which style did she feel like wearing out today? Should she go with a one-piece swimsuit, for a possibly-appreciated greater degree of belly support? Or was she feeling daring enough to rock a two-piece suit, so that her puppy-filled tummy would be proudly displayed to everyone she happened to pass?
11332.title: Rose is going to the pool today

choices: Her friends ask if they can rub her belly.
Her belly growls for food. Time to feed the pups.
113322.content:
If everyone wasn't going to give her a problem with the litter in her tummy, then she might as well proudly show it off at the pool. Maybe someone would even offer to rub her belly.

Despite some difficulty, thanks to her swollen midsection, Rose managed to put on her emerald-green two-piece swimsuit. She looked at herself in the mirror and rubbed her tummy, pleased with how big the suit made her look. She then felt the pups kick inside her womb, and she tried to calm them down. "Calm down, little ones," she said while rubbing her belly, "we're gonna leave for the pool right now."

She grabbed a towel, her flip flops, and ran down to where her mother was waiting with sunscreen, as well as her own stuff for the pool. Her mother looked concerned upon noticing that Rose had chosen to wear a two-piece. "Are you sure you want others to see your belly exposed?" she asked with uncertainty. "I'm sure, mom, hardly anyone gives me any trouble about it, so I figured, why not. Besides, I won't mind if anyone offers to rub my tummy." Her mother figured she had a point but was still a bit reluctant for her 11-year-old daughter to show off her swelling belly for all to see.

Rose put on regular clothes over her swimsuit, and they drove to the pool. When they arrived, Rose could see her friends Kary and Maxine swimming around. Quickly, she took off her regular clothes to reveal her in her two-piece and started walking towards them, both hands on her swollen midsection. "Morning, girls," Rose called to them. Both of them waved back and started swimming towards her as she waited on the steps, knee-deep in water. "Wow, Rose," exclaimed Maxine, "you're getting big!" Rose proudly patted and rubbed her tummy in response.
113322.title: Two-Piece

1133221.content:
"Is it okay if we rub your tummy?" asked Kary excitedly. Before Rose could respond, her mother ran up to her. "Sweetie, you forgot to put on sunblock." Rose apologized and got out of the water to have the lotion applied. She rubbed some sunblock on her arms and face, while her mom did her legs and back. Then her mother poured quite a bit of lotion on Rose's enormous belly. Rose then turned to her two friends as she stepped back down the steps. "Care to do the honors?" she asked, presenting her belly for rubbing. Kary and Maxine eagerly got up and started rubbing the sunscreen all over their friend's midsection. They loved every second of rubbing Rose's big belly, and they even felt the puppies kick.

Rose moaned in pleasure; she felt like she was in heaven. Until now, no one else, other than her mother, rubbed her belly, so it felt good knowing that her two best friends cared a lot about her new litter. Becky let out a laugh as she saw Ava's face morph into utter shock. "It's okay, don't worry. They're fake babies remember? Isn't that right Emily?" Emily nodded. "See? I told you."

         Ava wasn't convinced at all. She didn't think it was a good idea to take so many pills regardless of the babies being fake. When the little girl felt something being put into her hand, she looked down to see the bottle of pills. Becky had a grin as she sat there on the bed, waiting for her friend to take her pills too.

         "I-I don't know about this girls..." Ava said. Emily puffed out her cheeks and looked to Ava with a pout. "I'm serious Emmy. I don't think this is a good idea and I don't want to get in trouble." The ten year old said as she looked right at Emily's desk across the room. The little girl refused to even look at her friends, doing her best to ignore them now as she started to get lost in her own thoughts.

Being lost in thought by two girls who wanted you to join their new club was never a good idea. Suddenly Ava found herself with her hands above her head, Emily having taken them to pin her down. Becky, having taken a huge handful of the pills, had another handful as she sat on Ava's legs.

         "H-Hey now... No need to do this girls. I-I'll join just let me do it on my own!" Ava pleaded.

         "It's too late Aves." Becky said. "Now be a good friend and take your baby medicine~" The red head said with a devilish smile spreading on her face.

         Ava tried to protest but was met with one of the pills being pushed against her pink lips. She turned her head to get it away from her but Becky tickled her tummy and she opened her mouth, the pill slipping in. The red head did this again, Ava now at two babies in terms of the pills. If they were going to give her more, Becky would need to keep putting them in quickly.

         "Should we give her more than me?" Becky asked Emily.

         "I dunno. Maybe one more?" The blonde kid responded.

         "Let's think about it quickly or else she might be stuck at only two wittle babies in her tummy." Becky teased, Ava not willing to open her mouth and respond, lest she get another baby.
114212311.title: Ava gets forced to join the club.

114213.content:
"No, I don't want to." Ava shook her head. "It sounds too risky. What if something goes wrong?"

"Like what?" Emily asked, sounding annoyed.

Ava couldn't think of what, exactly. She had to admit, a part of her was curious. She wondered what it would feel like to have a new life growing inside of her. It made her tummy warm and tingly, imagining it. But the whole idea was just too weird. What if they got caught, for one thing? Wouldn't they be in trouble?

"Come on, Ava," Becky urged. When Ava shook her head again, the two other girls cast a glance at one another. Some unspoken communication passed between the two of them, and they grinned at one another. Before she realized what was happening, before she could jump up and run away, the others both pounced on her.

"No!" she shouted, squirming. But Becky sat down on her hips, and Emily pinned down her arms with her bony knees and began unscrewing the cap of the pill bottle. Ava thrashed and wiggled to get away. It was no good. The two of them were pressing her down too hard against the floor.

"You'll have fun, Ava. Just trust us. It won't be the same if we all don't do it together." Emily shook the pill bottle out over her open palm, then reached down and put her hand over Ava's lips.
114213.title: Ava doesn't want to. (Forced pregnancy)

1142132.content:
"Guuuys," Ava whined, still struggling to get away. But Emily's hand came down over her mouth, and her free fingers pinched Ava's nostrils closed. She held her breath as long as she could before she finally had to open her mouth and take a gulp of air. And of course, when she did, Emily dropped the pill in. No, not one pill. Two. Ava was so surprised she tried to jerk upright, and tried to squeal in alarm, and accidentally swallowed.

"There! See, that wasn't so bad, was it?" Emily asked, giggling and giving a victorious little bounce. She rolled off of Ava, and Becky did the same. Panicking slightly, Ava sat up and put both her hands down over her stomach. She expected to feel it swell up big and round as a beach ball all at once. Her heart raced as she waited for it. But long moments passed, and nothing happened.

Well. No, something did happen. She felt herself blush. And she had the strangest sensation of heat in her belly, really low down. It started small and then bloomed all through her, a good, right and significant feeling. Suddenly, she felt very comfortable and happy all over, in every bit of herself. Beside her, Becky took the bottle from Emily and swallowed just one pill.

"Oh!"

"See?" Emily asked. She rubbed a hand over her own stomach and smiled. "Being little mommies is going to be great. And you're lucky, you get to do it twice as much!"
1142132.title: Make her take two (twins)

choices: This is freaky, Ava decides to quit
This is kind of nice, maybe just a few more...
11421321.content:
Ava touched her stomach. It didn't feel any different. Was it supposed to? Maybe the pills hadn't even worked. She ought to just get up now and go home, and hope they hadn't, she supposed.

Still, there was that pool of warmth in her tummy. And a gooey, nice feeling all throughout the rest of her. If the pills had worked, there were two babies inside her already. She felt herself blush again. She couldn't deny that part of her was excited at the thought. For years, she had liked to pretend she was going to be a mommy. She would bundle up one of her baby dolls in a blanket, and put the blanket under her shirt, and make believe it was real.

Now it really was real. She settled back down nervously and looked at the two other girls. At least she wasn't alone, but still...

"That was mean, you guys," she complained.

Emily held out a hand with three pills in it. Ava hesitated. "Go on," Emily urged. "Why not? You already took two, you might as well try more."

Ava took the pills from her and stared at them. Well. It was already done, wasn't it? She sighed and swallowed one. Again, she got a feeling of warmth down low in her tummy. Frowning, she took another. The warmth increased. On the third, she became aware of a tightness inside her. A hard, heavy feeling of weight right between her hip bones. Her hands jerked down to her middle, and she felt her normally flat belly curve outward beneath her fingers.

Rachel was last to take her pill, always hesitant about her burgeoning form and how she would hide it from her mother. As she swelled into her fourth month, her already tight shirt started to ride up over her bump, leaving a strip of bare skin between her shirt hem and sweatpants waistband.

1142333.content:
"Alright! One more pill for everyone!" Aya chirped happily. "Who wants to go first?" Annie raised her hand right away.

"I haven't gone first in a while. I'll take it." She offered, earning herself a nod of approval from the other heavily pregnant girls.

"On your feet." Molly said as she handed a pill to Annie. Annie nodded and got up, standing in front of the other two girls to be observed in her growth. Little did she know, she was already full term and on the cusp of giving birth. It was clear to anyone but the girls. Molly's belly jutted out proudly from her body, the baby within her having already flipped so the head was settled in her pelvis. Her once non-existent breasts had plumped up and filled with milk. Her pregnancy had come along greatly since she first began taking the pills that had made her a mother. She popped the pill into her mouth and was surprised when she didn't feel the usual feeling of growth. Instead something felt funny inside her.

"Is everything okay?" Aya asked with a tilt of her head as Annie held her heavy belly with both hands.

"No...I feel funny..." Annie groaned softly before gasping sharply as she felt her first sharp contraction. "M-My belly hurts!" Both the other pregnant preteens were up on their feet as fast as they could manage and hurrying to her aid. The 10 year old continued to moan and groan as they helped her to sit down and lean against the wall, contractions coming strong and rapid as her body rushed through the labor thanks to the pill. It would never have been so rough if she had just gone into labor naturally, an event that would have occurred in just four days if she had not brought it on at this meeting.

In just a moment her water broke, soaking her shorts with fluid. The other girls did everything they could to help but that didn't amount to much other than holding her hands and trying to soothe her as her body began trying to shove her child out. It was lucky that there were no adults around to hear her pained sobs as she labored without any painkillers.

It was only a half hour after her water had broken that Annie was slumped against the wall, a baby crying between her legs and belly deflated. Molly gasped and grabbed a pair of scissors from the desk nearby, cutting the cord. Aya grabbed a towel and wrapped the baby up. "You...You had a baby..." Molly rasped with wide eyes as Annie slowly redressed herself and caught her breath. Aya gave the child to her and it quieted in its mother's arms.

"I did." Annie breathed as she looked down at her daughter that had been within her womb not long ago. "But I thought these were just fake bellies! I didn't think I had a real baby in me."

11431.content:
Anya was...special to say the least. Ever since she first laid her eyes upon a pregnant woman at age 3, she was incredibly interested in her, obsessed even. Even to this day, whenever a mother-to-be passes her line of sight, the young girl would stare at them with a big smile until they left. This upset and worried her parents, who just so happened to be expecting their second child.

The small, brown haired girl had recently turned 11 and was about to start 5th grade. She was already downstairs with her father Paul, who was already making breakfast for the family. Soon, Anya's mother - Joanne - followed suit and came down in her pink bathrobe, which strained to keep her 8 month belly covered up. "Morning, guys." Jo yawned, taking a seat beside her first daughter.

Without hesitation, like she usually did, Anya touched her mother's belly. Between her slender hand and her mother's swollen midriff was a soft blue glow that seemed to make Joanne's belly shrink...and Anya's to grow. Once Jo returned to her slim figure, Anya gripped onto her new belly as stretch marks formed on her skin, straining the buttons on her pyjamas.

"A-Anya...?" Jo stammered, putting her own hand on her daughter's belly. It was real alright. The dome of flesh was as hard as a bowling ball, noticeable heat coming off it too upon feeling. "We better keep you inside, honey. This is going to be awkward for anyone to see." Quickly, Anya's parents whisked her back upstairs to her bed, tucking her in. "Don't worry, honey. We'll try to find a way to revert this."

"I said that you had better have given me everything on my list this year. You missed three things last time around. And don't give me any of that crap about being a big sister with responsibilities now. I didn't even want a stupid baby brother!" Millie snapped, stomping her foot again. Santa blew out a slow breath and glanced to the pile of presents under the tree before snapping his fingers. In an instant they had been replaced with a pile of baby supplies with colorful bows on them. "Well, I think you need to learn a little something more about responsibility then." Santa grumbled before snapping his fingers at Millie, using a little magic on the girl. "Maybe a baby of your own will help you with that. Welcome to being a mommy, Millie." He smirked. "Don't worry. My magic will make sure everybody already thinks you were expecting."

Millie gasped, hands flying to her stomach as she realized what had been done to her.

choices: Millie decides to quiet down and be a "good girl" at least for now...
1143211232111.content:
"A new years party?" Millie questioned as her mom set her lunch on the table in front of her, along with a few vitamins that had been among her baby-related christmas gifts. "But, why? I'm supposed to have my baby on new years."

"New Year's day, not eve. We'll be having the party the night before your baby comes so your father and I can have one last night of fun before we have to deal with having another crying baby in the house with your brother." Millie licked her lips and nodded, fingers touching where her 26 week pregnancy bulged out from her skinny frame, great and round.

Only a few more days and she would be a mother. It was still terrifying for her to think about. Her parents had said over and over how much she deserved this, but she still didn't think she did. After all, a little bad behavior didn't mean she had to have a whole baby, did it?
1143211232111.title: December 28th

choices: Try playing outside in the snow
Ask mom if she can maybe not keep the baby
11432112321111.content:
A groan slipped past Millie's lips as she waddled to her dresser to get ready for the day. The baby inside her was so heavy now, and at 32 weeks was kicking her relentlessly. She propped a hand in the small of her back as she surveyed her clothing options, but there was nothing that would fit her properly anymore.

She tugged on a pair of sweats that settled low under her large round belly along with an old t-shirt that merely bunched up over the top of her bump, leaving it hanging out in the air for everyone to see just how pregnant she was.

A glance in the mirror confirmed it even more for her. Her mother had said she was "carrying low" and it was easy to see what she meant, as well as feel it. Millie's wide hips ached with the weight of her full womb sitting in them and pressing on hr bladder so she had to waddle to the bathroom so much more often.

Millie grunted as she made her way over to the window, rubbing a hand over her tight skin as she looked out over the thick blanket of snow that had come down over her street overnight.
11432112321111.title: December 29th

choices: Little sis comes in, wanting to talk with Millie about her new puppy pregnancy.
We fast-forward to the start of Millie's new school year.
Fast forward to some *further* point, yet more advanced in Millie's pregnancy.
1143213.content:
Millie stamped her foot against the floorboards in frustration before collapsing atop of her Hello Kitty mattress with an irate groan. It was Christmas morning and, while millions of other lucky kids across the world were busily and happily unwrapping cool new toys and other presents right now, not only had Santa not delivered her anything new, but all of the presents that had been under the tree the nights prior and marked for her were also missing, to boot! Now, this was no act of thievery. At least, no simple one. All of the presents that were for both her parents and elder and younger sister were all still there - intact and sitting just as nice-as-you-please, along with a host of other new goodies. But nothing at all for her!

...Well, that wasn't *quite* true. There was, in fact, one set of things left specifically for her. A bundle of several objects that had been placed into her stocking. The most prominent and pertinent of which was a handwritten note, on high-quality paper. Though the handwriting of it was clear, it also showed evidence of being quite tersely-written; the letters seemingly grinding into the paper and coming very close to tearing it in certain spots from the pressure of the hand that wrote them. The letter read as follows...

______________________________

Millie (No. I'm skipping the 'Dear' on this note. You haven't been anything at all like a 'dear' child, as of late, and I'll be telling you just why, at that.)

I must say, that, while I've mostly fallen out of the habits of my old days - such as leaving coal and switches in the stockings of naughty little boys and girls (and I long ago convinced my superiors just what a truly dreadful idea of what hiring that awful brute, Krampus, was in the first place. Ugh...) - I simply cannot turn a blind eye to the selfish, self-centered and - I'll say it bluntly- outright bratty that you have displayed in the past month towards your parents, sisters, and friends. ...All of whom love you dearly and deserve much better than the treatment that you have been showing to them in recent months. Since we have to start off somewhere I'll begin with the behavior you've been showing towards your parents. All of this past year, ever since they told you that they had looked into those Hatchimal toys, found them quite substandardly-designed, and tried to tell you - quite rightly - that they'd only bring disappointment if they got you one, you not only threw the mother of all temper tantrums on them (on Christmas day!) but have been getting steadily more disrespectful and insolent towards them since... Back-talking them. Slacking off in your chores. Badmouthing them to that crowd of girls you've been calling 'friends' as of late (more on them later). It's simply inexcusable. Your parents gave you life, brought you into this word with love and nurtured you through the years to today - at not-inconsiderable cost and trouble to themselves, I might add - and this behavior is how you think to repay them? I simply won't stand for it. Then - as promised - there's the matter of that crowd of snooty delinquents that you have - for reasons that escape me - been attempting to ingratiate yourself with, as of late. You seem to have gotten it into your head that, just because they come from well-off families and have access to all the currently-fashionable clothes, hair, and devices, that that somehow means that they get a white card to treat others in deplorably unkind ways. Why any child would idolize them I just don't understand, but you seem to have gotten it into your head that they are 'the cool crowd', and, in turn, you have been both neglecting and mistreating your older, truer friends in an effort to ingratiate yourself to them. You even made jokes about Lacy Whitmoore - your actual best friend since kindergarten - and your sisters - your own flesh and blood - behind their backs, just to give those girls a cruel and undeserved laugh. For shame!

So, here is the deal (Not that you will actually have the luxury of declining like any standard form of fair dealing. At least not in all aspects of it)... My dear reindeer might be highly magical, and the 'main 9' (including sweet Rudolph) you know of from song and legend do, indeed, pull my personal sleigh each and every year. But 'magical' doesn't always equate to 'can do the entire job all by themselves'. They each have great stamina and plucky drive, but it's a very big world, and it takes more than just the efforts of nine reindeer to deliver gifts all around the globe to little boys and girls; We need lots of other sleighs, pulled by reserve teams of other fine exemplars of their breed in order to properly cater to everyone. 7-and-a-half-plus-billion-and-still-growing people means a lot of magical reindeer are needed for the task of gift delivery each year, with more called for all the time. That is where you will be coming in. You already know that my office gifts out magical pregnancies to desiring good girls from time to time. As you know, your older sister asked for one three years ago, and your family owes the existence of your horse nephew to it. At that, your little sister happens to have been gifted one just today in response for her wish to have some cute puppies about the house, as well. Well, even though you have not been a good girl this past year, you will still be getting one of these pregnancies as well. Specifically, you will be required to carry and birth one of my aforementioned magical reindeer. How do you think that nasty little clique of so-called 'friends' you have been associating with will react when they see you walking - or should I say, 'waddling' - down the school hall while you are all swollen up huge with a growing reindeer calf? Do you think they will be kind and supportive to you? Or do you think they will just laugh and jeer at you, much like they did over your real friend, Lacy, when you made that awful joke to them about her looking like a 'cow' just because she happens to be pregnant with and by one? I do wonder (but not that hard). Also, though reindeer calves typically require 222 days (that's just a bit over 7 months) I happened to request that this one be dropped off in you womb with just enough gestational-accelerant to push you just past the point of showing by tomorrow morning. That might mean a little less time having to carry the calf, in-of-itself, but it also means there will be no time to try hiding or make excuses for your condition - from anyone - by the time your school gets back in session by the 4th. You're welcome.

So. Beyond getting a valuable new reindeer for my reserves, what do *I* hope to get out of doing this? Well, it's at least my hope that you learn at least a modicum of humility and responsibility for your actions by being pressed into this task. If motherhood proves to be too much of a challenge for you to handle, I will send a special team of elves about a month after you birth it (to allow for proper weaning), in order bring it back to my personal stables up North, and we will call it a lesson learned. But, that said, I truly hope that you can manage to pull your act together and manage to surpass my bare expectations for you. If you turn your behavior around... Do things like start treating your family and friends better and taking proper responsibility about the house again, then that same team of elves will also drop all of the toys and gifts you would have normally received this morning at the same tie that the retrieve the calf. If you actually manage to truly go above and beyond the call... Take real responsibility for your actions and do things like admit to Lacy and your sister the jokes that you made about them behind their backs, and apologize for it, and take pains to take exceptional care of both yourself and the calf while it is in your care, the you will actually be allowed to keep the calf, and be a proper mother to it - Raising it throughout the majority of each and every year, and we'll only require you to be parted from it for a few days around each Christmas for it to do its work. But whether you accomplish - or even desire - that, will be up for your upcoming future actions to decide.

S.

P.S. Just so you don't think of me as an overbearing ogre over this, I have decided to leave you some materials to help you out a little - Like a elf-written guide to the developmental needs of gestating and newborn caribou (which is what 'reindeer' technically are) calves, as well as some anti-morning sickness maternity candies, as well as a small package of cookies and hot chocolate for you to at least enjoy something about this Christmas day. Like I said before. I'm not that nasty fiend Krampus. You really don't want to know how he'd handle this situation if he were still in charge of naughty children...

______________________________

Millie groans again, and runs her hand over her belly. Santa really wasn't kidding about that gestational accelerant he mentioned in the letter. She can already feel her waistline starting to puff, and dreaded just how her figure would be ruined by tomorrow, or the looks she'd inevitably get when she walked into school after the break ended at the start of the coming year. Ugh... Could she really fess up to both Lacy and her older sis about the jokes she made about them? Did she even want to? They'd definitely both be upset. But then. she did kind of miss hanging with Lacy, and was kind of wondering how things were going with her own cow pregnancy. If they manged to forgive her, maybe they could each help her through this coming reindeer ...er... caribou... Err... whatever of her own...

...At least the anti-morning sickness candies Santa gifted her were, indeed, helping with the nausea she was feeling. Tasty too. Mm.
1143213.title: A new reindeer for his fleet

choices: Millie agrees to see the pups in her sister's tummy.
Millie scoffs and tell her sister she's fat, not full of puppies.
Millie says she'll go as long as their mother checks the reindeer in her tummy.
11432131.content:
Millie was startled away from the good morning sickness candies she had been given. She could hear a happy squeal coming from another room and moments later, her door burst open to show her little sister. Millie wasn't fond of her seven and a half year old sister named Jenny. Of all things her parents named her sister it had to be Jenny.

         "Millie, Millie!" Jenny cried. "Look. Look at me Millie!"

         With a grumble, the older sibling looked at her sister and had to take another look at what she saw. Jenny didn't look like herself. She looked a bit taller, her hair longer than it had been last night before everyone had to go to bed. The most distinguishing feature however, was the onesie Jenny was wearing. Right around the middle, the kitty onesie was pulled a bit tight.

         "Santa gave me my two most favorite things this year." Jenny cooed. "Now, I'm eight and a half, not seven and a half." The little girl said with an ear to ear smile. "And, did you see it? Did you? Huh?" Jenny bounced a bit where she stood before she squealed again, taking the zipper on her onesie in her fingers. "Tadaaa!" She said.

         Millie's jaw dropped. She had been right and Santa hadn't lied. Jenny's tummy was indeed swollen out. It wasn't necessarily much but, it was obvious on such a young girl. Millie took a second to work out how big her sister's belly was but she was interrupted and growled, clenching a fist.

         "Santa said I'm gonna be a mommy." Jenny said. Her small hands were on her baby bump as she went back and forth, swinging her tummy about. "He gave me a letter and said that I'm gonna have a litter of puppies because I was a good girl this year. Plus, he said I was gonna have a biiig litter for being extra good!"

         The older sister scoffed. She was pregnant too! Even so, she bit her tongue and offered a forced smile as she looked at her younger sibling and the pregnancy at her hips. Jenny went on to explain that Santa had made her three weeks along with her litter of eight very large pups to celebrate her turning eight years old.

         "Mommy found a doppler in the spare bedroom when we went in there." Jenny said. "She wants you to come and look at the puppies in my tummy with us. Pleeease come watch. I want you there too big sis Mill!" Jenny was pleading, her four month looking bump being cradled by one hand while the other rubbed at the top of the swell.
11432131.title: Millie's sis comes to talk about her pup pregnancy

choices: Millie decides to actually look at her growing bump.
Millie feels a bit bad and goes to see her sister's sonogram.
Millie decides to go after her sister to pick on her some more.
114321312.content:
Millie, ever the sour little brat Santa told her she was, scoffed. "You're pregnant are you?" She began. "Honestly Jenny, you don't look pregnant. You look like you've gotten fat! Fatty fat fat. No puppies in your belly, just fat."

         As Millie taunted her little sister,she felt her stomach begin to tighten up. That didn't dissuade her though, as she kept calling the younger mother fat. Eventually Jenny had enough and zipped up her onesie, sniffling. Millie grinned and stuck out her tongue for added effect before she slumped into her bed, having gotten up while she was being rude to her sister.

         "I-I'll show you I'm not fat when mommy give me a picture of my babies. You'll see Millie!" Jenny said with a trembling voice.

         Even after being berated by her older sibling who should support her new pregnancy, the eight year old was still as polite as she could be. She left the room soon after and Millie took a deep breath and sighed. She was really mad she got forced to have a reindeer. She wanted to have kittens or maybe rabbits. But here she was, grumbling to herself about how much her belly was starting to hurt.

         Millie was unaware that she was already going down to the naughty list for next year. Santa had also failed to mention (or most likely didn't tell the girl on purpose) that the further she got on the naughty list, the faster her pregnancy would speed up. There was a cap to the speed though as Santa again, wasn't Krampus. If she continued her rudeness, it would leave her due around a month instead of four or five months. She couldn't gain most of her pregnancy in a day but over a week she could.

         Currently though, her words had made her gain an extra two weeks, making her four weeks pregnant. Her belly though, was still catching up from all the comments she made. If she didn't be mean for a moment, she'd grow until she looked like she was six months pregnant with a human baby! As the eleven year old laid on her back, her pregnant middle was now becoming more distinct, looking to be three months along as it rounded out under her already tight shirt.
114321312.title: Millie scoffs and tell her sister she's fat.

114322.content: Felicity - 11 - Like her kindred dreamer, Rose, Felicity is a girl that also still believes in wishing on stars. What sets her apart from Rose, however, is that Felicity happens to wish for a slightly different creature than a puppy; Her very own horse! And not just *any* horse, but a mighty Clydesdale - The likes of which she saw on a school field trip and fell in love with. Now, as the weeks since her wish pass, she finds that her young body is swelling up to a prodigious size, for what is small right now is steadily growing within her belly, and will eventually turn into a fully 180-pound horse foal! Fortunately, the the power that enabled this seems aware of just what a chore carrying and birthing such a beast would entail for young Felicity, and the magic of the wish makes her belly much lighter than it should be (though still hefty) and her pregnancy progresses at a very advanced pace for an equine. Felice will birth her foal in a total of three months from the time of her wish.
114322.title: Another choice

choices: Felicity is very early in her pregnancy.
Felicity is at least a month or further in her pregnancy.
1143221.content:
Felicity had been unable to stop thinking about the mighty Clydesdale horse she had seen a month ago on a school field-trip to an apple farm. The way it moved, how big and strong it was - The eleven year old couldn't get enough of it! As she lay in her bed, the horse smitten kid imagined herself riding one. She'd brush their mane daily and give them all the sugar cubes they could wish for. She sighed and sat up in bed. Pulling her laptop from under her bed, Felly was glad she had watched her mother put in the password the other night.

         She watched horse videos for hours on end. By the time Felicity started to get tired it was already very late into the night. Thankfully it was the weekend but she still didn't want to be cranky when she got up the next morning. Shutting her laptop, Felice put it under the bed again and got out of bed to get a drink of water. In the kitchen the little girl drank her fill and looked out of the window over the sink.

         "There's a shooting star?!" She said in a shocked whisper. "I have to make a wish, I have to!" The girl set the cup down and folded her hands together, eyes squeezing shut. She focused on the star and the powers it held in wish granting and made her wish. She was going to get her own Clydesdale and very soon at that.
1143221.title: Felicity and her Foal

choices: They were going to the doctors.
They were going home so Fel could rest.
11432211.content:
Felicity groaned as she sat in the back of the car. Her parents had to pick her up from school as she had been terribly sick. Her belly felt really off and it made her insides twist around in knots and lurch suddenly throughout the past few mornings. As her mom drove the car, Felly closed her eyes and took deep breaths. She could feel the bile beginning to bubble up in her stomach and she whimpered. She was going to be sick again, she just knew it.

         "Mommy..." The little girl croaked. There was no answer. "I'm gonna be sick again!" She cried suddenly.

         Her mother slammed on the breaks and the girl leaned out of the car to throw up. When she was done, the car ride resumed. Her mother told her she should try to sleep but Felicity didn't want to. What if she woke up and didn't get to say she was going to be sick and did so all over the car? She sniffled, unsure of what to do in this situation. Absentmindedly, Felice started rubbing large circles around her distended belly, calming her insides down a little bit.
11432211.title: Felicity is very early in her pregnancy.

choices: Felicity's father doesn't give her the second shot.
Felicity's father gives her another shot. (More foals!)
114322112.content:
It wasn't very long until the mother and daughter duo made it home. Felicity was brought up to her room and put to bed, a bucket at her bedside in case she was sick again. Her mother was very worried, wondering what exactly was wrong with her little girl. She had called into the school and asked if Felly could miss monday as she was still sick and they assured the worried woman that it was fine. When her husband came home, she rushed over to him.
         "Oh Honey!" She cried. "Felly is still getting sick. Please won't you take a look at her? I don't care what you have to do, just please make sure she'll be okay."
         The man put a hand to his salt and pepper colored beard. Rubbing his wife's back, he sighed. "I'll keep the lab coat on then." He muttered. Secretly though, he smiled. The parents talked for a little while longer until Felicity was woken up by a knock at the door.
         The little girl crawled out of her bed and pulled the door open. Her father stood there, getting on his knees to look at his little girl. He asked if she wanted him to help her upset stomach and she nodded, still a bit tired. He patted her head and told her he'd come back in a few minutes with something to help and sure enough he did.
         By the time her daddy came back, Fel had went back onto her bed to lay down. Her father shooed her mother away, telling her not to worry. After she was gone, he flicked on the bedroom light and pulled the covers away from his daughter. He ran a hand through his hair and gently moved the child's shirt up to expose her little belly bloat.
         "Well, I see you're a bit pale Felly." He said, gently pressing into her tummy to feel around. He pulled out a syringe and a vial. "There's going to be a little pinch right here-" He poked below her shallow navel. "And it won't be very long alright? It'll be okay, it's kind of like getting a shot and this will help your upset tummy."
         The child nodded. She knew her father was a doctor and she knew he would help her get over her sickness. Little did Felicity know, her dad knew she was pregnant. What he was going to give her was going to help ease her morning sickness and then, he would have to decide on if he was going to try and give her another shot. One that would make his daughter have even more babies. The best part? He didn't even know she was going to be having a foal instead of his grandchild.
114322112.title: They were going home so Fel could rest.

choices: Fel's father only put a little in amount. (Twin foals)
Fel's father put in a good amount. (Big triplet foals)
Fel's father messes up big time! (Quintuplet foals)
1143221122.content:
After the first pinch, Fel rubbed her belly. She didn't really like needles but, she didn't complain as the pinch was worth getting rid of her upset stomach. As she went to pull down her pink shirt, her father stopped her. She looked at him curiously and saw he had another needle, this one longer than the last one.
         "Daddy?" Fel called out. "Why do you have another needle? You said I would only have to get one shot." She pouted. She pulled her shirt back up, knowing better than to argue with her father.
         "I have another needle because..." He had to think fast! "I have another because this one will prevent future morning sickne- Future vomiting." He mentally patted himself on the back. That was a close call for sure.
         Without another thought, the man stuck the needle into Fel's lower belly and started to put the mixture inside of her, right into the little girl's womb to be exact. He had to pay attention to how much he gave his daughter as if he gave too much, she could end up with too many babies to handle, even with his medical knowledge and equipment. Even so, he had been monitoring Felly and knew she could handle a baby or two. He had been the one who had been giving her supplements in the meals he cooked so she would be able to have a baby for him when she was ready. Of course, when she started getting symptoms, he thought he had messed something up with the supplements but, he hadn't.
         The doctor had figured out his daughter must have either come in contact with another male (Who he would kill if he found.) Or, she was like the virgin Mary, which would be a breakthrough in science and surely make him famous when he figured out how she managed to wind up pregnant at such a tender age without any outside interference. With a deep breath, the salt and pepper bearded father snapped out of his thoughts and looked at the syringe to see how much of the mixture he had put into his little girl's belly.
1143221122.title: Felicity's father gives her even more foals!

choices: The next day, Felly is forced to attend school.
More tests on Fel and her unborn foals.
11432211223.content:
The syringe was empty. He had been so lost in his thoughts on being a world renown scientist that he had put the whole concoction into his daughter's belly. He started to sweat, pulling out the needle and swallowing hard. He pulled his daughter's shirt down and stood up, a hand scratching at his beard as he chewed the inside of his mouth.
         He knew he made a really big mistake. He put the needle away and looked at his daughter who had passed out, obviously tired. There wasn't much he could do now but wait to see what would happen to her and hope his wife wouldn't hit him upside the the head for making such a horrible mistake. He took a deep breath and walked to the bedroom door, shutting off the light before he too went to bed.

Week 2

         Felicity had been excused from school for the rest of the week thanks to her father giving the school a doctor's note. She didn't know what was going on with her belly but as she rubbed the gentle swell of her distended midsection, she couldn't help but dread what was going to happen.
         following her dad into a room, Fel was put on a table, shivering at how cold it was. Her dad slid her shirt up below her small but slightly there bust and took a deep breath. Felicity's belly looked like she was sporting a twenty-one week pregnant belly already. There was a "spluurt" and Felly let out a squeak. Her dad had put a clear gel on her belly and now had a weird device on her tummy, pressing it lightly into her belly as he looked at a screen.
         "What the hell...?" He muttered. The longer he looked, the more he began to move the doppler over his daughter's belly. "There's one... Two? Three, and there's a fourth one right there. Wait, there's a fifth one hiding right behind the second one! There's Five babies inside of you Felly." There was a pause as the salt and pepper bearded man took in the new information. He smacked his lips and looked at the monitor again before he nodded, pursing his lips. "You're having FIVE?!" Felly watched as her father looked at her in a panic. "Fel baby. Don't panic. It's going to be alright. Don't tell anyone, don't worry about it. Daddy will take care of you." He said as he helped her off the bench.
         Felicity was told to keep her shirt up and her dad took a few pictures before she was told to let go of her shirt. Before she let go, she cleaned off her rounding tummy and then there were more pictures being taken once her shirt was down. Felly asked her dad why he was panicking and then asked him why he was taking so many pictures before she asked why she had been growing only at her belly. He licked his lips and explained to her only what she needed to know. With a tilt of her head, she tried to take it all in.
         So, she was pregnant. Well, more than pregnant because she had more than one bundle of joy inside of her. Heck ,she had more then three of them! She was going to have five babies and her father told her that her twenty-one week looking tummy was very small in comparison to how big he expected her to get by the time she had her little ones. He was taking the pictures so she could see how much bigger she was after each session of taking pictures. She thought that was alright and was curious to see her size after each week too.
         He looked down at his little girl and watched as she rubbed her pregnant belly, unaware of just how serious the situation was now that she was fully confirmed to be pregnant. The doctor still didn't know that his daughter had made a wish to have her own Clydesdale. Now, because he hadn't paid attention a week ago, he had given her four extra foals as well and she was going to only be pregnant for a little over two more months. Felicity was in for a fast ride as her quints grow bigger and bigger inside of her small body. Her pregnancy will end up being one for the records when she give birth and her dad was certain of it.
11432211223.title: Fel's father accidentally uses the whole syringe.

choices: Felicity decides to play dress up!
Fel watches horse videos and pregnancy videos.
114322112231.content:
Felicity was woken up as the light in her bedroom was turned on. She let out a groan and pulled one of the pillows from behind her head over her eyes to shield herself from the light. It had been a week since she was told by her father that she was going to be having quintuplets and with the quints being horses, Felly's tummy was growing quickly. Her blanket was already being pushed up quite a bit from how big she was getting.

         "Fel? It's time to get up. Your father wants to check on you again." The little girl's mother said as she left the door and the light on as she left.

         She let out a long groan. Her dad had been checking on her constantly. He let her sleep and play with her dolls when she wanted but, it seemed like he always got her up early. Looking at her bedside clock, she found out it was two in the afternoon. With a grumble, Felicity got out of bed and pushed at her spine to stretch. Her pregnant tummy looked a lot bigger as she walked over to her long, full body mirror that her mom had gotten her yesterday after she caught her daughter trying to see her rounding bump in the bathroom mirror.

         Funnily enough, Felicity had on a pair of horse print pajamas, the waistband not even on her belly and the buttons were undone to show off just how big she was already. She got her phone and looked up "Pregnant with quints, three weeks." When she found nothing to compare to, she pouted. Before she started a temper tantrum however, there was a knock at her door.

         "Felly honey? It's daddy." The little girl told her dad he could come in and he just smiled, watching her study herself in the mirror, turning this way and that. She asked if he could tell her how pregnant she looked and he gulped. She was quite the curious little thing wasn't she? "W-Well... That's an interesting question sweetie. Come here and let daddy look at you."

         Fel did as she was directed to do and stood in front of her dad who was sitting on her bed now, hands on his knees. Her face lit up as he praised her, telling her she already looked close to having a normal baby. The man told her she looked thirty four weeks to be exact. As her father pulled out a camera, she sighed, patting her large belly as she went and put on her "Bump Progression" outfit. It consisted of an easy to pull up blue tank top and gray sweatpants. After the initial pictures she had her daddy take a few more of her in her pajamas and then he gave her a pat on the head before he left the room, muttering the whole way out.

         Once the salt and pepper bearded doctor was gone, the pregnant girl looked over at her desk. Her pink computer at full charge. Upon seeing that, she thought about watching videos but was interrupted when she saw herself in the mirror again. Felicity bit her lip. She kind of wanted to play dress up too. Watch videos or try on clothes. The eleven year old couldn't really decide and she pouted, lip coming out as she crossed her arms under her non-existent chest. She sat down right where she was, tummy in her lap as she debated on what to do for a few hours before she went back to bed.

11432221.content:
"Sire... we must at least consider it." King Relnis's advisor said gently.

"Never! The king wed a commoner? That would just anger our god more. It's said clearly in the texts that his children may not have a drop of common blood!" Another piped up angrily, slamming his hand on the table as the king listened with a frown.

"And no noble will wed his daughter to a nation in peril. Even the nobles of our kingsdom are marrying their daughters for other kingdoms whenever possible." The first snapped back before a third pushed to his feet and cleared his throat. The other two settled immediately as the oldest man stroked his white beard.

"Sire. There is another possibility that these dolts have not considered. You have a daughter. Little princess Eliza. The high priests have sorcery that could cause her to bear your children without you laying a finger on her. Perhaps there is another way that this can be solved." King Relnis licked his lips an nodded.

"Yes. Eliza. She will-"

cause her to bear many children at once.

I would like her first pregnancy to be free of worries."

"For my health?" She echoed, looking up through her long lashes with innocent eyes.

"Yes." The adviser said kindly, giving her an encouraging smile and not disclosing that the potion would...

114322211121.content:
The adviser encouraging the young princess, knew the dire straights that the kingdom was in and how they desperately needed to please their god, so had gone behind the king's back to make sure the young girl would bear his children as quickly as she could. It would be mere days before the girl gave birth.

"Please drink, my lady. You need strength in these times of trouble." Princess Eliza nodded and drank the whole vial quickly, making a disgusted sound once she had swallowed it all. "Oh, none of that, my lady. It can't have been so horrible."

"It was." The princess protested, handing the vial back and getting to her feet.

"As you wish." The adviser chuckled before seeing the girl off to her room so her maids could help her ready for bed as the potion worked to make her pregnancy take root. He then hurried off to see that other preparations were made for what was to come.


When Eliza awoke in the morning
114322211121.title: mere days

choices: It fits, but the fit is quite snug in the middle
It cannot be laced. A maternity gown is already needed.
1143222111212.content:
Eliza woke and did not initially notice the way that her body had changed. Her loose sleeping shift hid the changes from her as she got up and relieved herself as she normally did in the morning. She looked out the window as saw the knights training in the yard before moving to get ready for the day. She rang the bell to call for her maids to help her dress so that she would be able to go and have breakfast as she was actually feeling quite hungry this morning, which was rare for her.

"Good morning, my lady." A maid said cheerily as she entered the room with a box in her arms.

"Good morning, Miriam." Eliza chirped from where she was brushing out her long gold locks at her vanity, not seeing the box that had been brought in her distraction. "I'd like to wear my blue dress this morning." Miriam nodded and went to the wardrobe, quickly placing the dresses that had been made overnight in for when they would be needed. All the staff had been quietly informed of the truth of what was to come for Eliza, and were to do all they could to make it easy for her. That had included the quick creation of maternity dresses. Miriam pulled out the desired dress and glanced over at the princess. Well, the girl seemed no more pregnant than she had the day before, so there was no reason to try and place her in maternity wear right away. She laid the dress out on the bed and went to help Eliza to place her hair in intricate braids before moving to help her dress.

Once the sleeping shift was laid aside, Miriam was able to see that the young princess was indeed with child, though it was not by much. The young girl was just thicker in the middle really, a small curve of a 12 week pregnancy poking out on her slender body. Miriam made sure to say nothing, though, helping Eliza to step into her dress and starting to lace up the back, praying it would fit.
1143222111212.title: Her belly was more plump...

11432221112122.content:
Miriam frowned as she tugged at the laces to close the princess's dress, the girl making soft sounds of protest. "You must be growing, my lady." Miriam said playfully. "Good think new dresses were ordered for you. Only to be expected of a growing princess." She said before tying the laces shut.

"Yes." Eliza got out, though she seemed a little breathless. It was no wonder, the laces were at their limit, the girl's pregnancy making her nearly too large in the middle for her usual dress, and the chest of the gown seeming to be just a touch more full as well, even the skirt was falling differently thanks to her widening hips as she became more motherly.

"Would you like to wear something else, my lady. It does seem a bit tight..."

"No. I will be fine. Thank you Miriam." Eliza got out, touching her sides as she got her breath. She gave her maid a nod before starting out of her room and down to breakfast.

If Princess Eliza had been paying any mind, she would have seen the curious glances that the staff was giving her, but she was more focused on how tight her gown felt. She touched her stomach as she breathed, not realizing the slight change in her figure since she was not looking for it like the rest of the palace.

She ate her meal quickly, giving her father a kiss on the cheek and hiding her discomfort before heading off to her lessons with her tutor. The man said nothing either, but instructed the princess carefully on what the duties of a mother were to her child. It was different to their usual lessons, but would be vital for the girl int he coming days, especially if she would be spending her days caring for children instead of lessons in the future.

Eliza felt it harder and harder to breathe as she was taught, her focus waning when her tutor spoke of the signs a woman was to become a mother. her dress felt tighter and tighter as the lesson wore on through the day until -
11432221112122.title: It fits, but the fit is quite snug in the middle

choices: Eliza is dressed in a maternity dress
Eliza insists on still wearing her old dresses
Eliza asks to have dinner brought to her room so she can just eat and go to bed.
114322211121221.content:
Eliza could hear the strained stitching of her dress creaking with each of her breaths. It was so distracting that it was nearly unbearable. Then, it stopped with a bang as the lacing that held her dress shut snapped with a loud pop. The tutor jumped in the middle of describing how mothers fed their children as Eliza was suddenly able to breathe easy again. She grabbed the fabric of her dress at the front and held it to herself though, cheeks red.

"No need to be embarrassed, my lady. All part of growing up." The tutor said cheerily as the went to the door and called for some help. Miriam was at the princess's side a moment later.

"Oh, I knew it was too tight. I'm sorry, my lady. I should have insisted. Let's get you changed for supper..." Eliza was to embarrassed for words, her face utterly red as she let herself be guided back to her chambers. Miriam was quick to help the younger girl out of her dress, hiding her shock at the sight of the 16 week pregnant belly the young princess sported.

"Now let's get you ready..."
114322211121221.title: The laces snap!

choices: Something wakes Eliza in the night
1143222111212213.content:
"No. I'd like to take my supper in my chambers tonight." Eliza said softly, fetching her sleeping shift from where it was laid on the bed and tugging it on instead of allowing herself to be dressed in another gown. "I just want to eat and go to bed. I'm not feeling well." She explained. Miriam's eyes flickered down to where the girl's baby bump was starting to press at the fabric of the loose shift and nodded.

"As you wish, my lady." She assured before ducking out of the room.

Eliza ate her supper quietly and quickly before climbing into bed and curling up tight under her blankets. It was all so embarrassing. She had been told this was normal for a girl her age, to have some changes in her body. But to bust out of her dress like that? She buried her face in the pillow with a heavy sigh.
1143222111212213.title: Eliza asks to have dinner brought to her room s...

choices: Eliza didn't know she was pregnant with her father's triplets.
Eliza had no clue she had been impregnated with her father's quintuplets.
Eliza didn't know she was was carrying more than five of her siblings at once!
1143222111213.content:
The ten year old was greeted with a round sphere coming from her blanket. She bit the inside of her cheek and tried to push it off but said "Uh oh." when she noticed it felt like it was on top of her! Tossing the blanket aside, Eliza saw her night shirt pushed up, barely on her swollen tummy after the blanket was tossed off of her. She called for a servant who quickly came in, covering their mouth.

         The sight before them was quite interesting to say the least. The king's daughter already looked five or six months pregnant and because she was so small, it showed up on her easily. It was like someone cut a sphere and then slimmed the sides of it down to fit on her. Obviously they had given the poor girl more than one child. More than one of her father's children, her siblings they should think.

         Going over to her, the servant tilted their head, looking at Eliza even closer. "Does it hurt?" They asked in a whisper.

         "N-No..." The girl replied, a hand on her swollen belly. It felt terribly squishy if she was honest. When Eliza pressed into it however, she groaned.

         "Here, I think I should let you rest some more. Please call if you need anything else." With that, the servant was gone.

         Carefully, the young girl got out of bed and walked over to a full sized mirror. Her tummy shifted as she did this and she took a deep breath. Her shirt showed a bump but it didn't look too obvious. Was she sick? Bloated from dinner last night? Maybe she just had to go to the bathroom. Lifting up her pajama top, Eliza stared in wonder at herself. Her belly really looked puffed out now that she saw it directly. She pursed her lips and pushed, face going red as her little tummy bulged out even more from her for a few seconds. She gasped, taking a breath as it returned to it's five months or so size. The little girl gave the gentle swell the most tender caress in the world, sending goosebumps up her arms.

         "I think I just need to go back to sleep." The child murmured, letting her shirt fall. With a heavy sigh Eliza went back to her bed, crawling on her hands and knees to her pillows before she spun around and flopped onto her back. She slid into her heavy blanket and turned on her side, slipping back into sleep for a few extra hours.
1143222111213.title: Her belly had grown quite round with children.
