11432222.content: Haley Frewas (11) - Haley is a blonde haired girl who has recently found out she is expecting. With a little bit of encouragement from her friend Emelia or 'Emmy' for short, Haley has decided to start a pregnancy blog. You'll start the story with her first entry at 2 weeks along.
11432222.title: Someone else

choices: Next week. (Choose what Haley is going to have.)
114322221.content:
"Is it on?" Haley asked, her soft face looking somewhere beyond the camera lens. A voice came back and said that the camera was definitely on and recording right then.The girl gasped and faced the device with her arms folded in her lap. "H-Hello there everyone." Haley said nervously. "My name is Haley. I was convinced today by my friend Emelia to start recording myself because I'm... I'm going to be having a baby."

         When Haley finished speaking, she stood up and pinned her luscious blonde locks behind her ears before she turned to the side, Emelia directing her to do so from behind the camera. The girl pulled her shirt tight over her belly and then looked shyly to her friend. "Do I have to do that too?" She asked. With a grumble, Haley bunched up her shirt and revealed her flat belly before she turned to show the front. "As you can see, I'm not really showing right now but that's because I haven't even been pregnant for a month. I will be by next week though. Well, then... I guess that'll be it for my first vlog. Bye now!" The girl said quickly, a tiny bit of embarrassment on her face at the end.

--

         Once the camera was off, both girls hugged, Emelia thanking her friend for letting her record the journey. Haley said it wasn't that much of a problem but her red headed friend knew she was lying. Sitting on her friend's bed, Emmy frowned.

         "Haley, I know you're pretty uncomfortable about letting me record you but think about it like this. If you record it, you have proof that you were pregnant with whatever your pregnant with." Emelia said with a smile. "Regardless of what it is, You're going to be a mommy soon. I heard my parents talking to your parents about it."

         The blonde only sighed at her friend. Emmy hadn't lied to her yet in the 11 years she had known the girl so why would she lie about this? All of her symptoms matched up with being pregnant too so she supposed she shouldn't even doubt what her friend was telling her. She smiled, patting her flat belly. 'If Emeila is right, I'll really be a mommy to a baby soon.' Haley thought. It was at that moment that the young blonde began to think about what kind of baby she could be having. Maybe by the next vlog she would know just what she was going to be giving birth to in the weeks and months to come.
114322221.title: It's time to set up the camera!

choices: Haley will be having a human baby.
Haley figures she's going to be having something else.
1143222211.content: A week has passed since Haley made her first vlog and announced her pregnancy. In that time frame, she has been constantly thinking about what kind of baby she's going to be growing in her belly. Thanks to constantly thinking of what that baby could be, Haley has indeed become pregnant with that baby! Before the camera is turned back on, decide what the girl will be pregnant with and if it applies, how many babies she'll be having.
1143222211.title: What kind of baby(or babies),will Haley be having?

choices: My Parents Did Something to Me
11432222111.content:
"Now?" Haley asked. "Okay. Hi, everyone. I'm Haley, and this is my pregnancy vlog." She stood up and, with some prodding from Emilia, lifted her shirt to show her flat tummy.

"No different from last week. It takes a baby a while to grow big enough to show. But my doctor told me about some visual aids I can use." She picked up a hamburger from the table next to her. "This is a sesame seed bun. Everybody, pick a sesame seed and look at it. Got one? Okay, that's how big my baby is at six weeks." She put the burger down. "Even though I'm small for a mommy-to-be, I'm still too big for that little bitty baby to make a bump. But don't worry: in the weeks ahead, this baby, and I, will get much bigger.

"Now, let's answer some of your questions:

"A lot of you asked, 'Are you really pregnant?' Yes, I am.

"Plenty of you wanted to know: 'How are your folks dealing with this?' Um, they're very supportive. They're a big help with this vlog behind the scenes, in addition to all the doctor's appointments and shopping in the months ahead.

"A bunch of you asked: 'What first made you think you might be pregnant?' Well, I've been throwing up a lot, but just first thing in the morning. Mom gives me a cup of tea and a cracker to settle my stomach, and, after that, I'm like crazy hungry. I told my BFF, Emilia - that's her filming this. Say hi, Emmy."

"Hi," said a voice from off-screen.

"Anyway," Haley said, "I told Emmy what I was feeling, and she said it sounded like the way her big sister's best friend felt, when she found out that she was pregnant. So I told my folks about it, they took me to the doctor's, and here we are.

"Now comes the big question on everybody's lips: 'How did you get pregnant?' Well, not the normal way, that's for sure. In fact, I got pregnant because... "
11432222111.title: Haley will be having a human baby.

114322221113.content:
"I got pregnant because of a mix-up," Haley said. "You see, my mom was trying to get pregnant by in vitro fertilization, and I went in for what was supposed to be a routine pelvic exam. I don't know all the details. I just know we don't go to that doctor anymore, and I'm having what was supposed to be my baby brother or sister. Once we found out, Mom and Dad asked me what I wanted to do after the baby was born. I asked if I could have it, since I was going to be carrying it and all. They agreed, and they'll try again later, after I become a mommy.

"Well, that's about all the time we have this week. Come back next week for Week 7, where we'll have a different visual aid and more information. Keep the responses and questions coming. I'll answer the most common questions, and also the most interesting questions that only some of you ask me. 'Bye."

Emmy turned off the camera. "That was great, Haley," she said. "You are so lucky to be having this baby."

"Thanks, Emmy. Can you do me a favor?"

"Name it."

"Move out of the way. I pee like crazy because of the baby."
114322221113.title: There Was a Mix-Up

1143222211132.content:
By Week 12, the production was more polished. Haley no longer had to ask if the camera was on. "Hey, everyone. Welcome to Haley's Pregnancy Vlog. I'm Haley. And this is Week 12 of my pregnancy." She pulled her T-shirt tight over her belly, and, with just a little encouragement, lifted her shirt just enough to show her belly. "We've got a definite bump happening. My doctor says it's because I'm so small, compared to other moms. And, for the fourth time, no, I won't show off how big my breasts are. Perverts."

She sat down and picked up a plum off the table. "This is a plum. That's about how big my baby is now. So no wonder I've got a bump, right?" She put the plum back on the table. "My morning sickness is better. My doctor says that my womb is taking over feeding the baby, so that's why I've stopped throwing up.

"I'm looking forward to what's ahead of me, when it comes to this pregnancy. Getting big enough for maternity clothes. Feeling it move for the first time. Childbirth classes. That's right, I'm actually looking forward to going to classes. And, of course, I'm looking forward to holding this baby in my arms. Hopefully, you're all looking forward to all those things, too, even if that last one means the end of my vlog.

"Well, we're about out of time. Thanks for watching, and I'll see you next time."
1143222211132.title: Week 12

11432222111321.content:
Haley was now obviously pregnant, with a belly that stuck out as far as her breasts did. Only her face and hands indicated that she was still a child herself. "Welcome to Week 16 of Haley's Pregnancy Vlog," she said. She grabbed the hem of her top and, with a look offscreen to Emilia, lifted it to expose her belly. "Pretty big, huh? And just think: I'm not even halfway through this."

Pulling her top back down again, she sat down and picked up the week's visual aid. "My baby's the size of this avocado. Amazing that, in 16 weeks, it's grown to this from two cells becoming one. You folks do know where babies come from, right? Even if this one made a side trip." She put the avocado down.

"My doctor says that the second trimester is the easiest. Well, it seems easy so far. The biggest challenge is finding maternity clothes in my size. Not a whole lot of pregnant middle schoolers out there, y'know?

"This week, I had an... " She studied a paper. "Am-ni-o-cent-e-sis. It's where they stick a needle in your belly and take out some of the fluid surrounding the baby. It hurts a lot - so much that I stayed home from school after it was done - but I'm glad I did it, because the tests showed that my baby is perfectly healthy.

"Well, Emilia's telling me that it's time to go. I'll be back next week with more about my baby. See you then. 'Bye."
11432222111321.title: Week 16

114322221113211.content:
Haley was sitting down when the vlog entry began. "Welcome to Week 20 of Haley's Pregnancy Vlog. We're at the halfway point, you and I. I hope you don't mind that I'm sitting. I was just so comfy that I didn't want to stand back up." She lifted her shirt to show her belly. "Pretty big, huh? I never thought I could get so big. And I'm only half done."

She put her shirt back down and picked up the week's visual aid. "This is an artichoke. That's how big baby is now." She put it back down.

"I can't tell you how much I love this. Not just the baby, or the vlog. I... I really love being pregnant. I could do without some of the reactions I get - and believe me, I know how young a mother I'm going to be - but, with other mothers, they see me, and they know. Instead of feeding me negativity, they ask me how I'm doing, and they give me the benefit of their experience. I'm on a journey they've been on before, and they don't want me to miss the landscape along the - " She gasped and put her hands on her belly.

"Haley?" called Emilia from behind the camera. "What is it? What's wrong?"

Haley shook her head, a smile joining the expression of wonderment on her face. "It moved," she whispered. Then, going back to her normal speaking voice, "The baby moved."

Emilia ran into the shot and hugged her best friend, as closely as Haley's pregnant belly would allow.

"Let's wrap this up," Haley said, "so I can tell Mom and Dad." Turning to the camera, she said, "Thanks for watching. I'll be back next week with more. See you then. 'Bye."
114322221113211.title: Week 20

1143222211132111.content:
"Hi," Haley said, "and welcome to Week 24 of Haley's Pregnancy Vlog." Without the slightest hesitation, Haley lifted her shirt to show how big her belly had grown. "Isn't that amazing? It's weird not seeing my feet, but I love that there's a little person growing inside me. Just a few more months to go."

She put her shirt back down, sat down, and picked up the visual aid. "Baby's grown to the size of this cantaloupe. All the parts are there, but baby isn't ready to use them yet. Technically, baby will be full term at 37 weeks, but most mommies carry their babies for 40 weeks." She let out a breath. "Makes me tired just thinking about it

"I can't believe how much the vlog has taken off. I mean, I've got viewers all over the world, and three TV shows have talked to my folks about interviews. Who would have thought that so many people find little old me interesting?

"Some of you may be wondering, What's with all the stuff around me? Well, believe it or not, all these things were sent to me by viewers like you. I'd thank you individually, but some of your handles are extremely dirty, and I don't want baby to hear those words. Yeah, my baby can hear me, and I just love reading to my baby every night. Hopefully, baby remembers that better than the things I say when I get up to use the bathroom.

"Well, we're just about out of time. I'd like to thank you all for watching, and a special thank you to those who sent me baby gifts: I appreciate them, almost as much as I appreciate you. I'll be back next week with more. See you then."
1143222211132111.title: Week 24

11432222111321111.content:
Haley was seated when the camera came on. "Hi," she said, "and welcome to Week 28 of Haley's Pregnancy Vlog. In case you're wondering, I'll be sitting down for the rest of the vlog entries due to doctor's orders. Apparently, teenage mothers are at risk for miscarriage, so she doesn't want to take any chances with her 11-year-old patient. So she doesn't want me on my feet for too long. I've been moved into a bedroom on the ground floor. I can walk from my bed to a chair at the kitchen table, from there to the couch, from there to either the bathroom or out to the car. And, of course, my comfy chair. That's why the room behind me looks different."

She lifted her T-shirt to show, not only her belly, but her bra as well. "Baby's really getting big, with an estimated 12 weeks to go. And I'm wearing a nursing bra, now." She picked up a small flower-shaped pad. "My breasts are leaking, so I have to put these pads on to absorb the milk." She picked up the week's visual aid. "Baby's the size of this eggplant now.

"It's getting close now. The birthing classes are going well. The other moms in my class have just about gotten used to seeing a preteen in their midst. And I've done a couple of interviews." She began to cry. "It's so amazing that so many of you are that interested in me. I'm so touched."

Emilia came out from behind the camera to give Haley a tissue. "I think that'll do it for this week," the friend said. "Until next time."
11432222111321111.title: Week 28

114322221113211111.content:
"Hi," she said, "and welcome to Week 32 of Haley's Pregnancy Vlog." With no provocation, Haley lifted her T-shirt to show how much her belly had grown. "Pretty big, huh? And just think: I'll be even bigger when it's time for me to deliver."

She picked up her visual aid. "Baby's the size of this squash. Now, just picture this sitting on your bladder, and you'll know what I spend most of my time doing." She put the squash down. "It's also taking up more room than my lungs are used to. It's hard to take a full breath.

"Now, don't get me wrong. Just because I'm complaining doesn't mean I've come to regret my decision to have this baby. I'm still looking forward to being a mother. And, as the popularity of this vlog has taken off, I get so many mothers offering me advice for when I go into labor. As for kids my age, they're thrilled when they see me, and they ask if they can touch my belly."

She put a juice glass half-filled with water on her belly. "Watch this."

As the baby moved within her, the glass moved, too. "Pretty neat, huh? Just figured I'd do that, since you folks watching can't feel my belly through your computers.

"Well, that's about as much as my bladder can put up with, folks. I'd like to thank you all for watching, and I'll see you next time. 'Bye."
114322221113211111.title: Week 32

1143222211132111111.content:
"Hello again," Haley said, "and welcome to Week 36 of Haley's Pregnancy Vlog. Yep, we're into the home stretch now. And speaking of stretching,... " She lifted her top to show viewers her ripening mound. "My feet are still somewhere under my belly, but I have to take people's word for it." She pulled her shirt down again, but her belly still peeked out under it.

She presented the week's visual aid. "My baby's about the size of this honeydew melon. Big sucker, isn't it? And just think: it'll be even bigger before I give birth."

Setting the melon down, she went on. "I've got the nesting instinct now. For those of you who don't know what that is, I want to clean the whole house with a Q-Tip. Which is especially aggravating for me, because that's more time on my feet than my doctor will allow.

"Emilia threw me a baby shower this past week, and I'd like to take this opportunity to thank each and every one who came to the shower, and all of you viewers who sent me things. Thanks to you all, I think I'll be just about ready for this baby when it comes.

"Well, that's about all the time we have, so that brings to a close another installment of Haley's Pregnancy Vlog. Until next time."
1143222211132111111.title: Week 36

11432222111321111111.content:
The first word viewers heard was "Oof."

This was followed by the more conventional "Hello, and welcome to Week 37 of Haley's Pregnancy Vlog. Baby is now full term, which means I could give birth at any time, and baby would be fine. For that matter, so would I." Haley hiked up her shirt, which was almost unnecessary to show her belly. "Every week, I'm amazed that I've managed to get even bigger than I was the week before." Rubbing her belly, she didn't bother to pull her shirt back down again.

She picked up the visual aid. "Baby's about the size of this wintermelon. No, not watermelon, wintermelon. A watermelon would be even bigger, about the size of the baby when I'm due." Down went the visual aid.

"I don't mind telling you, folks, I'm not feeling particularly good today. I get these twinges in my lower back. They started about 3:00 this morning, and they keep coming. In fact, they've moved from my back to my belly." She winced as the pain returned, and clutched her belly. "If this keeps up, I'm going to call the doctor. Hopefully, this doesn't mean there's anything wrong. Oh, crud, I think I wet myself." Addressing her belly, she asked, "What did I do to you to deserve this?"

"Um, Haley," Emilia said from behind the camera, "that isn't pee."

"Huh? Well, what is it, then?"

"I think your water just broke."

Haley's eyes widened. "Oh, God." Calling offscreen, she said, "Mom, Dad, I think I'm in labor!" Turning back to the camera, she said, "That's it for this installment. Talk to you later."
11432222111321111111.title: Week 37 (Labor)

114322221113211111111.content:
The camera came on to show Haley in a hospital bed, sporting two black eyes, and carrying a small bundle in her arms. "Hi," Haley said, "and welcome to the last installment of Haley's Pregnancy Vlog. Can't really keep a pregnancy vlog going after you've had the baby, right? Don't worry about the black eyes, they're just from scrunching my face up when I was pushing."

Lifting her baby up, she said, "This is Jake, my brand-new baby boy. Isn't he incredible? I swear, I took one look at him, and I fell in love." Turning to the baby, she said. "I'm sorry for every bad thing I ever said about you, and I forgive you for everything you did to me. Please don't be mad about the things I said before, the doctor says that was just the pain talking."

The baby cooed.

"Hungry?" Haley asked. "Okay." She opened up her hospital gown, took out her breast, and began to nurse. "I've been getting pointers on this."

Emilia turned the camera away from the new mommy and her breastfeeding baby, toward her own face. "And, with that," she said, "we're out. Goodbye."
114322221113211111111.title: After Birth (The End)

Haley was looking at the camera with a timid look. She was really reluctant to make an update on her pregnancy even with Emelia's constant reassurance. She gave a high pitched whine, not wanting to speak either. Her friend muttered to herself before telling Haley to say hello.

         "H-Hello..." Haley whispered. Emmy told her to speak up and she gave another whine. "Hello!" She finally said. "I'm sorry if I'm so quiet. It's just, I don't know what to really say." Emelia sighed and asked Haley about her ultrasound the other day. "Well, according to the doctors, I'm going to have a very odd pregnancy." The camera girl asked what kind of pregnancy. "I-I was told I was going to have an elephant pregnancy."

         With that out of the way, Haley watched Emelia gesture that it was time to show her pregnant belly. The blonde took a deep breath and moved the pillow covering her expanding midsection out of the way. When she stood up, it was obvious something was under her shirt. There was a large sphere jutting out and straining the yellow top below Haley's chest line which hadn't grown yet and she cradled it as if it was a little weighted. Turning to her side, Haley made sure the shape of her belly could be seen better through the shirt and then, with a few words from Emelia again, she lifted up her shirt.

         Haley's pregnant belly was a bit pale and it looked like she had swallowed a junior medicine ball. If those watching had to guess, they thought Haley looked a little over thirty seven weeks pregnant with an actual baby and couldn't beleive she had went from not showing, to looking due in a week. After a few seconds passed, Haley covered her belly and quickly went back to sitting on her bed.

         "Before anyone asks. No. I-I didn't skip a few months for this video and I'm not tricking anyone." Haley rubbed her arm and then put her hands on her bump. "I really am three weeks pregnant. Elephant babies are supposedly really really big." She had a blush on her cheeks for a moment before it went away. "Okay I have some other things to do so I guess I'll see you in another week. B-Bye!"

Emeila turned off the recording and Haley let out a cry of relief. She was so embarrassed! She had read a few comments on her last video and a lot of them were rude. Emmy assured her that the majority of people were just skeptical and with time and updates, Haley would prove she was actually carrying elephants in her womb. It still didn't help the poor blonde though. She already was dreading her next pregnancy update and could only hope her best friend was right.

114322221122121113.content:
Haley huffed as Emelia turned on the camera. "Hello again everyone." The eleven year old said, giving a single wave to the camera lens. "Emelia and myself have looked up how big my tummy would be if I had been pregnant for two weeks but, nothing really tells me why mine is so big..." The blonde blushed a bit, rubbing her arm.
         The camera girl cleared her throat loud enough to be picked up on the camera and Haley jumped at the noise. She still didn't like doing this part even if she had been practicing in front of the mirror. With a small whine of protest, the pregnant girl turned to the side and pulled her green watermelon themed shirt tightly around her midsection.
         The few viewers Haley had were stunned to see how much bigger she had gotten within a week. Those who rushed comments called it a fake pregnancy and clicked off but those who stayed were left with open mouths as the girl slowly lifted her shirt up. She looked like she was much further along than two weeks, her flat belly now replaced with a round and very big bulge.
         One viewer commented "Dear Haley, I think you've missed quite a few weeks in your vlogs and mislabeled the video. You're huge now!"
Haley put a hand to the top of her belly and brought her hand over it until she cradled her bump with one hand, the other holding her shirt up. "So from what Emelia and I can tell, I look like I'm 25 weeks pregnant already. I know you might think I'm not two weeks pregnant but I swear I am. Honest!" The pregnant eleven year old stared at the camera until Emelia cut the recording.

A few minutes after the recording session.

         Sitting on the edge of the bed, Haley and Emelia were rubbing over the pregnant tum on Haley. They seemed mesmerized by it and without much else to do, the two children decided that Haley should lay on her back while Emelia took a few pictures. Emila had some things on her mind just as her plumping friend did but neither would speak about them while the pictures were being taken. Would the two end up talking or would they stay in thought and maybe talk after the next recording?

1143222211221211131.content:
Emelia's back was to the camera as the recording started. The red curls around her shoulders made it obvious it wasn't Haley at the beginning of the shot. She gave a gasp and slid off screen before making her way to the back of the camera. Haley on the other hand, was shaking her head at her BFF's mistake.

         "Well, with Emmy out of the shot- Hello everyone!" The blonde said. "Welcome to... Week three?" Haley questioned. Emelia's voice came from out of the frame to say that it was indeed week three. "Okay, yea. It's week three so that means it's my third week of pregnancy with my baby." Haley smiled and shook her shoulders a bit before calming down. "I can't wait to tell everyone this but first, let me show you all something."

         The pregnant eleven year old had Emelia pick up the camera and bring it towards her. On her princess Belle pillow were three watermelons. "Can you all guess why there's three watermelons on my bed?" Haley's voice asked. The camera stayed on the watermelons for a bit before quickly going back to the stand it was previously on. The pregnant girl put her hands to her belly and couldn't help but grin from ear to ear. "Still can't guess?" She teased.

         Haley took a deep breath and pushed herself to her feet. With a nod to Emmy, the girl turned to the side to show her pregnant swell to the camera. Haley's belly was so big, her shirt seemed to be able to show her flesh from below and still show off the side of her bump. She gave the side facing the camera a few quick pats before her small hand reached to the hem of her shirt and gripped the end. She closed her eyes and then pulled her shirt up with a visible grin on her face.

         The eleven year old's skin was clear of stretchmarks and her belly button appeared as a round ball at the end of her nearly forty-three week looking belly. Haley took a deep breath and exhaled, moving her hips from side to side as she stood there, obviously way more pleased with herself now than she had been last week. In total, she had been pregnant for only a month. Thirty days and that was all. She put a hand on her pregnant bump and gently rubbed it, eyes still closed as her cheeks formed a light blush on them.

         Emelia cleared her throat and Haley came back to reality, giggling adorably. "S-Sorry!" The little girl squeaked. "As I was going to say earlier though, I'm nice and pregnant as you can all tell." She licked her lips, hand rubbing over her skin to emphasize her fourty-three week looking midsection. "The reason why? Drumroll please... It's because there's three babies in my tummy right now!" She squealed and cradled the underside of her baby bump as she turned to face the camera, belly still on full display as she held her shirt up. From this angle, everyone could see just how big the child's belly button had gotten too. It was a round sphere at the head of Haley's big fertile swell of alien life.

         "Okay well. I guess that's enough tum for everyone. Have a good week without us. Buh-bye now!" The screen cut off just before Haley fell backwards onto her bed. Her whole attitude about her condition had changed enough to cause a mild bout of concern in her fans but very few of them had commented their concerns.
1143222211221211131.title: Week 3 of Haley's alien pregnancy.

choices: Emelia joins Haley's pregnancy vlogs at 2 weeks along?!
11432222112212111313.content:
Haley's viewers were confused. On their feed, there was a video called "Not an Update..." When they clicked it, they were greeted with the young mother sitting on her bed, fingers clasped together as she bit her cheek. Something sure seemed wrong but what could it have been?

         "Hello everyone." Haley began. "So, you're probably wondering why I've got a new video up in two days instead of a week." The eleven year old sighed. "I've read the comments from a select few of you. No, this isn't to bring them to light. This is also not an update to my pregnancy updates. This is actually a special video."

         After she finished speaking, Haley reached behind her and pulled a bottle into view. She put it on the top of her covered tummy, turning it so the label could be seen. As it turned out, Haley had made this video to show everyone how she kept her skin so clear despite how fast she was stretching.

         "Emmy suggested I make this video too. Let's call it a very special video okay? I'll be rubbing some oil on my big tummy so you can all see just how much care goes into it and in turn, the babies inside." Haley gave a small smile at this. "Rubbing this stuff on my skin makes it look really good and it gives my three babies more room to grow because it makes my belly nice and stretchy!"

         The girl had a big smile and she giggled. Obviously she was quite excited to do this in front of the camera. Without hesitation, Haley slipped off of her bed, stumbling a bit from just how big her belly was. Em adjusted the camera to show the pregnant girl as her shirt was pulled up. She stood on her tippy toes, the side of her large tum on display.

         Haley looked like she was forty six weeks pregnant. That meant she went from a nine month belly to a ten and a half belly in the course of two days. The little aliens inside were sure using their mother's stretchy skin to their advantage! There was a 'Spluurt' and then Haley closed the bottle of oil.

         "So. This stuff is more like a goopy oil but, I love it a lot." The overdue looking mommy said, beginning to rub the stuff in. "It's weird because, Emmy told me this stuff appeared at her door two weeks ago and she knew it had to of been for me." The child moaned, her finger tips just barely grazing her popped navel.

         There came a point where Haley applied more of her goop-oil on her large bump and she squealed. She really enjoyed doing this. Anyone would be able to see that in her eyes as she went from looking at her distended middle, to the camera, and then back to her bump. Eventually though, The young blonde couldn't keep herself from cooing and moaning at the sensation. She eventually turned to fully face the camera, biting her lip as she tried to reach her belly button. She couldn't and even though she bent over a bit, she still couldn't reach it.

         As with all videos, they had to come to an end. Luckily for the viewers, Haley had moved onto her bed, her ten and a half tummy in her lap as she continued to rub her shiny tummy. She licked her lips and let out a long breath before tossing her head back, smirking.

         "Oooh-kaaay..." Haley said. "I guess that'll be bit for the special video everyone. I'm gonna let this stuff sink into my skin and apply the second layer off camera. I hope everyone enjoyed! Next video will be on time I promise. Bye bye for now everyone." Haley said, wiggling her fingers before she hugged her massively swollen, alien filled tummy.

         Her ice blue eyes glistened with happiness as the video ended with her staring up at her viewers, still hugging her baby bump. More than a few of her followers were excited for the next update. Some of them were glad Haley was embracing her pregnancy and were very happy she was so open about it. Others however had already started placing bets on just how big the young mother was going to be in five days on the next installment of the series.
11432222112212111313.title: Haley rubs oil on her three week and two day tummy

Week 8 and week 6 of Haley and Emelia's alien pregnancies.
Week 12 and week 10 of Haley and Emelia's alien pregnancies.
114322221122121113132.content:
As the video came on, Emmy had her back to the camera yet again. This time however, Haley was in the shot as well and Emelia wasn't moving from where she was sitting beside her blonde friend. After the oil rubbing video, it seemed like this video was going to have some twist even if it was an update vid.

         "Hellooo!" Haley said, waving at the camera. The eleven year old smiled, tugging her black tank top further onto her belly. "Emmy, say Hi too." The little girl commanded.

         "Hi everyone." The red head said with a giggle.

         "So you're all probably wondering what's going on." Haley said, grumbling as she tried to adjust her top over her newly grown breasts. They were nearing an A-Cup but weren't quite there yet. Even so, her shirt was already stretched tight by her pregnancy so adding a pair of budding breasts made Haley’s black top even more uncomfortable. "As it turns out, Emeila here lied to me and in turn I lied to all of you." The child nudged her friend and the girl turned around with the biggest smile in the world.

         Emelia’s belly was clearly swollen out as the viewers felt their jaws drop. There were two pregnant eleven year olds in the same vlog now?! As Emmy sat there, she fluttered her eyes and rubbed over the top of her belly. Clearly she was enjoying this a lot more than the original owner of the vlog.

         “Okay okay. Enough Em.” Haley said with a light laugh. “Emmy actually just turned eleven about… three months ago right?” The girl nodded with a smile. “And so, yes. We are both going to be having babies. At eleven years old. Oh and did I mention-”

         “I’m having alien babies too everyone!” Emilia blurted out, laughing joyfully as her blonde friend rolled her eyes.

         “Yea. Turns out, that oil I rubbed all over my tummy a few days ago and so far until what? Yesterday?” She looked to Emeila who nodded. “It was meant to be for Emmy here because she’s actually expecting double the amount of babies I am. I’m sooo jealous!”

         With that out of the way, Haley and Emelia tried to shuffle off of the bed, the blonde needing help to get onto her feet. They both raised their shirts up together and Haley smiled while Emmy smirked. As the duo turned to their sides, they had their backs to one another, bellies bulging out from their small bodies. The red head even put a hand to her back and pushed her tummy out even more, obviously trying to tease those who were watching the vlogs.

         The viewers had a hard time determining who looked more stunning. While Haley had grown even more, Emelia had obviously been hiding her pregnancy very well. The original mommy had a round, bowling ball shaped belly, looking like she had been pregnant for a whole entire year. The newer mommy seemed to have a large curve to her tum but it didn’t bulge out on the sides like her friend’s belly did.

         In terms of weeks, Haley looked fifty three weeks along while Emelia looked thirty two weeks along. No one watching knew that both girls would be expecting to deliver by their fourth months. They were too busy watching Haley’s popped out belly button press into Emmy’s gentle nub at the front of her swollen mound. The young girls had their hands locked together and were trying to get as close to one another as they could. After a few grunts and encouraging words to try a bit harder, they gave up, bellies expanding back to normal as they decided enough was enough for the vlog.

         Emelia and Haley rubbed over their fertile swells while Emmy explained that at some point, she was gonna pass Haley’s size. The red headed girl looked so smug when she said it too! As it was time to end the video for sure now, Haley blew a kiss at the camera and Em pushed out her tummy one last time before the vlog stopped.

11432222112212212.content:
"H-Hi everyone!" Haley stuttered out when she found herself in front of the camera a week after she first had been. "Hope everything's going well for all of you out there! I guess I should answer some of the questions all of you had." She picked up a notecard and looked it over.

"Am I really pregnant? Yes." Haley put her hand over the bump in her belly that her viewers couldn't see from the front but she could certainly feel. "How did I get pregnant? Well..." She set the card down and shot a glance at Emmy, who nodded encouragingly. "You see, my town is where that meteor hit two weeks ago. I was right by the impact site when it came down. But it wasn't a meteor, it was an alien ship. It grabbed me and pulled me inside and made me drink weird stuff. When it let me go, I got examined and told I'm pregnant. I guess it's an alien." She shrugged and looked down at herself.

"So, now I'm going to be a mommy to an alien. They've got the whole town locked down and aren't letting any news in or out, but they don't know about these videos.Just keep quiet for now though, or they might make me stop." She turned to the side and rolled up her shirt to show the small outwards swell of her belly. "And don't believe me? I didn't have this last week. It's growing fast!"

"Perfect!" Emmy chirped as she shut off the camera before moving to hug Haley, one hand pressing to the pregnant girl's bare belly as she did. "This is awesome!"
11432222112212212.title: Insect larva

114322221122122121.content:
"My friend Emmy usually helps me with these, but she couldn't come over today. She's sick." Haley said as she fired up the camera again. "They think that the thing that crashed might have let out something that's making people sick, but they don't know. She's been asked to stay home for now. So you just get me." She shrugged and smiled slightly.

"Um... I don't know what to say or do, really." She admitted before pulling up her shirt and turning to the side to show off the plump gut she had gotten from her pregnancy. "I'm getting bigger but I don't feel any different, really. They can't tell what it is either." Her hand cupped the 12 week looking swell. "Uh...yeah. That's it, I guess."

She shut the camera off and let her shirt fall back down, smoothing it out as her stomach rumbled.

choices: Comment: Where's your friend? Is she okay?
Comment: I wanna see the ship!
1143222211221221212.content:
"Hi everyone! I know it's been a while." Haley giggled as she sat in front of the camera. "I'll get to that in a second, but for those keeping track. I'm seven weeks pregnant now, even if you haven't seen me since my third week." She smirked a bit.

"That's because I got in some big trouble. You see, I sneaked back to the ship and got caught. I had to, though. It turns out that whatever that ship fed me to get me pregnant, is also what I need to eat in order for them to grow properly. I was actually just gaining weight before because they weren't able to take in any of what I was eating. So, now I get to eat this!" She lifted a clear tube of glowing green slime into frame. "The ship produces it for me and just me."

"That ship actually does a lot for just me. I have... oh, what did they call it? Broodmare access. Apparently having babies in me means that the ship actually listens to me instead of all the scientists who had been prodding it, so I get to spend all day down there now. I'll try and sneak some footage next time, okay?" Haley uncapped the tube and chugged the entire contents easily, looking dazed for a second when she finished before she started hefting herself to her feet with a groan.

"This is what four weeks of me feeding them properly looks like!" She sighed, rolling up her shirt and turning. She rubbed her hands over the surface of her round belly that looked fit to be 36 weeks pregnant, her skin tight and shape round. "They're real heavy now, whatever's in there. I hope i get to meet them soon!"
1143222211221221212.title: A month later

11432222112212212121.content:
"Week Eight!" Haley chirped excitedly as she rolled up her shirt to show off her overdue stomach that bulged out huge and round from her skinny body. "I'm feeling huge, but I'm also feeling better than ever." She fell into her chair with a groan, milky breasts bouncing with the movement. She grabbed one of her slime containers and popped the top off, not even bothering to cover her pregnant mound as she chugged it down.

"This stuff is amazing, I swear." She said, patting her stomach with one hand while the other wiped at her mouth. "The ship is giving me tons of it now. It actually force fed me some last time I went in it. Apparently it thinks I'm still not having enough. The scientists are worried about that, but it's not like I'm gaining weight so I think it's really all going to my babies. Oh!"

Haley stood again and turned sideways, running a hand down her round shape. "They still can't get the ultrasound to work on me, but I can feel something moving in here. It's not kicking really. More like wiggling and squirming." She sank back into her seat, falling silent as she stared at her belly, merely rubbing her hands over it with a blissful smile for the last few minutes of the video.
11432222112212212121.title: A week later

choices: Follow Emelia as her secrets become true!
114322222.content: Emelia Ecant (12) - Emeila has a tangle of red hair on her head with a small sprinkle of freckles on her nose. She's a very outgoing girl for her age and is quite smart too. Recently she was told her friend Haley was pregnant. She was very happy for her friend but what no one else knew was that Emilia secretly admired Haley and pregnancy. Putting those two together was something out of a dream for the young child. You'll follow Emelia as she visits Haley throughout her pregnancy.
114322222.title: Someone other than Haley.

12.content:
Lisa - 13 - Lisa has always wanted to be pregnant but at only 13 she knows she can't take care of a baby. So she's been looking for a way to fulfill the feeling without having to worry about what would come with a birth. Thankfully there is a spell book that will let her fill her womb up with water instead.

Kim - 13 - Kim is desperate to be pregnant and sure she can handle having a baby of her own at her age. She's going to use some science experiments of her father to put a baby in her belly.

Ann - 14 - Ann has a job in a cafe near her house but the treats there seem to make her a little more motherly...

choices: Any water she drinks goes into her womb instead.
Saying "baby" adds one glass worth of water to her womb.
Rubbing her hand in a circle on her belly adds 1 glass of water to her womb.
121.content:
Lisa chewed at her lip as she pored over the old spellbook that was laid open on her bedroom desk. She had dreamed for being pregnant for years but she knew at only age 13 she couldn't take care of a baby on her own. That was why she was working to find a spell that would allow her to fake a pregnancy. "AHA!" She said happily as she ran her finger over the page of a spell that would fill her womb with water, the spell to cause a labor that would empty it and bring her womb back to normal was at the bottom of the page. "This is perfect..." She breathed, eyes darting over every little detail of the page in order for her to know everything she could about this spell.

It needed something that would add the water to her womb, a trigger that would activate her spell. She just had to choose what it would be.
121.title: Lisa

choices: Why not relax in the tub with a constant water flow?
Just get some water jugs and fill up in her room.
There's a faucet in the kitchen.
1211.content:
It would be easiest to control her growth if she had to drink the water herself so Lisa chose that option from those the book listed and waved her hands over the page as she muttered the spell lowly. "Kalazah mertuem wombede bloand con aguanan whil drunen." The text on the page glowed for a moment before Lisa felt a warms run through her body that told her the spell had taken effect.

The teen jumped to her feet and grabbed the waterbottle from beside her bed. "Here goes nothing." She mumbled before putting the bottle in her mouth and tipping her head back to drink it all down. When she had finished she looked down at herself, tugging up the front of her t-shirt to see her belly. She wasn't showing yet but she had a distinct feeling low in her abdomen of being bloated that told her that the water had gone into her womb. She grinned widely, ready to finally feel a pregnancy. She had to decide where exactly she wanted to drink all her water though. Her parents were out for the day so she had the house to herself and she had resolved to just birth her watery womb quickly in the tub or toilet before they got home.
1211.title: Any water she drinks goes into her womb instead.

choices: Take it a little bit at a time.
12111.content:
If she was going to be using water to fill her womb then the bathroom seemed like the more logical place to be as she could relax in the tub and drink from that tap. She hummed a little to herself and wandered over to her closet, digging around until she found a simple one piece swimsuit. She wanted to get the feeling of all her clothes getting tighter on her but anything else would feel weird in the water. She changed into the body hugging garment before plodding down to the bathroom and sitting herself down in the tub. She settled in, reclining with her head on the same end of the tub as the tap and rubbed over her flat belly. "Well...bye-bye flat belly." She giggled before turning on the water and sticking her mouth under the flow, drinking deep gulps of water.

She pulled her head from under the water after a bit and rubbed a hand over her three month pregnant bump that was pulling at the fabric of her suit. She grinned widely and rubbed a hand on the bump still having trouble believing it was real.
12111.title: Why not relax in the tub with a constant water ...

choices: She goes to school and shows her friend.
She thinks of something else to do at school.
121111.content:
Lisa continued drinking from the faucet, feeling her stomach swell like a water balloon. Gulp after gulp, growing bigger and bigger. Her belly started to get warm from the temperature of the water. After a little while drinking she had bloated to a size comparable to having triplets. She turned off the water and basked in the feeling of fullness. “Oh yeah, this is great.” She thought, the warmth from her stomach making her feel drowsy as she drifted into sleep.

Lisa was awoken by the sound of a closing door, which meant that her parents were home. The realization instantly woke her up. I have to get rid of the water, she thought as she tried to get up. Her inflated stomach had made in nearly impossible, as she flailed about, she heard someone climbing up the stairs. She finally got up and waddled into her room, but the relief was sort lived when she noticed the footsteps heading her way. “The spell” she whispered and rushed to the spellbook to find the spell to recite. Once she found it she said the words immediately. “Fahshuk matan aguanan expellus korpo.”

She felt relief as the person reached her door, until she realized where she was. Her stomach rumbled ominously, and then there was a popping sound, and more than a gallon of water erupted onto the floor of her room. As her mother entered into her room, she saw the water all over the floor. “Lisa what the heck were you doing in here, you made a mess.” Lisa a little overcome from the sensation of draining all that water, and embarrassment squeaked out an unsure response. “Playing with water balloons.” She said with an unconfident smile.

“Well don’t do that in your bedroom, and clean up this mess.” Lisa submitted and hurried to get some towels. She was cleaning up the mess for a while, all the while feeling mortified. She would need to be more careful when she was inflating, she didn’t want to have another incident like this.

She had an idea, and wrote down the spells she wanted on a slip of paper. Tomorrow she would take them to school and share the spell with her friend. She knew Suzie would be very interested in the spell she had cast on herself.

When she was getting ready for bed she went to the bathroom, and drank enough water to give herself a slight tummy. She returned to her room and got into bed, rubbing her belly contently, as she thought of the fun she would have at school tomorrow.
121111.title: Go big or go home!

choices: She casts the spell incorrectly trouble ensues.
Through some miraculous happenstance she casts the spell correctly.
1211111.content:
The next morning Lisa dressed comfortably for school, choosing some stretchy shorts, and a loose camisole. She didn’t bother deflating because she wanted Suzie to really notice the change when she inflated in front of her. As she snatched a few donuts, before she left for school, and finally grabbed the piece of paper with the spells on it to put in her pockets. She failed to notice however that the icing from the donuts caused the spells to smear and become smudged.

As Lisa took her seat in the classroom next to Suzie she whispered to her friend. “Hey Suzie, I got something I wanna show you at lunch, meet me in the bathroom.” Suzie was curious and nodded in acknowledgement. The day went on fairly uneventful until lunch when the girls convened in the bathroom.

“So, what did you want to show me.” Suzie asked as she leaned on the bathroom wall. “Watch this.” Lisa said as she pulled out an empty half gallon bottle, and started filling it up. When it was almost full, she brought it to her lips and started chugging it. She lifted up her camisole, and showed Suzie her bloated tummy as it swelled bigger and bigger. “Whoa, why are you so big?” exclaimed Suzie in disbelief at the show her friend was giving her. When Lisa finished, she looked like she was almost four months pregnant. “Cool right.” She said smugly. Suzie scampered to her friend’s side, and started rubbing her stomach. “How’d you do that, you feel pregnant.” “Magic spells, I drink water to fill up, and I can drain myself whenever I want, you interested.” Lisa said flashing her the piece of paper.

“Watch!” Lisa said as she sat down on a toilet. She looked at the paper and realized a problem, the spells were smudged beyond recognition. Now that she was on the spot she tried her best to say the spell as she could remember, and parse from the smudgy scribbles. She started reciting the spell hoping it would work. “Fahshuk manate.. aquanan expandus… absoro” Much to her surprise, she started feeling something, the lights started flickering, and then nothing. The girls sat in silence for a few moments, until Suzie spoke up. “So, what was that supposed to do?” She inquired. “I don’t know.” Lisa replied a sense of dread welling up in her.

After another moment of silence, Suzie once again asked another question. “So you can cast that spell on me too right.” Lisa panicked as she realized that was going to be a problem.

“Maybe, I can do it when you come over after school.” Lisa said trying to change the subject. “Hey, I thought you had the spells right there.” Suzie countered pointing at the paper. “Yeah, I guess I do.”
1211111.title: She goes to school and shows her friend.

choices: A trickle of water drips out. She absorbed it being unable to expel the water.
All the water flows out. She expands like a sponge growing with water.
Something else for you to decide.
12111111.content:
She begins to cast the spell on her friend Suzie hoping that she can get it right this time. “Malazah mertuem… wombede.. inflata, con aguanan… whil durnen.” “I feel it, I think I felt it working, this is so cool.” “You bet.” Lisa nervously agreed, thinking of how much trouble she might have just cause. “So, when I drink water, I’ll fill up right?” Said Suzie. “Oh yeah, you noticed that.” Replied Lisa. “Hey, I pay attention, unlike you.” Suzie retorted. “I think I’ll wait until we get to your house before I have some fun.” Suzie said with a wink.

After they returned to the classroom, Lisa was wondering what sort of spell she had cast on herself earlier. She couldn’t tell for sure, but her belly didn’t feel as tight as before, she didn’t feel as bloated. Sitting next to her Suzie kept fidgeting in her seat, obviously something was wrong with her. Finally noticing her friend’s situation Lisa asked quietly. “What is wrong with you?” “Are you sure you read that spell correctly?” Suzie replied quietly in an accusing tone that worried Lisa. “Why do you think that?” She asked with a nervous smile. “Because my pants feel tight and I haven’t drunk any water yet.” Suzie said with a scowl. “Look!’ she said lifting up her shirt slightly so just Lisa could see.

There before her eye Lisa, could see her friend’s belly was muffin topping slightly, and as she continued to watch she noticed the bulge seemed to be growing. “Oh my god Suzie, you’re growing.” Lisa screamed in a whisper. “I am!” Suzie said quietly as she realized something her face showing her shock. With a tiny “pop,” the button on Suzie’s pants came undone making her appear four months gone. “You did read that spell wrong didn’t you.” Suzie said her anger obvious by her expression. “Okay, maybe I did, but it doesn’t matter, when we get to my house after school, I can get the right spell and fix you.” Lisa said defensively trying to downplay the seriousness of the situation. “I’m blowing up like a water balloon, and we still have a few hours before school gets out.” Suzie interjected with whispered fury, before she moaned quietly as the bottom button on her shirt popped off. Luckily for Suzie she was wearing a stretchy t-shirt as an undershirt so her swollen stomach wasn’t visible, but her clothes would be ruined at this rate. “Shhh, try not to make a scene we don’t want to attract attention.” Lisa said under her breath, much to Suzie’s begrudging agreement.

As time went on Suzie got bigger and bigger, she only had three buttons left on her shirt, by the time school was let out, her stomach reaching third trimester size, and by the time they got to Lisa’s house she had one button left, and a belly comparable to twins. “Now get on the toilet and I’ll get the spell book.” Lisa grabbed the book, looked up the appropriate spell, and went to her friend in the bathroom. Alright her it is just read this, Lisa said pointing out the spell to Suzie. “Fahshuk matan aguanan expellus korpo.” Suzie said and after a moment there was a popping sound as Suzie expelled the huge amount of water, leaving her relieved and exhausted.

After all the nonsense with Suzie, Lisa had forgotten about the miscast spell she had made earlier to demonstrate for Suzie, but as she began to cast the emptying spell on herself the effects of that spell might manifest. After standing in the tub, Lisa recited the words aloud with confidence. “Fahshuk matan aguanan expellus korpo.”
12111111.title: She casts the spell incorrectly trouble ensues.

choices: Go check on Suzie see if she found out anything.
Go spy on her mother curious about what she knows.
121111111.content:
Lisa stared in confusion as a small trickle of water dripped out from her nether region. “What the heck?” Lisa hollered grabbing her still inflated tummy. “Why didn’t the water come out.” “Is that what you we’re trying to do earlier in the girl’s restroom room.” Suzie inquired. “Yeah, why?” Lisa said looking at her friend for clarification. “Because that isn’t what you said in the restroom, You said, Fahshuk manate aquanan expandus absoro” Suzie said in a condescending way, Lisa looked at her in disbelief. “How do you still remember that?” Suzie huffed and countered. “Because unlike you, I pay attention.” Lisa stared daggers at Suzie as she took the spell book from her. “Maybe I can figure out what you did, and if you’re lucky maybe I can fix your mistakes.” Lisa pouted, crossing her arms in irritation. “Fine bookworm, just hurry up and do it, since you’re so smart.”

Suzie left the bathroom, her nose buried in the book. Lisa followed close behind her, but was stopped by her mother. “Hey sweetie, what were you girls doing in the bathroom?” Her mother said giving Lisa a quizzical look, Lisa was embarrassed, she blushed as she nervously tried to think of an excuse. “Uh, you know girl stuff.” She said with a nervous laugh, her mother giving her a skeptical look, when her mother noticed her belly. “Goodness honey, are you okay, you look really bloated.” Lisa was caught by surprise, as her mother put her hand on her swollen belly. Her mother rubbed it causing Lisa to gasp, the gentle touch giving her a pervese sexual thrill, and making her feel uncomfortably aroused. She cradled her belly, and defensively turned away from her mother, trying to hide her arousal. “Yeah, just drank a lot today.” She croaked out hanging her head in embarrassment. Her mother was a little surprised by her reaction, but thought nothing of it. “Well okay sweetie, just don’t drink too much or you’ll blow up like a little water balloon.” As she said this Lisa’s mother reached around and cup her daughter’s bulge, and gave it a jiggle, much to Lisa’s terrified surprise.

Her mom wandered off, leaving Lisa speechless, she didn’t know if her mom knew what was going on, or if she was just being her usual playful self, but the words she chose were disturbingly intuitive. Lisa face was beet red as she glared at where her mother went, feeling so awkwardly aroused by the entire experience, and being very upset about it.
121111111.title: A trickle of water drips out. She absorbed it b...

choices: Mom is upset and teaches her a lesson.
Mom is understanding and encourages her.
Suzie comes in with something to tell her.
1211111112.content:
Lisa snuck down the hall following her mother, she was in the bedroom putting up some clothes, humming cheerily. Lisa spied on her wondering, she had found the book in grandma’s old cabinet which was stored in the attic, and she had always thought it was dad’s it was his mom after all. However maybe mom knew about it, was dad a warlock, or was mom a witch. She didn’t know, but she was starting to wonder.

“Hey sweetie, got something to say.” Her mother interrupted her thoughts, as she caught sight of Lisa in the mirror. “Oh, no just curious.” Lisa said trying to play off her snooping, “About what?” Her mother said as she focused on her chore. Lisa looked down at her belly rubbing it gently. “How do you feel, about bloating.” Her mother paused for a moment as if thinking. “What a strange thing to asks.” She said with a chuckle, making Lisa feel insulted, as her mom continued. “Well, there is that feeling of fullness, and that not quite unpleasant ache, things get a little more sensitive, you look down and see your feet have been eclipsed by your belly.” Lisa was hanging onto every word, her mother’s descriptions pressing all of her buttons, making her feel more aroused by the second. Her mother looked at her giving her a knowing smile and said. “It certainly is an interesting experience.”

Lisa was at a lost as to what to say, it felt like it didn’t need to be said. Was mom like her, or was it another oddly coincidental choice of words. These thoughts were interrupted, however when her mother’s face suddenly shifted to a stern expression.
“You know, you shouldn’t take things without asking sweetie. Lisa got a little worried, having a feeling she knew what her mother was talking about. Her mother finished putting up the clothes and sat down on the bed, motioning for Lisa to sit with her.
1211111112.title: Go spy on her mother curious about what she knows.

choices: The spell gives her an unquenchable thirst, making her drink herself bigger.
The spell makes Suzie obsessed with inflating her belly bigger.
12111111121.content:
Lisa complied sitting next to her mother, feeling like a lamb going to the slaughter. Her mother put her hand on her belly again pressing more forceful on it, and sending pleasurable pressure to her crotch, making her blush. Her mother tapped her chin in contemplation, as she rolled Lisa’s tum back and forth. Then her mother seemed to get an idea. “See sweetie even if you learned your lesson there should still be a punishment for bad behavior…thirst” Her mother said affectionately, Lisa thought she heard her mother mutter something at the end there. “You know there is such a thing as too much of a good thing… aquanan.” Giving her daughter a mischievous smile. “Now I’m going to get some groceries, I’ll be back in a few hours, so have fun… obsessio.” Her mother said once again whispering something under her breath. She patted Lisa’s tummy as she left which resulted in an ominous gurgle.

“Mom, what was…” Lisa inquired, but her mother quickly left the room, leaving Lisa to follow after her stumbling all the way. “Mom!” she called as her mom walked out the door. “Be good girls.” She said closing the door. Lisa was worried, if what she think just happened, her witch of a mother just put a spell on her, but what does it do.
12111111121.title: Mom is upset and teaches her a lesson.

choices: Avert your eyes and fight the thirst.
Just give in, this is what you really wanted.
Just then someone walks into the kitchen
121111111211.content:
Lisa got up and walked to the window, seeing her mother's car drive off. Seems she really did just leave. Leaving Lisa alone with Suzie, who was still looking into what Lisa might have done earlier to cause her inability to empty herself. The young teen placed a hand on her little bump with a mix of fear, and slight arousal. If her hunch was right, she now had two spells effected her, who's effect she didn't know, at least completely.

But at the same time it was a little thrilling. The fact that she couldn't get rid of her belly made it feel all the more like a real pregnancy. And while she had faith that Suzie would find a solution eventfully, maybe it wouldn't be too bad to be stuck with a fake baby bump for awhile? "I should pace myself on drinking though, at least until Suzie finds something." As she said that though, she felt something shiver though her body as her mouth felt uncomfortably dry. Like she had just been outside in the sun for hours, and had sweated out buckets! Lisa found herself turning towards the kitchen, eyes trained on the sink as a single droplet of water dripped from it.

It seemed to taunt her as she realized she never felt more thirsty in her entire life. "I-it's alright if I take a sip right? Just to take the edge off." Lisa tried to rationalize , already starting to walk into the kitchen. Her mind felt like it was in a daze whenever she thought about something that wasn't getting a drink. Like she was forgetting something, but it wasn't as important as grabbing the glass and filling it with water. Lisa found herself licking her lips as she left the water running, and began chugging the glass, letting out a moan as she felt the cool refreshing liquid run down her throat, momentarily fighting back the unbearable dryness in her throat.

At least until the cup was empty. The water was already running, and she was still thirsty. So Lisa just tipped it back under the flow, and brought it back to her lips. Again, and again. It was just as blissful as the first, and though she felt a slight pressure, she felt it no mind. She was so consumed with drinking glass after glass that the rest of the world was forgotten, at least until she tipped a still empty glass back to her lips. Now she had no more water to drink, Liisa opened her eyes to see why. What she found shocked the poor girl.

Lisa had drank a lot, enough to rival the size she was the first night. Looking close to term with triplets once more. And this was the reason why she had stopped drinking, as he water filled womb grew too large for her to reach the faucet with the cup. She was thankful that it had happened, as she could feel her mouth dry up once more, the flowing water calling to her again. But the heavy weight of her womb on her hips kept her from falling completely into the trance.
121111111211.title: The spell gives her an unquenchable thirst

122.content:
Kim knew she would make a great mom and had always wanted to be one ever since she was a small child. She didn't know why no-one else could see how great of a job she would do at her current age though. She had just turned 13 and in her eyes was practically an adult. She laid in bed rubbing her stomach and thinking of how amazing it would be to be pregnant with a child of her own. Her father worked studying fertility and how to help infertile women to have a child so she knew he had all sorts of formulas down in the lab in the basement that could help her to get the results that she wanted.

Kim waited silently for her father to trudge of the steps and to bed, tired as always. Once she heard the door of the room slam and his snoring through the wall she crept out of bed and scurried down the stairs to the lab. She entered the code on the alarm to keep it silent before moving through the room to where her father was keeping his solutions.

Reading each and every label carefully allowed Kim to sort out what would be useful and what would not be until she found what she was looking for. She knew she would have to take the pregnancy formation solution but two others caught her eye.

Fertility enhancing and gestation speed enhancing
122.title: Kim

1222.content: Kim decided it might be best to mix all three of the solutions for a result she would want to have. She started working on measuring out each of her solutions so she could have the perfect custom pregnancy that she would want. She started with the fertility solution so she could know how many children she would be having.
1222.title: Both

12221.content:
She knew that she wanted to have one baby for sure but if she was going to show everyone how great of a mother that she could really be, she was going to need more children than that. She added enough solution to the pregnancy inducing serum that she would be implanted with two children, though she was unsure if they would be identical twins or not.

Next she had to decide how rapidly she would grow with child.

She tugged off her baggy hoodie and grinned down at the way her form-fitting t-shirt hugged her changing body. In the third day of her pregnancy, she was certainly starting to become more clearly a mother. She rubbed a hand down the swell that curved outward slightly from her body and blew out a breath. Twins were nestled there inside her. She was really going to be a mother.

Perhaps she could already be carrying a second one if everything went well. She smiled at the thought and mixed her solutions together, knocking them back easily. Kim trotted down to the basement and dug around among all the old boxes until she found the pieces of the crib that had been hers when she was a baby herself. She carefully hauled it up to her room one piece at a time, laying them against the wall. On her last trip down to make sure she had not forgotten anything she grabbed a box of maternity clothing that had belonged to her mother before she had passed. "Even if I still fit into my clothes these will be nice to hold onto, just it case." She hummed to herself, wiping her bow as she set them down with the pieces of her crib. It had been tiring to carry it all up and assembly could wait for now so she hopped into the shower and cleaned up before slipping back into bed for the night.

The dawn of her fourth day of pregnancy was even more exciting as she stood in front of the mirror, cradling her bump that was well and truly showing, sticking out in a dome from her body. Relaxing and swimming in the pool, Kim heard her best friend at the gates of the backyard. Trying to hide her pregnant belly from her best-est of friend. Kim swam to the wall of the pool to obscure the view from her.
"Hey! its me Alice! Are you home Kim?!" Alice shouted to catch Kim's attention.
"I'm home! Just in the swimming pool! Want to join?!" Kim cheered as panic set in. She didn't want her friend Alice to see her pregnant 7 month midriff. All Kim could do was see Alice walk in as she see's her against the pool wall.
"I'm going to get my swim suit from home and join you." Kim tried not to freak out, all she could think about was her best friend seeing her in this motherly form.

Kim froze in place by the pool wall. This was going to happen, either she had to lie to her friend or tell the truth about the fertility solution that her dad had in the basement. Kim couldn't lie to Alice, she had to tell her the absolute truth.
"Kim, I'm going to change! Is your house open?!" Alice questioned the heavily pregnant Kim in the pool.
"Ye-yeah... N..no one is home.... M-my dad left for a business trip." Kim hesitated struggling to put words in her mouth.

Alice jumped into the pool that Kim was using to relax her heavy swollen middle. Swimming to give Kim a hug, Alice felt Kim's fecund mound. She than turned Kim around to see her in a green one piece that could barely fit her gravid middle that was of a 7 months pregnant belly.
"Listen Alice. I can explain why I am pregnant." Kim panicked as she tried to explain to Alice.

Since her baby had flipped to be head down in the night, Kim was feeling very uncomfortable. The head of her child was heavy settled in her hips and every bit of her felt just about ready to let it out. Everything ached, even her breasts which had filled out more and grown heavy with milk for her child. She weighed one in her hand thoughtfully as her other hand caressed her belly. It hadn't really crossed her mind just how much this pregnancy would affect her body aside from the belly bump. Now she felt overfilled and heavy and downright ...pregnant. She looked down at herself with a tiny smile. "You know...I don't know if I'm really ready for you to come, sweet pea."

A few hours later Kim was just killing time by reclining on the couch and rubbing the occasionally-shifting swell of her round & distended abdomen. Kim's lower back had been putting out numerous aches and twinges, but that - in of itself - had been steadily increasing in frequency the past few days, so it didn't strike Kim as anything notable... What did strike Kim as 'notable', however, was when she felt an especially strong twinging that reached across the circumference of her pregnant belly like a tightening belt, and Kim gasps as she suddenly feels a moistening sensation at her groin and she glances down to see a tricking of fluid that was now running out from her vaginal canal - dampening and staining both the fabric of her maternity dress. Within moments the flow of the 'trickle' became that of a spilling gushing, like someone pouring out a wide-mouthed picture of warm water, and both the interior of Kim's skirt as well as the couch cushion below her were sopped as the fuilds poured out from her virginal womanhood.

"My... My water finally broke...", Kim gasped. "I... I'm about to finally give birth to my baby!", she marvels - Caught up in a state of both nervous trepidation and excited eagerness to finally deliver and see just what she has been nurturing within her own, young frame these past days...

Kim headed to her bedroom as she decided that's where she wanted to have her childbirth. But going to her room was a chore, her body was sore of the pregnancy and the pains of child labor. Every few steps Kim had to stop, letting the hard cramps pass her gravid form. Moans and hums left her young throat as the labor increased.

By the time Kim reached her bedroom; all her maternity clothes, underwear and bra was thrown off her heated body. Her hair sticking to the sweats of her swollen breast. Kim held one hand on her hardened belly as the other grasped her bed. Words were more moans and groans as the worst contraction hit her form.

Finally as Kim lie on her bed she felt her unborn child just in between her small skinny legs.
"Oh.... Ohhh my guaad! It's.... It's really.. really happening...." Kim heaved as her swollen middle shrank in front of her eyes.
Her legs couldn't be closed any longer. Kim's child rested inside her 13 year old pelvis, legs wide open yet she couldn't see her own girlhood from the contracting belly.

One final big push. Her baby slipping through her teen body as Kim's bed was wet by the new born child and amniotic fluids. The pain in her middle stopped as soon as the baby was born.
"I.. I did it..." Kim exhaled from her exhausted labor. She looked in-between her scrawny legs to find that her new born was a girl. It was hers and Kim was now a mommy. Fatigued by hours of labor and pushing her reward was her baby daughter.
Kim had to make sure it was her baby daughter. Checking to see that her new born daughter had an umbilical cord, Kim ran the cord from the baby to between her skinny legs to her girlhood.
Cutting the cord that connected her to the baby as Kim wrapped her in a warm sheet.
"Welcome home, my beautiful daughter." Kim wooed her to sleep.

Of course those were just things for her during the delivery. She needed some quality of life things like a bendable straw and things for her baby. Kim found her beanie from when she was a baby so she took those, grabbing four towels as she had to clean the baby and a few blankets to wrap her newborn in.

The last thing Kim almost forgot was to order the diapers from the internet. Thankfully her dad left a debit card that he puts allowances in; Kim saved money and a lots of it, she knew being a mommy required money to support her child. She was ready for her baby to arrive.

She grinned widely at her reflection as she stood sideways and rolled up her shirt to see that her belly had begun to push out with the growth of a baby inside it. Kim gasped at the knock that came on her door as soon as she had managed to get herself in her new shirt that really wasn't as big as she had thought it would be. It pulled taut over her belly and when it came to her chest held her breasts just as good as he bra would have. She turned quickly to see her father open the door, gaping at his heavily pregnant daughter in shock. Kim brought one hand to cradle her belly as he searched for words and blushed brightly. She'd forgotten that her father often woke up and checked on her at night.

"Hi daddy..." She murmured as she slid her hand higher on her bump. "I...I wanted to make you a grandpa so I took some of the stuff from the the lab." Her father ran a hand down his face and stepped into the room, taking in the sight before himself.

"You mean you wanted to be a mother." he stated bluntly before he knelt down and started feeling her round middle with both hands. He'd known about his daughters tendencies and fantasies for a long time. "What did you take exactly."

"Enough of the one to get me pregnant to do this and then enough of the one that speeds it up for me to have the baby in nine hours..."

"How long has it been?"

"About six and a half I think." Her father nodded and got to his feet.

"Nothing to do but ride this out then. You really proved to be the proof I need to show that my serums work but I would have needed to document every moment of your pregnancy, not just the tail end of it all. You'll have this baby and then...I'll figure out what we're going to do after that."

"Daddy...I could do this again for you. After I have this baby."

She had only seen videos and read about labor and contractions,now she was feeling it. She was experiencing it! Kim was going into labor, she was going to see her baby really soon,
