choices: Trying a few treats couldn't hurt right?
Steal a few and put them in your bag to try at home.
123.content:
Ann loved her job at Babycakes Bakery and cafe. Her boss and the owner, James, was always supporting and gave her great hours. The only thing he had been strict with her on was not eating any of the baked treats in the shop. She had never understood this until the day that she finally asked.
James sighed heavily and ran a hand through his hair. "The treats that I make are special. One of them is no issue but the more and more you eat, you start looking pregnant. People use them for stuff like jokes and baby showers. It only lasts a few hours at a time but I didn't want to scare you with it."
"Oh. I see." Ann smiled a little and darted out to clean up so they could close the shop down for the day, mind constantly wandering to the treats now.
123.title: Ann

1231.content:
Ann had just finished counting profits for the day, wiped down the counters, and put away the goods that would still be good the next day. James called out from the front and she peeked her head out of the kitchen. "I'm locking up okay? When you're done just leave out the back."

"You got it!", she called, and continued cleaning up the bakery. When she finished, Ann hit the lights, slumped down in one of the cafe's chairs, and checked her phone. It was just after dinnertime - she should really be going. But as she laid her hand on the exit door to the alley behind the bakery, she stopped. Her hand went to her stomach. She was pretty hungry right now... a couple baked goods couldn't hurt...

Ann returned to the kitchen, walking past the fridge where she returned some of the baked goods earlier. There was a second fridge closer to James' office, stocked with more than what was in the first fridge. Ann had been told only to concern herself with the first fridge. Given what James had said earlier though, she had more than a sneaking suspicion what was inside.

She slipped into his office - James never left it locked - and rummaged around his desk, being careful to replace things where she found them. After a few minutes, she found what she was looking for in one of his drawers. "Product list.", she smiled to herself, and walked back to the second fridge. Ann held up the stapled package to the dim light of a digital thermometer, squinting to read the stock.

"Baby brownies - 40 units
Milk Cake - 15 units (too dry, fix next batch)
Growth cookies - 7 packages of 40
Swell macarons, asst. - 20 boxes of 6..."

There's too many on the list to go through individually. Ann shrugged, grabbing a couple of the listed goods and some from the upper shelf. She changed the stock numbers on James' sheet and replaced it in his drawer. After putting the treats in her bag, Ann was just about to leave, but she stopped, heading back to the register and ringing in her purchase.

On the bus, she nibbled on one of the cookies she grabbed. It tasted pretty good. It was an oatmeal raisin cookie, sweet and tasting like cinammon~... Ann frowned. She had grabbed the goods as a snack, but even as she polished off her second cookie and worked on a third, they weren't curbing her hunger. Rather than taking the edge of, she stayed about as hungry as she started.

Ann bounded inside, waving to her mom as she ran upstairs to put her bag away, and she returned a moment later to sit at the kitchen table. "Hey hun. Little late from work today?", her mom asked.

"Yeah, James had me closing down the shop."

"Ooh, he's giving you a bit more responsibilty, huh?"

"Yeah, guess he trusts me.", she shrugged, "Do we have any pickles, or beets?"

Her mom nodded, getting up and fetching a jar from the fridge.

"Thanks!", Ann nodded and put a few onto her plate. They talked idly about their days before cleaning up the dishes, and Ann left back upstairs.
1231.title: Sweet-toothed Teen

12312.content:
It had been a long day, and while she was in no hurry to study, Ann knew it had to be done. She took out her text book and sighed, flipping through the pages that were covered in the day's lessons. Every so often, she reached down into her bag, and munched on another cookie. Within an hour, she could feel her skirt getting tight. Ann brushed against her tummy, feeling a pudgy cushion where a flat middle used to be. Pinching around, she could even feel some extra padding on her hips. As she was prodding, she could even feel a stiff lump in her core, warmer than the rest of her skin. It brought a whole new meaning to the phrase "food baby". Ann giggled. It
wasn't that she didn't believe James, it was just so strange she thought he was joking.

She was happy he wasn't, though. Ann had been curious about pregnancy for a while. It seemed so fun, and pregnant women always looked so content... well, as long as their feet didn't hurt. She wanted to try it herself one day, but she didn't expect it to be so soon~ The best part was - no risks! According to James, after a couple hours it'd be back to normal.

Ann switched into her PJ's and pulled the treats from her bag, hiding them in a drawer of her nightstand. She reached inside and pulled out...
12312.title: Snack Attack~

123122.content:
Ann reached in and pulled out the opened bag of cookies and sat them on her chest. She was full from dinner - she even ate more than usual - but something told her it wouldn't be a problem. She rolled up her top and popped a cookie in her mouth. "No change. Figured as much.", Ann thought, and massaged her slightly chubby middle in gentle circles.

She pulled out her phone and turned on a video, still munching on the cookies. Just like earlier, they weren't filling. Still tasted good, though. Ann looked over into her drawer to see if she grabbed another flavor, too. Guess not... just oatmeal raisin for now. She worked tomorrow, though. Could swap them out for another variety. Ann munched on another and looked at the bag in her hand. Looked like the cookies were half-gone.

Ann looked down at her belly. She had subtly felt something as she ate, but it totally didn't feel like this much. It would've rolled up her top if she didn't do it herself earlier. Ann put down her phone and rested her hands on it and to the side. It stuck almost half a foot from her body, and when she pressed down, there was very little give. Anyone who saw her would say that, undeniably, she had a baby bump. There was even a dark line running down her midsection.

She murmered excitedly and pet her belly. If she had to guess, Ann would say she was getting into the heart of her third trimester. She pulled down her PJ top as far as she could - just under her navel - and went to stand up, but rocked back onto her rear. "Oof", she gasped, and tried again, swinging her legs over the side first. Ann wiped the crumbs from her sheets and walked towards her door, hand on the small of her back. She looked outside. No sign of mom. She went to the bathroom and admired her figure in the full-length mirror, leaning back to make her belly look bigger. Ann smiled and returned to her room and threw the covers over herself, falling asleep as she rubbed her bump.

When she awoke, Ann drew the covers, looking down at her flat stomach, looking just as it did yesterday morning. She poked at it, looking for any lingering firmness, but just as James said, it only lasted for a few hours. Ann grinned. She was excited to try it again. She got dressed and grabbed the cookies and a brownie before heading downstairs.

What flavour was the brownie?
123122.title: Cookie Monster

123123.content:
Ann settled herself at the head of the bed propped up on a handful of pillows and felt around on her thickened middle a little bit. She had looked at pictures of pregnant women online before and if she had to guess she was likely close to the size of a woman 15 weeks into a pregnancy, certainly plump but not exactly clearly pregnant at a glance. She set the baggie of macaroons on the bed beside her hip and stared at her stomach as she grabbed one and shoved it in her mouth.

A strange feeling swept over her, different from when she had eaten the cookies. She did not feel any fuller, like with the cookies, but low in her belly, where it had pushed forward and swelled up, she felt a warmth and heaviness, as though she had been filled with warm water. While her stomach did not feel full at all, her bump felt warm, full, and heavy. She rubbed a hand over her belly through her shirt and smiled to herself. This was a much more tangible feeling than the cookies and she found herself greatly enjoying it.

Another macaroon followed the first quickly and each one after kept that feeling of warm fullness in her growing belly. She wasn't paying attention to how many that she was eating, but after some time, her round stomach was causing some strain on the buttons of the button-up pajamas. She grinned and slowly opened up the buttons one by one to take a look at her belly, now seeming to be closer to 32 weeks pregnant. Her belly arched out from her body, full and heavy.
123123.title: Some Macaroons

choices: Give it a rest for today.
1231232.content:
Ann bit her lip as she looked at herself in the mirror, she looked at her soft supple middle and fondled it affectionately. “This is so sweet.” She squealed noticing that her small chest had not grown like most pregnant women's did. Huh, I wonder, Ann thought as she looked at her stash of pilfered treats. She took out a milk cake, and quickly scarfed it down. Based on its name she had a pretty good idea what it did and she was anticipating the result. She didn’t wait long as a feeling like a burp crawled up her throat but unlike a burp it never came all the way up, lingering around her chest. Looking in the mirror she watched as her breasts swelled up becoming fuller and filling out her bra more. The fullness of her breasts caused Ann smile from how good it felt. When the feeling stopped, she noticed with some disappointment that her breasts didn’t get much bigger, maybe a cup, but they had become really bloated.

“I wonder.” Ann thought to herself grabbing another milk cake. She ate it and the feeling returned, as she suspected her breasts grew larger swelling up like balloons. She clenched her teeth as the full feeling increased. “Oh man, that feels incredible.” Ann said dreamily as she looked at her reflection again. Her tits were huge for her size having grown to c-cups, they were perky too, the milk inside them making them full. She gently squeezed one and a they leaked, causing a wet spot on her overfilled bra.

“This is so crazy!” She exclaimed staring down at her chest, a thought crossed her mind and she glanced back at the milk cakes. Did she dare? With some hesitance she picked up another and scarfed it down. The result was unsurprising, but unexpected, as the feeling returned and her breasts swelled even larger, Ann groaned in pain. The fullness grew more and since her breasts were already so full it became painful. She collapsed on her bed and held her full chest, the movement causing them to leak more. When the feeling ceased, she looked down and saw her huge DD breasts. They were so bloated with milk it appeared that she had gotten implants, her breasts filled to the brim with milk.
1231232.title: A different treat?

choices: Don’t take any treats to school.
12312323.content:
Knowing not to press her luck, she spent a while holding very still as her body adjusted to the milk. That took a while and eventually the pressure subsided. The rest of the while she studied in her swollen state, until it was time for bed. She nodded off and would have more fun tomorrow.

When she woke up the next morning, Ann felt so much lighter. As she got up, she found James had not been lying she was back to her usual skinny self. No sign remained of her food baby or her milky chest. “That is so freaky.” Ann said poking her breast, it and her middle still felt a little tender, but otherwise there was no sign that she had ballooned up like she did.

As Ann was eating breakfast she thought of the various treats at her bakery. So, Growth Cookies make your belly bigger, Swell Macaroons make you fuller and heavier, the Milk Cakes fill you with milk. There was still one she hadn’t tried the Baby Brownies, what would those do she wondered. Returning to her room, she took a brownie and popped it in her mouth. As she waited for the brownie to take effect, she read the box. Baby Brownies use indigestion to simulate a squirming infant.

“It does what?” Ann said not believing what she was reading. To prove this point, the brownie started to take effect, causing a bubbling sensation in Ann’s gut. As she felt this she focused on the feeling, when suddenly her stomach lurched like an infant doing a somersault. She tentatively raised her hand to her still flat stomach, hoping to feel that again. She was reward with a much more forceful kicking sensation, which made her recoil her hand. “Oh man, I don’t like this, it feels really weird.” As Ann regained her composure, she continued reading the box. Chocolate will have kicks and squirming, blueberry will cause more kicks, strawberry will cause more squirming, and double chocolate is more frequent kicks and squirming to simulate multiples, warning effects can last for three hours, and eating more than one with amplify the effects. “Three hours!” Ann cried as another lurch in her stomach made her nauseous. “Oh great, now I’m going to have to deal with this at school.” She growled in annoyance.

As she gathered her things to take to school she thought of the delicious baked goods.
12312323.title: Give it a rest for today.

choices: She leaves school early to go to the bakery
She's prevented from getting to the bakery on time
She gets to work perfectly on time
123123233.content:
As much as it pained her, Ann decided it was for the best that she not take any of the treats with her. She didn't to have the trouble of someone accidentally taking one from her and experiencing the results without any kind of a warning.

She spent the rest of her morning experiencing the kicking and squirming of a baby without any sort of a bump, something that had her fidgeting a little bit at times, and frequently looking down to her belly as though she expected to be heavily pregnant every time that she felt one of those fake movements.

Strangely, she missed it when it had stopped happening and became more anxious, eager to get to work after school let out so she could get herself another treat of some kind, if just to feel a little of the effects.
123123233.title: Don’t take any treats to school.

choices: Just have one of them (Slow and steady growth)
1232.content:
As she was cleaning up Ann moved to throw out the treats that were going to be stale by morning. She paused for a moment and looked to the baked goods. If they were going in the garbage anyways why shouldn't she just take them home? She quickly bagged herself three dozen cookies and stuffed them in her backpack before taking care of everything else in the shop.

Once Ann had gotten home she hurried up to her room and took the cookies out of her bag staring at them for a moment before pulling one of them out.
1232.title: Steal a few and put them in your bag to try at ...

choices: This is too strange. A break is in order
12321.content:
Ann hemmed and hawed a little before she carefully pulled a single cookie from the bag and devoured it. She waited a moment but nothing happened. She tugged up on her tank top but there was nothing to show for her snack, belly flat as ever. She pouted a little before taking a second cookie out and biting into it. If this one didn't work she would give up on the whole idea. At the end of the cookie she wrinkled her nose a little. She felt kind of funny.
Looking down she saw the tiniest of changes to her middle, barely pushed out at all but it was there.

A bit? How about a lot. Take down the rest of the dozen.

Once she had finished she looked like a mother who was just starting to show. She stood and looked at her middle from all angles before hurrying over to her dresser to change. She slipped on a pair of pajama shorts which a nice stretchy waistband as her jeans had gotten tight on her widening hips before adding a camisole that clung to her midriff so that she could see the slow changes taking place with each of her snacks.

Ann took five cookies out of the bag and looked them over for a moment before starting to chow down. One by one the tasty and sweet snacks slipped past her lips and into her stomach. By the time she had finished she felt bloated and her pants were digging into her widened hips. She got up and took them off, sliding on an old pair of sweatpants instead before she slowly lifted up the front of her loose t-shirt and started down at the three month bulge in her stomach. Her jaw dropped and she ran a hand over the swell slowly realizing that it was her real body. She looked pregnant.
Ann turned her eyes back to the bag of cookies on her bed.

choices: Finish the dozen but you need more than that!
Take a break and just enjoy this size
123222.content: If five cookies made her only this big what harm could it be to have another few? Ann padded over to the bag of cookies in her bed and took them to the dresser beside her mirror so she could have them close at hand. She ate the first one and was pleased at the sweet chocolate taste. These cookies could end up rather addictive if she let it become that way. Cookie after cookie found their way into her waiting and slowly growing stomach. By the time that she had finished a second set of five she looked to be nearly six months pregnant. Her camisole was taut on her body and had ridden up to show a stripe of skin between her shirt hem and the top of her shorts. She turned and looked herself over in the mirror before sliding her hands over her round form that had started to get rather heavy. She grinned widely. So this was what it would be like if she were pregnant? It wasn't really so bad and the feeling of having something heavy like this settled in her body was thrilling.
123222.title: Just five more...

124.content:
Alice - 14 - A svelte blonde hair middle school student, who is abducted by aliens and unknowingly made to carry several alien hybrids.

Jade - 14 - A punk tom boy from a poor family, used by a secret government group to gestate a super soldier.
124.title: More Choices

1241.content:
Alice sat in science class next her best friend Mel as they listen to the teacher, Ms Miller, talk about the reproductive cycle of plants. Ms Miller was quite young, as teachers go, and had quite an attractive body, which was quite distracting for the pubescent boys in her class, especially with her blonde hair done up in a tight and her spectacles giving her look of a naughty librarian, which didn’t help with boys’ concentration, neither did the tight blouse wore or the way she walked slowly through the desk whilst reading the text book.
Alice didn’t have this problem though and was able to concentrate well and was able to keep up, occasionally replying to a comment from her friend Mel. Mel was of Hispanic descent and whilst not as svelte as Alice was far from chubby, she wore thick rimmed glasses quite different from Ms Miller’s.
Ms. Miller walked back up to the front of the class, her shapely hips and behind swaying hypnotically. “Since we only have a few minutes left I’ll give your homework,” she said.
The was a collective groan from many in the class room, Ms. Miller ignore this and continue by saying, “You will be each given a some pea seed, your home work is to plant one and grow it,”
“This sound like an elementary school project,” said Mel dismissively.
“This may sound like something you would do in elementary school, but you have to bring the plant in each day and during class sketch it and do a write up on which stage the plant is in its life cycle,” said Ms. Miller.
“Still sounds like a…” began Mel
“Be sure to take note of any reproductive features of the plant as this is the introduction to your reproduction modal,” continued Ms. Miller.
It was at the point the bell rang signifying the end of the school day, “I’ll leave the box of seeds by the door, please collect one packet on the way out, you only need to plant one seed.”


“It seems strange that they are teaching us about reproduction by start off pea, I’m it’s not even an animal,” said Mel as she and Alice walked out of the class collecting the seed packets as they went.
“You know what teachers are like, they think if they teach us exactly how to do ‘it’ we’ll all go sex mad, so they’ll just dance around the issue until we have already found out,” replied Alice.
“But it means we’ve got bring a plant to and from school each day for the next two weeks,” said Mel.
“Why are you complaining you live just up the road, I’ve got to catch a bus,” said Alice gesturing to said bus.
“True,” said Mel, “and we don’t have to bring it in on Friday because of the inter-school swimming carnival, I can’t believe they are making us go to it even if we are not participating.”
“I am,” said Alice as she hoped on the bus and waved goodbye to Mel.

After she sat down on a seat next to a kid from the next door elementary and the bus started moving, the person in the seat directly in front of her turned around and said, “Hey Alice.”
“Hi, Tim,” she replied.
Timothy was her next door neighbour and a friend from elementary school, though they weren’t in any classes together this year so they really only met on the bus.
“I can’t believe they are making us watch the inter-school swimming carnival on Friday instead of class, even if we’re not participating,” he said pushing his sand coloured hair out of his blue eyes, they were still a bit young for being attracted members of the opposite gender, but it wouldn’t be long before they would and Alice got a giddy feeling when Tim gave his corny grin.
“It’s not that bad,” said Alice flicking her own hair and giving Tim his own giddy feeling.
“Easy for you say,” he replied, “you’re participating, I could be skiving off in art class.”
“Sucks to be you then,” Alice joked before poking her tongue out at him.
Tim blushed and deciding to change the topic, “got you doing pea plants as well?” he said point at the seed packet poking out of Alice’s bag.
“Yes, where’s yours?”
“I did it last week,” said Tim.
“I didn’t see you bring you plant?” said Alice in an accusatory tone.
Tim shrugged, “I just got some random plant at school, stuck it in a pot and on the last day bought a pea plant and brought it into class.”
“That’s cheating!”
Tim shrugged again, “Got me a C+.”
It was at that point the bus arrived at their stop and the pair of them hopped off.
The walked to their houses and said their farewells, “See you tomorrow,” said Alice.
“Yeah, if you want help choosing a plant at school to so don’t have to grow that pea, ask me tomorrow,” he replied.
Alice stuck her tongue out at him again, and he turned away and walked to his place to hide his blush.
1241.title: Alice

choices: Alice woke up not visibly pregnant
12411.content:
As soon she got home, Alice went out to the backyard where she got a small plant pot and planted the pea seed she had been given it, and put in a popsicle stick for it to grow around. She placed it next to the house before standing back to take a look at her handiwork. The plant looked very small in its pot in the backyard, Alice thought about all the neighbourhood dogs and cats that could knock over the pot during the night. “I could put it on my windowsill,” she said picking up the pot, “it’s only a small pot plant and would only be there for a couple of weeks.”

She took the pot upstairs and placed it on the windowsill next to her desk. She then proceeded to work at said desk, doing the rest of the homework she had been set. She took a break for dinner and finished work a couple hours later.

She had a bath and got dressed for bed making sure to leave her shirt in the basket to get washed. The school uniform was a white shirt (either a button up or polo) with school’s logo on top left side, and whilst there was official school shorts and skirts students were allowed their own shorts, skirts and trousers within reason (meaning most just wore jeans). Alice had two of each shirt meaning one had to get washed during the week so she had enough.
She said goodnight to her parents and went to bed, as she laid in bed waiting to fall asleep she looked at the plant pot and wondered if she should open the window so it had enough fresh air. She decided to open the window, it was well into spring after all, she crossed room and open the curtains, moonlight arced across the floor and her bed. Alice then with a bit of effort opened the window as far as it could go letting the cool air flow it the room, Alice went back to bed and shortly fell asleep.

Several hours later a beam pulsating came through the open window and cover the sleeping the sleeping girl, after a few second Alice and the other items in the light’s path slowly rose and drifted out the window, and up into the sky towards a dark object that was the source of the beam. Once Alice was inside the object it flew away.
It was several hours later, just before dawn, did the UFO come back and returned Alice (along with all the items from her room that the aliens accidentally took and hadn’t lost) before leaving, and they wouldn’t return until the end of the week when they would collect what they left growing inside Alice.
12411.title: Alice plants the seed

124111.content:
Alice awoke happily in the morning to the sound of her mother knocking on her door lightly. While her memories of what exactly had happened on the alien ship were incredibly foggy and she couldn't remember exactly what they had done to impregnate her, she knew she carried alien spawn in her young womb. They had essentially reprogrammed her mind into the state of being the perfect broodmother for their young, leaving the girl happy and pleased to have the alien litter growing within her. She propped herself up on her elbows and looked down at herself to see that her loose pajama top had grown tighter with the implantation of the large alien embryos into her.

Alice opened up the bottom half of the buttons of her pajama top and ran her hand over her rounding out midsection that had swollen out to look about 12 weeks pregnant. She pushed a finger against it, feeling it press into it a small amount before feeling the hardness underneath the soft layer of her flesh that was her packed full womb. She cooed softly to the bump, caressing it with her fingertips as the mental reprogramming gave her intense affection to her offspring (Along with other fierce desires such as that to protect her brood). She sat up and swung her legs out of bed as she heard the front door slam, telling her that her parents had just left for work and she had about an hour before the bus would come to pick her up from school.

She wandered over to the full length mirror against the wall, hand constantly rubbing and caressing the gentle swell of her belly that was a bit larger on her than an average pregnancy thanks to her smaller size. She turned sideways to stare at her form in the mirror, one hand touching her small and tender breasts for a moment, excited for when they would fill with milk for her 'children'.
124111.title: Alice woke up visibly pregnant

Alice's eyes fell to her school uniform and she simply stared at it for a moment, unsure of putting the polo shirt on. She unbuttoned and slid off her pajama top before picking the polo up and pulling it on over her head. The normally loose shirt was unable to hide the swell of her stomach from view, she found, the top remaining mostly loose aside from where her belly pressed to the fabric, not tightly held but also not hiding the swell away.

If she were to go to school like this then questions would be asked about the swelling. She couldn't have anyone finding out about the brood nestled inside her so, she took her polo off and grabbed a tank top from the dresser, putting it on instead. The stretchy fabric clung to her form accentuating the curve of her belly that Alice was quickly growing to absolutely love the shape of. She left on the pajama pants that were pushed down a bit in front by her bump and wandered out of her room and down the stairs to get her brood some breakfast.

12411122.content:
The second Alice saw the food in the fridge, her stomach let out a loud groan, her pregnancy making her hungrier than she had ever felt before as he brood would need great amounts of energy from food in order to grow. She pulled the half of a watermelon that was in the fridge out and looked the fruit over before grabbing a spoon and digging into it. It didn't take her long to hollow out the half of a melon, scarfing down all of the red fruit inside. Once she had finished that her stomach was still groaning and churning, wanting more inside it. It didn't even register to her that she was eating the rind of the fruit until she had swallowed the last part of it.

Just minutes later she found herself stuffing handfuls of cereal in her mouth with alternating swigs from a jug of milk. The box was completely gone not long after, the milk following down her throat just as quickly. When the groaning of her stomach was finally quelled she cleaned her mess up and wandered back up to her room. Her stomach ached, packed full of everything that she had eaten, far far more than she could normally get down in one sitting. She rubbed a hand over her middle as she plodded over to her bed and flopped down into it. It was easy to doze off with a belly full of food and the energy that her strange pregnancy was taking from her.

When Alice awoke again it had only been an hour. Her tank top was tighter and upon going over to the mirror and looking herself over she was surprised to see that her brood had grown, filling her womb more, causing her belly to swell out like a woman 22 weeks pregnant.
12411122.title: Alice is ravenous

Alice rolled her tank top up to be settled over her bump and marveled at her alien filled form, unable to stop rubbing a hand over the pale bump. She smiled a little to herself as she took in the sight before there was a pang of hunger from inside her stomach. "Again? I only just fed you all." She giggled as she held her belly with both hands. "You'll be mighty large and out of me mighty quick if you keep me eating so much."

Though her tone was teasing, Alice relented to the demands of the brood tucked away inside her and made her way downstairs again to poke around for something else to eat. She explored the fridge and the cabinets for a while before managing to find a few containers of leftover pasta from the last handful of nights. She didn't even bother heating it up and instead plopped down on the floor, leaned back on the cabinets to dig in. It took some time but the alien spawn in her belly quieted at the nutrition even if it did cause Alice to swell up to a thirty week pregnancy, belly rounding and growing heavier with her meal.

124112.content:
A few hours later one of Alice’s knock on her door to wake her up so she had enough time to get ready to catch the bus. Alice flopped out of bed, she felt terrible, not the way she should after a night’s sleep; tired, sore and…Alice clamped a hand over mouth as she rush to the upstairs bathroom, where she proceeded to throw up into the toilet.
As she washed her face, Alice wondered why she was feeling so poorly, but it was school day and by the time she got back to room she was feeling much better.

Alice got dress for school (going with the polo shirt and a black skirt) and made her way down stairs. Both her parents had already left for their respective jobs so it was just her at the table. She poured herself a bowl of cereal, and after she finished that she pour herself another, nothing strange about that, she occasionally had a second bowl. What was strange was that after her second bowl she still felt hungry. Alice poured herself a third bowl and finished that off just as first two, if not faster, and still felt hungry. She couldn’t understand it, she normally had trouble finishing two bowls even if she was really hungry to begin with she should be fit to bursting with three bowls, but she felt just as hungry as she did before the first bowl. Despite her hunger Alice decided against another bowl (but that might have been due to the fact there was no more cereal left), and headed off to school, hoping that this hunger was just a one off thing unaware that she amount was going to eating would only increase as the week went on.

1241121.content:
Grabbing her bag and her potted planted, from her room upstairs, Alice rushed to the bus stop. Due to her large and long breakfast she only just made, feeling unusually sluggish as she ran, Alice boarded the bus just before the doors closed.

She took her usual seat on the bus, next to a girl from the elementary school and behind Tim.
"Thought you weren't going make it today," said Tim turning around as the bus started moving.
"Slept in," lied Alice, she didn't like it but was better then saying she ate half a box of cereal by herself.
"I see you went with my idea," said Tim changing topic, "but the idea was to use a plant from school, so you didn't have to cart the plant back and forward."
"But I didn't though," said Alice properly at the pot the first time this morning and was shocked to see a small green stem.
"You only planted it yesterday?" asked Tim as Alice held the pot up to get a better look at the sprout.
"Yes," said Alice.
"Weird."
"Maybe I planted one that was close to growing," said Alice, not sure if that was a thing some seed did.
Tim gave a shrug, "What classes do you have on today?"
"Art before recess, then PE, then lunch, then science," said Alice before asking, "you?"
"English, Maths and PE," said Tim after a couple of seconds thought.
There was moment silence as they each tried to think of something to talk about.
Tim start to say some but Alice cut him off, which was to say Alice's stomach cut him off as it gave a very audible groan.
Alice blushed as the girl next to her giggled, and Tim grinned at Alice's discomfort, "maybe you should have grabbed something to eat from your kitchen on the way out," as the bus pulled up at the school.

12411212.content:
Alice stopped for a drink of water before heading to art class in an attempt calm her stomach.


She met up with Mel just as they were being let in to art class, "Where have you been?" asked Mel, "hang out with Tim?" she added in a sing song tone.
"What No?!," replied a blushing Alice.
Their teacher Mrs Evelyn was a thirty something woman in a colourful summer dress and had frizzy red hair and an airy voice.
After checking attendance she stood up and got some of the students to pass out paper while saying, "This week class you be drawing another student, please get into pairs and decide which of you will draw the other and then in Thursday's class you will swap roles and sketch the other person."

Alice and Mel decided between them that Alice would do the drawing today, Alice didn't feel particularly good today and want be her best when drawn as Mel was a particular good artist.
Alice on the other hand was ok at drawing but no where near as good as Mel; Alice set up the paper and Mel took a pose, it was silly and the two had a laugh about, Mel took another pose which would have been funny if Alice drew it and they laughed again, this would have gone on if they had not been interrupted by Alice's stomach which like earlier gave a very loud and audible groan. Alice blushed as the people around her looked to see what made the noise, but only Mel saw it was Alice.

With that Alice and Mel start the task, as said before Alice wasn't the greatest drawer so the picture of Mel whilst recognisable wasn't good. This wasn't helped by Alice's stomach which just kept on groaning and moaning, not as loud as before so only her and Mel heard it, but wasn't the only thing. Alice felt hungry, really hungry, she couldn't understand it she had three times as much breakfast as she normally had and now her stomach was demanding food as though she hadn't eaten in days. Alice patted her stomach beneath her white polo shirt in an attempt to calm it, her stomach was still round and bloat from the three bowls of cereal she had for breakfast (though it was still conceal beneath her shirt), her body was still stuff full of food but it called out for more.

Alice finished the picture a few minutes before the end of class, Mel came to look at the drawing of herself, it was ok but but far from good, the arms were a bit wonky and the expression on the picture's face looked strange. Mel giggled when saw it but stopped when Alice's stomach gave yet another moan and Alice clutched her abdomen with a pained expression on her face.
"Are you ok?" asked Mel concernedly.

Just at that moment the bell to signify the start of recess rung.

The class began to head out to recess where...
12411212.title: Alice met up with Mel at their first class

124112122.content:
As Alice and Mel left the class they came across someone that Alice both hated and relished to meet, Kate Miller.
Kate and Alice had disliked each other since the first grade, Alice couldn’t remember the incident that first sparked their contempt for each other, but neither her or Kate was likely to drop their attitudes anytime soon. Kate was slightly shorter than Alice, had blue eyes and brown hair currently cut to a short bob style, she wore the same uniform as Alice and Mel did, ‘but only much worse’ Alice thought to herself. Kate was also flanked by two hangers-on, Alice never paid too much attention to them so was not sure if they were always the same or if Kate exchanged them at any point.

“That was some drawing,” said Kate to Alice, “I could have sworn it was done by Picasso, pity it was meant to be life like,” this was met by giggles by Kate’s friends.
“Yeah well, I can do a better drawing than you, and Alice will whoop your fat butt during swimming carnival this week,” said Mel who had never been particularly good come backs as she valued factual truth over zing in them.
Alice was about to make her own retort when she was interrupted but her belly rumbling and a pang of hunger so strong she clutched her stomach and bent over in pain. Mel concernedly checked on Alice while Kate and her friends laughed at Alice, “If that’s the kind of conversation we’re going to get here I say we head elsewhere,” and with that Kate dramatically turned and walked away.
“Are you ok?” asked Mel.
“Yes, I’m just hung’ugh’ry,” said Alice wincing as another pang of ravenous hunger hit her.

The pair found a bench to sit down on and they took out their lunch boxes, Alice had an apple, and a sandwich packed for later, while Mel had two sandwiches. Mel watched with alarm as Alice devoured her packed lunch, “You’re not meant to eat the core,” she said as Alice ate every part of the apple before jamming the entirety of the sandwich into her mouth at once. Once she had finished her own food, Alice snatched the half-eaten sandwich from her friend’s hands, “Hey, that’s mine and it has mayo on it, you hate mayo,” said Mel but Alice didn’t seem to be hearing her.
It was true that Alice didn’t like mayo and part of brained gagged in revulsion at the taste of the sandwich in her mouth but it was overruled by the alien influence in her brain that demanded she eat and as much as possible, with this Alice then snatched the remaining sandwich from Mel’s lunch box. “What’s going on with you?” asked Mel as Alice stuffed the sandwich into her mouth without bothering to take off the plastic wrapping. After eating both of their lunches within a minute Alice let the empty lunch boxes dropped to the ground as she stood up and ran off leaving Mel sitting by herself.

Alice tore around the school grabbing bags, stripping them of food and stuffing what she found into her mouth. Despite several eyewitnesses complaining later the staff decided to blame it on foxes as the amount of food eaten was far too much to consumed by any person in one sitting little lone a 14-year-old girl. It was more than anyone person could eat, Alice had taken the lunch of over thirty students during recess, as she ate more and more Alice started feeling a new pain in her stomach that of a stomach ache as her body tried to contain the amount of food she was eating. This pain was initially overruled her insatiable hunger but as she ate the pain grew worse and worse.

A few minutes before the end of recess Alice, now somewhat in control of herself stumbled into one of the rest rooms, moaning as she clutched her swollen stomach feeling like she was about to explode. She went into one of the cubicles ready to throw up, but she couldn’t. Her body was sending messages saying that she eaten to much food and was fit to burst but it refused to give any of it up. Alice knelt there until the unbearable pain in her belly became a dull throb.

She was about to exit the cubicle when she heard someone outside, it was Kate. Alice couldn’t let Kate or friends see her like this (or anyone else for that matter), Alice couldn’t get a clear view of how big her stomach was but it was obviously swollen. She didn’t know how long Kate and her friends were there beforehand but it was clear they didn’t know that Alice was in here, or that it was Alice at the very least. Alice waited as Kate and her entourage finished what they came in to do (fix their hair and makeup by sounds of it) while Kate boasted about her rich, well connected parents.

When Kate and her hangers-on had left the rest room Alice open the cubicle door and check to see if the bathroom was clear. It was and Alice stepped out of the cubicle, and examined herself in the mirror. Whilst it still covered her Alice’s shirt couldn’t hide the shape of her belly which was a definite curve bulging out from Alice’s body. She peeled up the material to take look at her stomach and shuddered when it became apparent that the belly was all her, taut skin and flattened belly button making her look 20 weeks pregnant. She gingerly prodded her swollen middle with a finger and winced both from the conformation that it was real and the pain of her already tight gut being poked.

The door suddenly open, Alice’s first thought was to hide but there was not enough time. She saw that the person entering the rest room was Mel, who upon spotting Alice started saying, “Alice there you are, what is going on with y…” she fell silent as she saw the bulge of Alice’s bare belly still visible. There was moment of brief silence which was broken by Mel asking, “Is that real?” she said reaching out a hand to touch her friend’s swollen stomach.
Alice instinctively stepped back subconsciously moving her hands protectively over her belly and its contents, “I don’t know.”
“Are you pregnant?” continued Mel.
“No!” exclaimed Alice imminently, “I…Well…Just,” she stuttered, “ever since this morning I have been really hungry and just kept eating and now,” she gestured to the curve of her belly.
“You need to see the school nurse,” said Mel.
“NO!” said Alice much louder and more urgently than she intended. The alien embryos currently growing inside her were making many changes to Alice. Her 14-year-old body was being flooded with a variety of hormones many of which were alien in chemical makeup. One of these was giving strong desire to protect her unborn brood, Alice didn’t know what she was carrying inside her or what was happening to body but she had a strong desire to protect her…'belly’ from threatened.
Mel was taken aback by her friend’s sudden response, “No?”
“Isn’t science class about to start?” said Alice.
“Well yes, but what about you?” asked Mel.
Alice decided to…
124112122.title: Alice her own food and more.

1243.content:
Nina is a thirteen year old girl who is in deep training to one day be part of a MLP team. Major League Pregnancy came to the forefront of sports in the last three decades as the events started to become more popular. Girls are implanted with a rapidly developing pregnancy (either 9 hours, 24 hours, or three days depending on devision) and get points based on how well they carry, how healthy the infant is at birth, how smoothly the birth goes (with bonus points for doing it unassisted) and overall maintaining of the motherly image.

Nina can't start competing on a team until age 15 but for now her father (an Olympic pregnancy coach) is helping her to prepare herself for her career. Ava partakes of pregnancies on the weekends and is getting better and better each time around.

Will you follow her career?
1243.title: More Choices

12431.content: What league is Nina training to be a part of?
12431.title: Major leagues here we come!'

choices: "Not really. I'm nervous about going so much faster."
Nina actually feels a little ill. Pull over for morning sickness.
124311.content:
Nina tapped her pen lightly on her desk as she stared intently at the clock on the wall across the classroom. She only had a few minutes before class would be out and she could start her weekend. It was to be another training weekend for her. She had been going through her training and had become used to the sensation of carrying a pregnancy on the 3 day course but now she would be doing her first nine hour pregnancies. There would be 3 this weekend. One tonight, one on Saturday, and one on Sunday. It was going to be a rather intensive training session but she was excited about it.

She was lucky that her father's connections had gotten them use of synthetic pregnancy serums. A simple injection and her body would go through an entire pregnancy on its own but at the birth the child would be simply made of a jelly-like substance that would remain firm until it had been out of her body a few minutes and then could simply be tossed out. Only official matches resulted in a living child and those would be given to pre-determined parents after everything was all said and done. At least this way Nina could practice carrying a child.

The practice had left its mark on her body. After her fist pregnancy her hips had widened, leading to a need for her to get a new wardrobe. Her once barely-there breasts had filled with milk and now were a little on the ample side for a girl her age. Part of the image of being a mother was good milk production though so she didn't mind the need that she had to pump them in the morning and before bed to keep the milk pressure from building up.

At the tone of the end of day bell Nina jumped up and hurried off to her locker to gather her things up so she could leave for home. The eighth grader packed her bag with practiced ease and trotted out the doors to the car where her father was waiting for her. A silver box with a small hole in it was waiting on the front seat for her. Nina picked it up and buckled in, holding it in her lap. She stuffed her finger in the hole and felt a small prick of a needle. There was a whirring noise, a second prick, and finally a cheery beep to let her know the serum was properly in her body. She pulled her finger out and turned to put the box in the backseat. It would take only a few moments for the serum to travel her body and the pregnancy to begin, from there it was only nine hours until she was ready to begin her labor.

"This is the next big step in your training, Nina." Her father said, not taking his eyes off the road. "You're finally preparing for your league. You'll be my shining star the second you're ready to go on the team if your keep up like this. Most girls don't do rapid league until they've actually played long league for a year. Are you excited?"
124311.title: Rapid league (9 hour)

choices: They make it to the cabin without incident
There is a traffic jam so they are delayed about an hour (3 hour drive)
Traffic is severe and they get a bit lost taking a different route
1243111.content:
"Well, yeah, of course I am Dad!" Nina laughed before lightly patting her midsection. "I've been looking forward to starting my rapid league runs." Her father nodded and glanced at his watch for a moment.

"Well it's 3:30 now, so if you run exactly nine hours you'll go into labor at half-past midnight. You could always run a little over too, though. You should be getting about one week of growth every fifteen minutes so you're going to balloon up a lot quicker than you're used to. I want you to change into some maternity clothes as soon as we get to the cabin. We can't have you stretching out another one of your school uniforms." Nina nodded at what she was told and bent over to pull the book she was meant to read for her literature class out of her backpack.

Whenever they were in a training session, whether it be over the course of a three day weekend, a school break, or summer vacation, Nina's father took her to their cabin out in the country. It was surrounded by woods and secluded enough that they wouldn't shock anyone with the sight of a pregnant 13 year old so she would be free to go outside and relax a little. Not to mention they wouldn't wake anyone when she went into labor that night if she were to make any noise. It was a good 2 hours to drive there though so she would be able to get through a small chunk of her homework before they arrived.
1243111.title: "I sure am!"

choices: Go for a walk before it gets dark
12431112.content:
Unfortunately, there was some construction on the road that they had forgotten would be there so the usual ride ended up taking longer than normal as most cars seemed to have trouble with the basic concept of merging from three lanes into two. By the time they pulled up to the cabin, Nina was squirming in her seat as the waistband of her uniform skirt was digging into her skin thanks to her now three month pregnant form. She got out of the car and dashed inside as soon as the door of the cabin was unlocked. She slipped into her bedroom and unzipped the skirt, letting out a sigh of relief as she rubbed a hand over her now rather plump midsection. She slipped off her button up and blazer as well before putting on a pair of sweatpants with a nice stretchy waistband and a tank top.

The tank top was form fitting and would only ride up on her belly as he pregnancy progressed but Nina liked the feeling that she was overfilling her clothing and popping out of them. The tank top's nice stretchable material was perfect for this and the growth wouldn't ruin any clothes this way. She wandered out of her room and dug in the duffel bag of things that had been brought from home to grab her pump. She milked herself to keep the pressure from building up and simply poured the milk out as she didn't have any child to feed it to. Her father was coming out of his own room as she finished pouring it out, having finished putting his own things away for the weekend.

"Coming along very nicely." he hummed as he knelt down and rolled Nina's shirt up, pressing his fingers lightly to the swell of her midsection. "Your body is certainly handling the rapid growth speed like it should. Those long league runs were good at getting you in shape for your real training. He cupped the bottom of the bump with one hand and nodded. "What do you think? Any pain?"

"It's not uncomfortable, no. I feel really great actually. I'm hitting the second trimester stride, I think." Nina stroked a hand over her stomach with a grin. "Just look at how big I'm already getting." She chirped, giving her stomach a firm pat as she glanced at the clock, noting that she had progressed another half a month since arriving at the cabin, her belly standing at three and a half months of growth.
12431112.title: There is a traffic jam so they are delayed abou...

choices: They get lost as Nina continues to progress
12431113.content:
There was not only one, but four accidents along the freeway on the way to the cabin, making the traffic slow to a crawl. By the time they had been in traffic for 3 hours, Nina was squirming uncomfortably, the waistband of her uniform slacks digging into her body just above her hips as her belly started to plump up. “Dad...” she whined another hour later as she opened the button and zipper, letting her pants fall open as her womb continued to fill, stomach swelling outwards. Her father swore under his breath and got off the freeway.

“Sorry sweetheart. Let’s see about getting to the cabin.” He reached over and pat her bloated middle through her shirt where her skin was tightening and stretching. Already the buttoned up uniform was growing tight as it was made of a non-stretching material. Nina touched her belly lightly, knowing that if she kept growing in it, she would soon be straining her buttons.

The truck tumbled down the country side roads as the girl’s belly continued to bloat up.
12431113.title: Traffic is severe and they get a bit lost takin...

choices: They manage to get to the cabin
They're still lost a little bit longer but make it
They are hopelessly lost. Nina may have to give birth in the truck!
124311132.content:
"Where the hell is the damn cabin..." Nina's father grumbled as he pulled over and grabbed his phone from the center console to take a look at the map on it so he could figure out which way to go. Nina had been worried when they had hit the slow traffic but she had only gotten more and more concerned as their progress towards the cabin had slowed.

She had now been pregnant for 5 hours and appeared to be 22 weeks pregnant. Her belly jutted out from her body and strained the button up shirt that was part of her school uniform. She had given up on her pants completely, letting them sit unbuttoned and open so her belly could hang out.

She let out a yelp as the button over her bellybutton flew off her shirt, pinging off the windshield before landing on the dashboard of the truck. Her father looked over with wide eyes, realizing just how pregnant his daughter had become. Nina quickly unbuttoned a few more strained buttons so they wouldn't break off, leaving her belly open to the air.

"Oh god. I'm sorry sweetheart. I promise we'll get you to the cabin soon. You look like you need some rest. I wanted your first rapidly league to be comfy for you. Not like this."
124311132.title: They get lost as Nina continues to progress

choices: They make it to the cabin after Nina`s birth.
1243111323.content:
Nina fast asleep on the passenger seat next to her father. 2 hours had progressed as Nina`s father was annoyed to that he had not found the cabin. Her swollen mound now resembled that of a 28 week pregnant belly, as it pushed against the seat belt. Even the seat belt dug into her skin irritating Nina. Making the thirteen year old wake up as she looked down to her massive belly.

"Dad..... I`m on my third trimester. I.. I don`t want to give birth in a truck....." Nina worryingly looked at her father, who was driving the truck trying to find their destination. "Hun. Believe in daddy. We will make it to the cabin before you give birth." Nina`s father trying to relax his thirteen year old daughter.

1 more hours progressed (11:30). Seat belt now stretched across Nina`s gravid form, Chest as swollen; ready to be milked. Nina now felt braxton hicks contractions telling her body it was going to be soon. "NNnnghh.... Dad... I feel braxton hicks and it hurts.... Mmmphh!! I think its.... its almost time..." Nina whimpered as she held both hands on her fertile mound. "We are almost there..." As the gps on the phone finally given them directions to the cabin.

9th hour had hit(12:30 midnight). They were still ways off from the cabin. Nina had reached early labor, contractions squeezing the small thirteen years olds womb. Moaning and panting trying to get through each contractions coming in waves. "Dad?? What time.... nnnghhh.. is it?? I... I`m in early labor.... mmmpphh!!" Nina whimpered as she questioned her father. "Half-past midnight." Nina`s father answered quickly "Should I pull over and you give birth here?" Nina nodded yes as she felt another wave of contractions hit teenage womb.

3 hours into early labor (3:00). Nina`s father kept track on her contractions, now spaced 4 minutes apart and lasting 60 seconds each entering active labor. "I.... I feel... feel aaaaaaaaaaaaauuuhhhhhhhhh!!! it.... hurtsss.... uncomfortable...." Nina moaned as her belly shrank in front of her father. "Take off your underwear and lean on the truck outside." Her father commanded as she listened and went outside and leaned on the truck. Swaying her hips back and forth feeling another hitting her teenage womb.

2 hours into active labor (5:00). Contractions now 2 minute apart, lasting 60 seconds each entering transitioning phase. "I WANT TO PUSH!!!" Grabbing onto the truck as Nina tried not to yell at the top of her lungs. "Nina don`t push yet. You`re in your transition phase. It`s almost over." As Nina`s father calmed his 13 year old daughter.

4 hours into transitioning (9:30). "I feel... pressure......" Nina said as she felt the urge to push now rang through her female core. Listening to her fathers encouraging 'Push... Nina... push' concentrating as each contraction came. Feeling the burning feeling in her crotch "Nina your doing great... Keep pushing with the contractions" Nina`s father encouraged her. Reaching between her legs she felt the firm jelly-like substance of the head with one hand grabbing on the side of the truck. One final push and the firm jelly-like substance that looked like a baby came out of Nina. Her father congratulating her on how well she did, held her up with a princess hold and laid her to sleep in the truck.
1243111323.title: They are hopelessly lost. Nina may have to give...

choices: Nina takes the 9 hour pregnancy serum now.
Nina takes the 9 hour pregnancy serum after lunch.
12431113231.content: Its Saturday afternoon. Nina slept since giving birth in the truck. What does she do now that they have arrived to the cabin.
12431113231.title: They make it to the cabin after Nina`s birth.

choices: Relax as Nina blissfully watches her midriff swell
124311132312.content:
"Dad, I`m going to rest a bit before eating lunch!" Nina told her father, as she was in her room as she pumped out her swollen breast straining her middle school figure. Yesterday was by far the worst pregnancy she had experienced in her training to go Major Leagues. Yet she had to power through and keep on training. So she can make her father happy.

"Nina! Lunch is ready eat up!" Nina`s father yelled to get his daughter to get her attention, who was still in her room.
"Coming!~ I`m almost done!~~" Who had finished up the pump on her breast that had built up milk pressure from the day before.

"I`m sorry, you had to go through such an experience." Apologizing to his middle school daughter, patting her head and giving her a hug. "You don`t need to practice if you want." Pushing her dad back a bit, Nina winked "I can handle this practice, I`m a very capable girl. Lets eat Dad."

After lunch, Nina`s dad placed the small silver box in front of her. "Let`s get to practicing, my little sweetheart." Picking up the small silver box, placing it on her lap. She placed her index finger inside the small hole and felt a small prick of a needle. Then came the whirring noise, a second prick and finally the cheery beep; she had gotten so accustomed to know that the rapid league serum was properly injected into her body.

"5:15pm, now. exactly 9 hours from now you`ll go into labor quarter past 2am. You know the drill right?"
124311132312.title: Nina takes the 9 hour pregnancy serum after lunch.

choices: They somehow manage to get to the cabin.
They are still stuck. Nina may have to deliver in the truck!
124311133.content:
The truck engine blew in black smoke. Nina`s father pulled over to the side of the country road. "Stay in the truck sweetheart. Dad is going to make a phone call." He pats her bloated stretched middle and kissing her forehead. Waiting for her dad to finish the phone call for the truck to get towed and a ride to the cabin. She unbuckled the straining seat belt relieving the soon to be pregnant belly.

She had been pregnant for 5 hours now and appeared to be 22 weeks pregnant. Her midsection now bulged out and strained her button up shirt that was her school uniform. She had given up on her pants, letting them sit unbuttoned and loose so her belly can hang out.

Sighs escaped her mouth as her middle section started to expand just a bit. The button above her belly button flew off her shirt, pinging the windshield and landed on her exposed belly. Nina quickly unbuttoned her shirt so they wouldn`t strain and break off, uncovered in the open for any cars that passed to see a 23 week eighth grader.

"Sweetheart. Oh god. We`ll get you to the cabin soon. I wanted your first rapid league to be a comfy and relaxing as possible.."
124311133.title: The truck breaks down!

12432.content:
The world has changed a lot in recent years. Teen pregnancy is now hip, cool, and seen as downright normal, with a good chunk of local shopping centers given over to shops that either kickstart a pregnancy, help girls find a family to give their child over to, or maternity shops specifically for teens. In fact, in some places, a young girl's popularity is gauged by how many children she has had!

It's Allie's 13th birthday, meaning she is now eligible to get pregnant. And guess whose mom is taking her to get invitro-ed at the mall as a birthday present?
12432.title: Another option please

124321.content:
Allie had been practically vibrating in her seat the whole drive to the mall. How could she not be? It was her thirteenth birthday and as a result she was finally eligible to get pregnant. As a birthday present her mother was forgoing a birthday party and instead taking her to the local impreg nation parlor in order for the young girl to be impregnated for the first time.

Allie had an excited bounce in her step as they went in and her mother confirmed their appointment at the front counter. With a kiss to the top of her head, she sent her daughter off, letting the young girl be ushered into one of the tiny rooms behind the counter.

“Welcome!” A cheery woman in a lab coat said as Ellie climbed into the large chair that was much like the one at the dentist. “First time?”

“Yes ma’am!”

“Well, that is exciting! Congratulations sweetie. I’m sure you’re going to have a whole lot of very cute babies. Have you thought about how many you want to have for your first pregnancy?”
124321.title: Allie's birthday!

choices: Shop for maternity clothing in advance
1243211.content:
"I just want one." Allie said bashfully as she looked at her flat belly. Her birthday was in the beginning of the school year, making her the first girls in her class to get impregnated. Which gave her more popularity to her classmates.

"Do you care about the gender?" The women asked Allie, who was seated on the chair that resembled one used in the dentist.
"No, make it a surprise. It`s my birthday today." With a smile that brightened the already lit room.

The women smiled to comfort the eighth grader, turned to the opened drawer. She looked into the drawer content, finding the right syringe and laying Allie`s chair back to the flat position like a hospital bed. "Sweetie. It`s going to feel like pinch." Before pushing Allie`s shirt out of the way, so she could locate her uterus and sticking the needle deep inside her womb. Impregnating the now 13 year old.

Allie left the small room and met her mother in the front desk, fertile with a baby inside her belly. One glance people would not have noticed this ecstatic thirteen year old girl who was pregnant, to had visited the impregnation parlor.
1243211.title: “I want just one to start.”

choices: Shop for maternity clothing in advance
1243212.content:
“I want to have twins.” Allie said confidently as she laid a hand on her stomach. Since her birthday was the first of September, she was the first girl in her class who would be able to be impregnated. She wanted to make a big impression.

“Okay, hon. Twins it is. And according to the preliminary paperwork I have, you wanted to be surprised on the race of the father?”

“Yes.”

“Okay. No problem then.” The woman smiled and turned away, opening up a drawer. She looked at the contents contemplatively before pulling out one of the hypodermic needles and laying Allie’s chair back. “This is going to be a big pinch.” She said before pushing Allie’s shirt out of the way and plunging the needle into her stomach.

Allie wandered out of the small room some time later, pregnant with twin children, though nobody who had not seen her at the impregnation parlor would be able to tell.
1243212.title: “I’d like to have twins!”

choices: Make it to the maternity store
124321233.content:
“Are you alright, honey?” Allie’s mother asked as she looked over at her heavily pregnant daughter. At 30 weeks pregnant, the young girl was sporting a clearly pregnant belly. It rounded out in a smooth dome in front of her. Her shirt was skin tight to the bump and her now quite milky breasts.

“I’m fine mom.” The young girl said happily as she waddled along with her hands in the small of her back. She had a certain amount of pride for being the only girl in the seventh grade who was carrying twins. They would certainly be an early popularity boon when she reached high school. She puffed out a breath at a hard kick from one of her children and rubbed the side of her heavy bump.

Today the goal was a trip to Little Miss Maternity in order to get some new clothes for the pregnant middle schooler. While her school did have a uniform (and even a maternity uniform which was rapidly getting tight on the girl’s twin mound) Allie would still need daily clothes for outside school. And now that spring had come, the yearly line of sundresses for young mothers was bound to be ready, giving the first time mother some excellent choice.
124321233.title: 30 weeks

124322.content: Delilah (14)- Is a goth girl who lives in a haunted house filled with mysterious ghosts. Her mother is constantly pregnant and Delilah wants to find out why. Searching for the truth makes her like her mother.
124322.title: Someone else please

1243222.content: Venus (13) - In the year 3005, humankind has been a part of the universal community for centuries, and their key to entry was their incredible fecundity. Humanities incredible capacity for reproduction has endured them to even the most hard nosed alien races by offering their services as surrogates, allowing even the most endangered species to come back from the brink. Venus is one of the latest batch of volunteers of the Transgalactic Restoration Project, a job she's been looking forward to.
1243222.title: Someone else?

12432221.content:
Venus Delta Arcturus, took another calming breath as she walked amongst the seemingly endless crowd of first time soon-to-be surrogates of colony 456-omega-6, like herself, all ranging from her age to their mid-teens.

They all knew the drill, having heard it from their parents and teachers. Once a year a dozen human colonies were chosen by lottery, and every able bodied female in those colonies would be called upon to bear children for the numerous alien species that the Earth coalition had made close ties with. Afterwards the colonies would be taken out of the running for a year, then right back in they'd go. But with hundreds of colonies and counting, the odds constantly changed. Venus remembered the last time her colony was chosen was way back when she was seven, and her mom carried and gave birth to a litter of Beatlejucians, cat-like semi-humanoids.


But that was in the past, now it was her turn to contribute to the efforts of uniting human kind with the numerous species across the galaxy. And while it was kind of nervewracking it was also really exciting.


Venus ran her fingers through her long blond hair, the soft strands soothing her hightened nerves, as through the speakers in the meeting hall crackled to life, the familar aged voice of Commander Wilson echos through the hall, the neumerous conversations going silent as the leader of colony spoke.

"Greatings to you all, allow me to be the first to say, thank you. Your efforts play a major part in helping to promote peace and coorperation between us and the many other intelegent races that make up the galaxy at large. No doubt your parents have told you what is going to go down, but here's a quick reacap. Once your name is called your are to procede to your designated meeting room where you and your assigned counciler will discuss your options from there you'll be remanded to one of the neumerous on site medical facilities were the implantation will take place, from there it's mostly a matter of treating yourself and your offspring well until the birth. Now without further ado, when your name is called please proceed to your assigned counciling room."

Venus decides to tune things out for a little while, and just think to herself. Somewere in this massive facility her mom was going through this too, it was kind of exciting, she wondered what her mom would be pregnant with, better yet what would she be pregnant with, typically each surrogate was given several options based on their personal physical traits and genetics.

"Venus Delta Arcturus, please report to counciling room 215, repeat Venus Delta Arcturus, please report to counciling room 215."

Venus was snapped out of her thoughts when her named was actually called, and started hustling down the hall, the neumerous holo-displays helpfully pointing her in the right direction. Until at long last she arrived at her councilin room. Taking a second to smooth her hair down, and take a few more calming breaths she swiped her id card over the acess pad and entered to meet her surrogacy counciler.
12432221.title: Venus

choices: Gracie and her sister, pregnant on mother's day!
No, these girls aren't appealing either.
12432222.content:
Daisy Seert has been pregnant with a clutch of seven dragon eggs for almost two months now. The young mother to be looks like she's about to drop a baby at fifty weeks and yet she's had no complications yet. She'll carry the seven eggs for three more months and is currently at the dragon village being seen by one of the half-dragons doctors. (13)

         A few weeks before mother's day, Miss Gracie Quinro begged to become a mommy. She pleaded and pleaded to her daddy to let her and he told her no. She went to her room and began to cry, telling her little sister to go away and that she wished the twelve year old couldn't have a baby if she wasn't allowed one. When Gracie woke up on mother's day however, she and her little sister were brought to the emergency room after being sick for over a week. As it turns out, their both expecting! (14/12)
12432222.title: Someone else

choices: The Girls Are Experiencing Rapid Pregnancies
The Girls Are Pregnant with Multiples
124322222.content:
"Mr. Quinro," the ER doctor said, "I'd like to have a word with your daughters in private, if I may."

Dad nodded, and left the woman alone with his two little girls.

"Now," she said, "can you girls tell me about anything... unusual that the two of you have done, or come in contact with?"

"No, Doctor," Gracie said.

"No, you can't tell me," the doctor pressed, "or no, you can't think of anything?"

"We can't think of anything," Gracie answered.

"Please," Gracie's little sister, Pamela, begged, "we just want to feel better and go home."

"I'd like for you to tell me anything you can think of," the doctor continued, "that might be different from other girls your age, even if it doesn't seem that important."

"Well,... "

"Go on, Pam," the doctor encouraged.

"Gracie and I both want to be mommies. I don't mean when we grow up, I mean we want to have babies now."

"Oh?"

"A few weeks ago, Gracie and Dad got in a fight, and then we got in a fight. I wished that Gracie and I could both have babies together."

"I see. Well, Pam, you've definitely got your wish."

"Huh?" the girls asked in unison.

"The two of you are six to eight weeks pregnant."

Gracie and Pam looked at each other, absorbing this news.

"There's more," the doctor said.

The older sister looked over at Pam and put her hand on top of hers. They smiled at one another and felt the bond of motherhood already growing in their chests.

         "Oh yes please!" The siblings said in unison.

         When the two girls laid down on their respective areas (Gracie on the typical table, Pamela on a temporary gurney) they lifted up their shirts and giggled. They knew what was going on. They were on their first ultrasound appointment right after finding out they were pregnant. That didn't make the gel on their rounding bellies any warmer though.

"So what do you do in this game?" Sam asked as Ellie laid out the game board on Ellie's bedroom floor.

"I'm not really sure. I just found it in the attic and thought it looked like fun." Ellie chirped back with a shrug as she shuffled the cards that had been in the box. They were a pale pinks and blues to match the pastel colors of the game board itself. It was styled like candyland though divided into sections. The first, second, and third trimester sections took up the majority of the board followed by a large star space and five deep red spaces, then a segment that was half the size of the others that was marked 'motherhood'.

"I guess. What are the instructions?"

"Okay...The normal each player rolls the dice to take turns stuff." Ellie said, absentmindedly putting two game pieces on the starting space as she looked the paper over. "On spaces with a question mark on them we have to draw one of the 'mama cards' and follow what it says. Then no matter how much we roll before the birth space, the big star, we have to stop on it and end our turn. Then if we land on one of the red spaces after it we have to go back to the start because we got pregnant again or something. First one to the end wins." She grinned before giving the dice a roll. She rolled a 3 and moved her piece before passing it over to Sam.

131312.content:
"Wait, the card says something else." Ellie indicated as she read Sam's question mark card herself. Sam grabbed the card, re-reading it carefully out loud.

"Bonus Baby! - Add one child. If you are in the first trimester-"

"Which you are," added Ellie, with a grin and a slight chuckle. Sam made a face at her, sticking out her tongue and shutting her eyes.

"-Move to the next question space for a checkup." Sam finished, sitting there in silence. Her piece was left untouched.

"Are you gonna move, or-" Ellie began, being cut off by Sam.

"I don't want another one." Sam said decisively.

"Look, do you wanna be pregnant forever, or do you wanna get rid of these abdominal lumps?" Ellie responded, crossing her arms awkwardly over her slight baby bump. Sam sighed as she reached over toward her piece. As she moved her piece six spaces forward, crossing the second trimester line, she yelped as her belly lurched outward slightly.

"It feels so weird! I'm never gonna get used to this 'belly growth' thing." Sam whined as she glanced down out at her new girth. She was a bit past a third through the board, which she estimated made her 4 months pregnant, but her belly looked more like a 6 month one. She reached over for a card, but stopped as she felt a pressure in her jeans. She leaned back as her jeans' button popped open, unzipping her jeans as an added bonus and showing her panties for Ellie to look at.

"BAHAHAHA!" Ellie screeched, forcing Sam to cover her ears. "Panda undies? What are you, 9?" Ellie giggled out as Sam struggled to cover her intimates.

"Just let me take my card..." Sam squeaked out, blushing furiously. She labored to travel over her medium-sized bump as she lifted the nightmare-inducing card off the top of the pile and read the title.

"Hungry, Hungry Babies!" Sam read out loud, muttering all the curse words she could muster as she imagined what horrors that could entail. She read the description, carefully this time.

"Those kids you're getting are gonna be hungry! Never fear, breast milk is here!

Add one baby.
Your breast size increases by one cup size.
If you haven't started lactating, you are now."

"Wait, what!? Oh n-n-no..." Sam moaned as her 6 month sized belly swelled outward to become a 7 month sized belly. "I'm at the beginning of the second trimester! Why do I have to be so big!?" Sam cried as her breasts followed the way of the belly, growing a cup size bigger than the already expanded D size breasts she got when she first got a belly. Milk began to wet her bra, startling her. "A-ah! Why does it feel so weird!?" she cried, pulling her bra out from under her shirt.

"Look on the bright side, Sammy!" Ellie laughed from behind her puny 3 month one baby belly, ticking Sam off even more than Ellie's use of the childish nickname. "It looks like your turn's over, and you've only got triplets! Things are looking up!"

"Well, guess who's turn it is now?" Sam huffed, tiredly rubbing her swollen midriff.

"Oh, shi-"
131312.title: Whoops! Sam's Eating for More than Three

Sam's just drawing all those cards.
1313121.content:
Ellie hesitantly grabs the die, already working out in her head how awful her life could be if she landed on a question mark space, which, to her dismay, were littered in her section of the board. She was still on the end of the first trimester, but getting one of those cards could mean awful things about her comparatively small belly. She glanced over at Sam, who was unknowingly rubbing her already large belly, which made her look 7 months pregnant with one. As she glanced-

"You gonna roll, or what?" Sam sighed, still passively rubbing her swollen midriff.

"Bug off, Sam, I'm thinking."

"About what?"

"About how not to get a beach ball attached to my stomach like you did," Ellie snarked, causing Sam to gasp and mutter something about her not being that large. Ellie picked up the die, and thought to herself There's seriously A LOT of question marks here... Looks like I need to roll a 2 or 4 to get out of those stupid cards... Ellie winced, and rolled the die onto her bedroom floor. A four. "A four!" Ellie whooped, moving her piece over the 2nd trimester line. With each space she passed, she could feel her womb moving outward slightly. Surprisingly, Ellie landed one space after Sam, making her technically farther along than Sam. Of course, she was still way smaller, something she gloated about to Sam for the next minute, but she was starting to get a real baby belly.

As Ellie passed the die to Sam, she smirked and said, "Hope that's not a fourth coming..."

Sam put the die down and flipped Ellie off for over a minute.
1313121.title: Ellie gets nothing.
