13131211.content:
After giving Ellie several birds, Sam picked up the die, ready to deal with all the crap this game had to throw at her. She was cool. She was confident. She was- Oh who was she kidding, she was pregnant with triplets while in high school.

Taking a quick glance at the game board, she realized she was nearing the end. The third trimester was just one space away, and Sam still had a volleyball attached to her stomach area. These kids weren't going away, it seemed. Okay, so if I get a one, I'm good. Past that, there's only a free space 4 and 6 spaces away. Here's hoping I get a one. she thought as she gripped the die tightly. "It's now or never."

The die bounced a few times before landing on a... "A ONE!" Sam cried in relief, moving the designated spaces and feeling the classic pressure in her gut as it shot forward a surprising amount for just one space. This really was the third trimester.

"WOW, you're getting big," said Ellie, clearly beside herself with joy at viewing Sam's new round shape.

"Just you wait, pal. You're gonna get it soon." Sam snorts back.
13131211.title: Sam actually just lands on a regular space.

131312111.content:
Ellie chuckled. "I've been perfectly fine so far..." Ellie glanced at her slightly inflated middle, then at Sam's. "...relatively speaking. What's the worst that can happen?"

"Famous last words. Should we put that as your yearbook quote?" Sam half-growled.

"I was thinking more 'AH THERE'S A SMALL CHILD UP MY VAGINA' sort of thing. Really hit home on the teen mom thing we've got going here," Ellie joked as she picked up the dice. "Besides, I should be fine. The only question mark space is 6 spaces away."

"I told you, you're gonna get it soon. I bet my firstborn son you're gonna roll a 6." Sam joked back.

"Ew, I don't want your spawn. I got my own to take care of," Ellie responded as she rolled the dice. She looked back at Sam. "Check it. I'm gonna get a 4 or someth-" Ellie stopped dead. She rolled a 6. "You've gotta be kidding!" is what Ellie wanted to say, but her complaint was drowned out by Sam's wheezy laughter. "Alright, Sam, that's enough." Ellie warned. Sam was still laughing. "SHUT UP!" Ellie shouted. Sam went stony-faced.

"Move the piece, Ellie. Pick up a card," Sam whispered. Ellie pouted.

"God, now I know how you feel. I really, really, don't want to move it." Ellie admitted.

"Well, you gotta. I told you that you were gonna get it. No one is lucky forever." Sam chuckled. Ellie sighed, and then moved her piece the required six spaces. Her belly lurched forward. She now carried 7 and a half months worth of baby and baby gunk. She was starting to get hefty, though she was nowhere near Sam's belly, which made her look like she was full term with one, despite being at the beginning of the third trimester.

Ellie hesitantly reached for the card stack. If there's some magic god watching over this game, please have mercy! Ellie thought as she picked up her card. Ellie read the card aloud.

"It says..."

"Come on Ellie I want to see what you get" Sammy with the smart remarks.

One of them has to go to the bathroom to take care of it
13132.content:
Ellie looked to her friend and threw the dice onto the board, watching as it clattered to a stop. "Four.", she said, and counted out the squares with her piece. When she was done, her piece settled on a blue question mark space a few squares from the second trimester. Her hand still on her belly, Ellie reached for the pile of shuffled cards and drew the one on top. "Well, time to see what these are all about.", she said, and began to read silently, but then spoke the card aloud so Sam would know what it said.

"Find a bathroom with great quickness,
Every mother must endure morning sickness.

All players get morning sickness for one turn."

"Oh geez...", Ellie mumbled, unhappy with the notion of facing one the better-known aspects of pregnancy.

"Ughhh...", Sam groaned and leaned back, massaging her stomach, trying to settle it. Her tummy had suddenly started doing flip-flops, and the room was spinning. "Quick El, just hand me the dice. I've gotta take my turn."

Ellie leaned over and passed them to her friend. It seems like she wasn't feeling as bad as Sam, but she still wanted to get it over with as fast as possible.
13132.title: First Mama Card

choices: Nothing unusual happens this turn either
Sam lands on a question mark space
Ellie lands on a question mark space
131323.content:
Sam sighed and tapped her piece along the board 3 times, landing just after another question mark space. With each tap along the squares, she could feel a trembling in the skin under her palm. Her womb was expanding faster than before, to accommodate the rapid growth spurts of the second trimester. There was some temporary relief as her morning sickness lessened, but it still lingered. She passed the dice to Ellie. "Your turn."

Ellie shook the dice and tossed it onto the board. Once it stopped rolling, the two of them felt instantly better. Last turn's effect had worn off, and they both breathed a sigh of relief. Ellie took off her hoodie and threw it on the bed. If something was going to happen to her, she wanted to see it.

Looking at where the die had landed she said, "Ooh, a six...", with a hint of smugness in her voice. She got on her knees and bent over the board, tapping out the spaces, and placing hers just one square ahead of Sam's. When she rocked back to sit on her butt, Ellie saw she had grown considerably, catching up to Sam's size.

At this point, they were both starting to look expecting. Before, they were just a little chubbier around their midsection. Now, their tummies were getting a rounded paunch, and the tank top that had accentuated Ellie's slimness that afternoon was starting to betray her, slipping up to her bellybutton and leaving nothing underneath to the imagination. She prodded it with her finger, finding that it still had some give, but that there was a foreign firmness in its core. Sam was at that moment finding the same thing. Her belly was still largely concealed by her shirt, but it wouldn't stay that way for much longer than a turn or two more.

At this point they're almost a third of the way through the second trimester zone.
131323.title: Relief

choices: They start to move into the third trimester section
1313232.content:
"Here, pass.", Sam said, pointing to the dice on the board, which was closer to Ellie.

Ellie pushed it to Sam's side, and Sam took it, shaking it in her palm. She let it loose, and it tumbled across the board and bumped against Ellie's ankle. "Looks like 3, Sam.", she said, and pushed it forward so her friend could see. Sam nodded and picked up her piece, tapping it forward three spaces... onto a question mark square.

"Oh boy...", she mumbled, and reached for the pile between them. She swiftly pulled a rosy pink card from the stack and held it to her chest, not wanting to look. Taking a deep breath, Sam held it up and began to read from the card.

"One is fun but two is better
take one and your babies, now add them together!

The number of babies you're carrying increases by one."

Ellie stared with wide eyes as Sam gasped and clutched her middle. "No no no noooooohf...." While it was a fairly easy assumption to say she looked pregnant before, there could be no questioning it now. As the growing and stretching in her midsection slowed down, she looked like she was in her third trimester, and a decent way through. "Whoo... whooo...", she panted, and reclined to make more space for her swollen belly.

"Whoa.", Ellie said, regaining her composure. She looked between her belly and that of her friend's. Sam's middle had now rounded out, the skin looking to be a smooth spherical curve. A dark brownish line ran from her belly button down into her parts, and a lighter line ran from her belly button up to her chest. Speaking of her belly button, it had popped out now. It had gone from its usual innie state and had popped out from the increased pressure, protruding almost half an inch.

Sam rubbed her belly with both hands. "Ugghhhh, I feel so fuuuulll..." She could barely sit cross-legged at this point. Chuckling, she said, "Better hope you don't get a card like that El, you'll lose your girlish figure... feels pretty good though~"

Ellie looked at her stomach again, just big enough to cradle. "Ha, Sam. I think we've got other things to worry about."

She shrugged. "Just having a little fun."

Ellie reached for the die and rolled it onto the board.
1313232.title: Sam lands on a question mark space

choices: Now she hits a question mark space
13132323.content:
"A five..."

Ellie counted out the spaces, crossing the border into the third trimester. Now, each space was a significant growth. She looked down at her belly, counted a space, and watched it expand by another eighth of an inch. Another space, another eighth of an inch, and she watched her belly button twitch and pop out, matching Sam's. One more eighth of an inch... and another question space. She rocked back and forth to reach for the deck, and fell back with a thump.

Sam smirked and Ellie shot her back a glare. "Well hey, at least we've got some padding now." Sam pat her bum, then her hips. They had also seen their share of growth since the two of them had started playing. Sam's jeans were starting to get strained, and since she unbuttoned them earlier, the zipper had come the rest of the way undone.

Ellie squeezed one of her chubby hips. "This is gonna be such a pain to work off.", she complained. She worked herself onto one knee, then to standing, and waddled to her mirror. Ellie ran her hands down her bulging baby bump, turning to see how she looked from the side. "Geez, I look so big..." Her tank top had long since rolled up and didn't cover an inch of her belly. She poked at her belly button, shivering a little at how it felt. It was pretty sensitive... She looked down at the card she drew.

"You're getting bigger, it's what you'd expect,
but now you're going to get a little more wet.

Your chest increases in size, and you begin
lactating if you haven't already."

Her tank slid a little higher, bulging out as her chest grew half a cup size more than its already swollen state. Just a few moments afterwards, Ellie felt a tingling, and two blotches appeared, milk leaking into the fabric. She squeezed her chest, and a white spurt dripped down her front on each side. "Hey, can we take a break?", Ellie asked.

"Yeah, could use one.", Sam scooched back and leaned on the bed to help her stand up. When she did stand, her belly slumped down, putting extra pressure on her bladder. "Oh boy, these two feel like they're gonna fall out.", she joked. "I gotta get to the bathroom." She waddled past Ellie and out into the hall, disappearing into the bathroom.

Feeling the weight of her child on her frame for the first time, Ellie would have to agree. She slowly began to descend the stairs one at a time, leaning on the railing for support. When she did make it to the bathroom, she didn't have much time to spare. It was surreal, being completely normal earlier that day, and now having to spread her legs wide just to accommodate her belly when she sat down... It was then that she felt movement.

Ellie gasped, and watched as a bump appeared on the surface of her skin. She quickly finished and left, calling for Sam.

"I'm right here.", came the reply, and Ellie followed it into the kitchen. "I was just making something to eat. I'm starving!", Sam just finished cutting a sandwich and putting it on a plate, piled high with chips. She passed the plate to Ellie. "There's a glass of juice for you too."

"Never mind that, Sam! I felt it moving!"

"Yeah?", smirked Sam. "Me too.", she nodded her head towards her belly, and Ellie saw that every so often, a bump appeared from a kick. Without giving it much thought, she put a hand on Sam's stomach, feeling the twins squirming inside.

"Y'know, even if this is a little scary... I'm kind of into it."

"Say that after you're carrying twins... and after birth..."

That dampened the mode a little, both of them fearing how it would feel, but somewhat encouraged by the idea that a magical pregnancy would probably reduce some of the pain. They returned upstairs with sandwiches and juice in hand, and on the way Ellie noticed Sam wasn't wearing her jeans. "Yeah, they were getting a little tight so I left 'em in the bathroom.", she snapped the waistband of her panties. "You've got it easy with sweatpants." The two of them sat back down by the board game and started munching their snacks.

"Your turn, right Sam?"
13132323.title: Ellie hits it

choices: Ellie lands on a question space
Ellie advances to the star pretty quickly
Sam lands on a another question space.
131323231.content:
She took a bite of her sandwich, wiped her mouth, and rolled again. A three. Right onto El's square. "This is gonna be good.", she chuckled. Sam reached for her piece over her gravid belly, and tapped it across the third trimester line until she landed on Ellie's space. "Boy...twins sure make you grow faster..." Despite being at the same time in development, about seven or eight months, Sam looked like she was full term. She put both hands on either side of her belly. "They're sitting right against my cervix, El."

"Yeah?", Ellie asked, only half paying attention. She was rubbing the brown line that separated her belly in two, and flicking her outtie bellybutton playfully.

"Hey, Earth to Ellie. Another card. Could you pass it? I'm a little far."

Ellie nodded, pushing the pile so it was more between them, rather than on her side. Sam closed her eyes and drew the blue card from the top of the stack.

"Don't be afraid, this won't hurt.
All mommies get a little growth spurt

All players' hips increase and move forward 2 spaces"

The two of them both held their legs, feeling as their hips widened, giving more space between their legs for their babies' eventual delivery. At this point, Ellie decided to join Sam. She stood up with a grunt, undid the drawsting of her sweatpants and slipped them down under her now-cushy butt. She stepped out of them and kicked them in the direction of her closet, all the while clutching her belly. "God I'm so fat...at least that card was pretty tame."

"You aren't fat~", Sam reassured her. "You're... fertile!", and she grinned, and moved her piece the required two spaces, leaning back as her womb bloated another half an inch, filling up with more amniotic fluid and baby, the twins rushing to take up space.

Ellie stuck out her tongue. "Who's fertile now?", and she moved her piece forward with her toe, tipping forward a little as the extra weight was added to her middle while she was standing up. She sat back down again with a thump, her chest bouncing and spurting a little more milk. It had been quietly seeping since last turn, and dark lines of wetness ran all the way down her tank top. "Me, I guess.", and the two of them laughed together.

They were quiet for a moment, patting their tummies as the babies inside kicked and wiggled in return. There was an occasional "oof" or "oww" as they kicked at more tender spots, but for the most part it was fun. "You know...", Ellie said, "I was kinda freaked out at first", she looked to Sam, "and I still kind of am... But this feels pretty nice." She uncrossed her legs, spreading them out to give her belly room, even if it did still rest on her thighs a little. "I might be tempted to play again."

"Hey El, let's just get through this game and see if you wanna play again, okay?", Sam rocked onto her side and picked up the dice, blushing, "...but I might want to join you if you do...Your turn."
131323231.title: Fun for Everyone

1313232313.content:
Ellie rolled again, just a three. She moved forward without much issue, landing between two question spaces. She pulled at the neckline of her stretched tank top at her breasts, already outgrowing and slipping out of her bra. They had grown a little bigger over the last few turns, getting more firm, and the nipples discoloring to match that of the line running down her belly. She moved the dice Sam's way. "How's your chest doing?", she asked curiously.

Sam picked up the die and felt her chest. Things were getting tight, but she could still use her bra, even if it was starting to slip downwards. "Not bad. Wondering if the two of them'll have enough to eat.", she smiled and patted her belly, shirt rolling up suddenly to her chest. She blushed and pulled it back down, hooking it on her belly button. It held for a moment, stretching tight over her skin, but it scrunched back almost immediately. Seems that it would no longer hold the growth of two squirming kicking babies AND a growing chest.

Sam shook the dice in her hand and took a drink. "C'mon three...", and she let go, watching as it clattered to the board and showed four pips. Ellie stuck her tongue out teasingly, and Sam grinned back in reply. She moved her piece to land one ahead of Ellie, and within a few turns of the end of the third trimester. Her belly was growing more rapidly than ever, visibly expanding out with each square passed. Sam groaned lightly as each growth occurred, and when she finished she was looking a little overdue. Her womb was stuffed so full of her unborn children that she leaned forward even when sitting, resting her hands on top. There was a shininess to it, light reflecting off the taut, smooth skin.

She took a pink card from the top of the deck and read it to herself, then read it again. "Hmmm...", she mumbled, and grinned as she looked to Ellie.

"Move too fast and your water may break,
choose a player to whom this card takes.

Choose one player to move straight to the
Birth Star. You may choose yourself."

Ellie held her breath as Sam raised the card and placed it in front of...
1313232313.title: A Decisive Move

choices: Sam made it to the Birth Star as well!
13132323131.content:
Ellie let out a small gasp of disbelief as she saw her friend place the card in front of her with a sheepish grin.

"Sam! What the heck?" She cried out. Groaning as she grew bigger and bigger all around her body as she moved her piece down the board.

"Heh, sorry Ellie, I just needed a breather after all of that growth." Sam replied, shrugging as her friend glared at her.

"Well jokes on you because at this point even though I'm on the birth star you're still bigger than me!" Ellie pointed out, sticking her tongue out at Sam in mockery.

At the mention of the birth star, Sam shifted in her seat.

"Hey El?"

"Yeah Sam?" Ellie frowned as she heard the concern in her friend's voice.

"That space on the board won't actually make you give birth will it?" Sam inquired with a nervous look.

"Nah, I don't think so," Ellie chuckled, shaking her head in dismissal, "whatever this magic stuff mimicking a pregnancy is will probably go away her in a few minutes I'm sure and..." Ellie suddenly froze midsentence as her eyes widened as if suddenly realizing something.

"Uhm...Ellie?" Sam asked anxiously, noting her friend's sudden silence. "Are you-

"Sam," Ellie suddenly interrupted, her voice eerily calm, "I think I might have been wrong..."

"What do you mean?" Sam questioned, her friend's distant stare beginning to terrify her. Instead of answering her friend however, Ellie simply heaved herself upright, revealing that the bottom half of her was now damp.

"My water broke..." Ellie finished, clutching her belly tightly as she looked down in horror before looking back up to meet her friend's equally terrified visage. "Sam I think we should- Ahhhaaa!" Ellie cried out and doubled over in pain as she felt what could only be a contraction hit her.

"Ellie!" Sam cried out, hoisting herself upright and moving to her friends side of the table as fast as she could before placing a hand on her back in support. "Come on now deep breaths...just hang on we have to get you to a hospital!"

"N-no time!" Ellie shakily whispered, "I can- Ahghhh- I can feel it coming!"

"Then how are we going to deliver your baby Ellie?!?" Sam yelled, "I don't know anything on it and I might go into labor too at this rate!"

"Not s-sure..." Ellie grunted, "there has t-to...oh god...has to be...a way!" Ellie opened her mouth to speak, before suddenly vanishing from Sam's vision entirely, leaving the twin-laden girl alone.

"Ellie? Ellie!!!" Sam screamed, desperately looking around for her friend but finding no trace of her existence in the room.

Suddenly, a card that looked identical to the mama cards appeared in front of Sam face down. She hesitantly took the card before turning it over.

"Congratulations! One or more players have currently been transferred to the delivery room in order to bring their newborn(s) into the world! The affected players will be gone for a minimum of two turns, with an extra turn for each baby past a single delivery. Make sure to congratulate them on their bundle(s) of joy once they return!"

Relief wasged over Sam as she finished reading the card. "Well at least that means Ellie is safe and sound." She muttered to herself. Guess I'm going solo for a couple of turns then..." Sighing, Sam put the card down and picked the dice back up.

Over the next two turns...
13132323131.title: Her (Ellie)

131323231311.content:
Sam groaned as she rolled a six, steadily moving up the board as she felt her belly round out even more, her breasts tighten her bra again, and her hips widen ever so slightly.

"I did not need you two growing any bigger..." Sam groaned as she placed a hand on her belly, her twins kicking her womb even harder now as if urging her to get on with her next roll. "Alright alright! Settle down!" The mother to be groaned as she reluctantly picked up the dice.

Much to her suprise, she ended up rolling another six. Sam sighed in frustration as she moved her piece once again, growing and growing even larger, her belly making her sit further and further from the table's edge until she found herself placed on a very familiar space.

"The birth star..." She muttered, "well...I guess after throwing Ellie under the bus like that I guess my turn had to come eventually."

Bracing for the pain she knew was coming, Sam gritted her teeth. However, after a minute or so of silence, she unclenched her jaw and looked around in confusion.

"Huh, I could have sworn something should have happened like it did for Ellie, maybe I have to wait for her to get back?" She wondered. However, just as Sam contemplated getting up and taking another turn, she felt something akin to a balloon popping within her, followed by a wet feeling coming from her lower torso.

"Guess not..." Sam sighed as she knew her water broke, "which means that -Ooohhh...oh god" Sam fell back into her chair as a sharp pain emitted from her lower abdomen, and her children kicked even more furiously.

"This doesn't feel great at all..." Sam groaned, before an especially strong contraction hit her and almost made her scream aloud in pain.

Now crying, Sam wiped away her tears and tried to stand, but could only whimper and rub her belly as the pain refused to subside.

However, just before she thought she reached her limit, she was engulfed in a flash of light and felt her vision start to swim and lose focus.

After a few moments Sam found that she was no longer at rhe table playing the game, but rather lying down on what seemed to be a hospital bed. Looking around, she noticed that the hospital had set her up quite nicely, and was already monitoring her heart rate and vital signs even though she'd just arrived.

"Ah, you must be Sam!" A voice called out, which made the girl look around feverishly at the source of the voice, only to find that there was no one other than herself present in the room.

"W-who are you?" Sam asked fearfully, biting her lip as she tried to ignore another incoming contraction.

""I am the entity in charge of enforcing the rules of the birth star!" It replied calmly, making Sam relax a little bit as she firgured that without anyone present the voice couldn't really harm her.

"What are you going to do to me?" Sam asked after a few moments of contemplation.

"I am merely here to make sure that the birth of your twins goes as planned, and that in the alloted time you and your children will be returned from whence you came!"

"W-what about-"

"Ellie?" The voice finished, " worry not, your friend has already delivered her child and is now back in your realm to take her alotted three turns of play."

"So she's safe then...good" Sam sighed in relief, lying back in her bed before another jolt of pain nearly made her sit upright.

"My your children seem eager to come out!" The voice chuckled, "in that case let us begin!"

"Geez Ell, I hope mine will go as smooth as yours..." Sam muttered before she began to push.
-------------------------------
Back at the house, Ellie found herself seated at the table once more, but this time with a much flatter belly and a child attached to left breast, feeding on the milk that her mother had produced.

"Oh man that was awful..." Ellie groaned, before smiling down at her daughter, "though I guess it wasn't too bad if it gave me a cutie like you!" After cooing at her daughter affectionately, she looked around and noticed something out of place.

"Where did Sam go? Don't tell me she bailed on me..." Ellie frowned before noticing a card in front of her. It turned out to be exactly the same message that Sam had read when Ellie had been carted off to the delivery space. After reading the card, Ellie had noticed that Sam had indeed made it to the Birth Star as well.

"Heh...serves her right after making me go first..." Ellie smirked, "though I guess since she had twins she will be out for three turns..."Noticing that in front of her piece was five red spaces followed by the end of the game, Ellie cautiously picked up the dice.

"Welp, here goes nothing..." Ellie muttered, before throwing the dice.

After bouncing around for a few moments, the dice finally landed on...
131323231311.title: Sam made it to the Birth Star as well!

1313232313111.title: Less than six...

choices: She landed on a red space as well...
She had made it past the red spaces!
131323231311122.content:
"Shoot! I was so close to the end!" Ellie groaned. "As she moved her card to the last red space, another mama card appeared in front of her. Rolling her eyes, she picked it up with her free hand and began to read it.

"Oops! Mama wasn't careful enough and got herself pregnant again, or maybe it her plan? Either way, your body's inner fertility seemed to have been awakened this time around, as you've been blessed with quintiplets as you move back to the first trimester!"

Ellie paled as she read the latter half of the card. Her hand shaking as she finally finished reading it.

"F-five more?" She whimpered, before feeling a curious sensation within her. It felt miniscule, as though five very small things had taken root inside of her, and as she looked back to the board, she gawked in disbelief as her piece had moved itself back to the beginning of the first trimester.

Sighing as she knew there was no other way to continue, she looked down to her daughter and addressed her, "Well, it looks like you'll be getting some siblings soon..."

Rolling the dice once more, she found that she rolled a five, which luckily was a normal tile with no cards or effects with it. However, Ellie had noticed that even though she was only five spaces into the board, she had already begun to grow a bump. It was almost unnoticeable, but it was something Ellie had been sure was different from last time.

"Oh god, if I'm already starting to show again at five spaces..." She whimpered in terror, "how big will I be at the third trimester..."

Shaking her head, Ellie picked up the dice once more, and had ended up with a three this time, putting her on a space that let her draw her first mama card of the run.

"Please be an easy one..." She groaned, feeling her belly jut out ever so slightly as she picked up the card.

"My how time flies when your pregnancy is fun! Move to the end of the first trimester and keep up that energy!"

Ellie barely had time to react before her piece moved itself to the end of the first trimester. Three seconds later Ellie found her belly growing much more rapidly than it had previously, and along with it her breasts enlarged considerably, presumably to feed the litter that Ellie had growing inside of her at this point. Her hips also widened to comical proportions, and if her belly hadn't been there they would have given her an almost perfect hourglass figure.

"This is ridiculous!" Ellie panted, the growth leaving her exhausted, "I'm already almost as big as I was before I gave birth!" She sighed, before looking down at her daughter, who seemed content to keep on feeding from her now much larger breasts.

"Don't take too much now," Ellie chided, "your brothers and sisters will defintely want some when they get out and I do not plan to have more than six of you all today!" As expected, her daughter gave no response, and so Ellie merely shrugged.

However, before she could pick up the dice, a flash of light shone from the other side of the table, and once it had faded revealed none other than her friend Sam, though now much smaller in the belly department and with her two twins fedding from each of her breasts.

"Ugh," Sam blanched, "that was the most painful thing I've ever done..."

"Hey Sam." Ellie dryly muttered, in no mood to be addressed due to her current predicament.

"Ellie! You're safe! And...pregnant again? How did you get back to the third trimester like that?" Sam gestured with a nod of her head towards Ellie's newly engorged abdomen.

"I'm not at the third trimester..." Ellie sighed weakly, before pointing to her piece on the board.

"Uh..." Sam bobbled with her words as she saw where Ellie was in relation to her size. "How many-"

"Five," Ellie grunted, " just don't roll a five from where you are and you'll be fine."

"O-ok..." Sam replied, still shaken by the turn of events. Nestling one of her twins in the crook of her arm, she rolled the dice once more and found that...

1321.content:
"So what do you think sweetie?" Robin's mother asked her across the dining room table as the fifteen year old stared blankly at them. Her parents were asking her to become pregnant with her own younger sibling (or siblings if the process yielded that). She couldn't just possibly tell her parents that she longed to be pregnant more than anything but, this was her chance to be pregnant without any kind of a consequence at all.

"I..." She took a deep breath to try and keep herself calm. "I would love to do this for you both. I'd love to have a little sibling and I know how much you want another baby so I'll do it. I'll always do it, even if you want another baby." She said, hand rubbing over her flat stomach under the table where her parents couldn't see. Her parents looked absolutely delighted and quickly got up.

"Good! Well, we set up an appointment for the implantation just in case you said yes so we might as well get going, hm?"

The scan showed three little dots in Robin's womb. Her parents were so excited.

Robin groans as she gets up. It was a pain carrying three babies around. Her back hurt so much! She waddles over to her closet and picks out something to wear.

'Her parents were going to see what the genders of her siblings were today. She knew that she had dress nicely, so she picks out a striped shirt and tan shorts. She puts on black flip flops and styles her hair into a braid.

As she's getting dressed, a hard kick gets her right in the side. Robin winces with the force of it. Her hands travel down to her swollen stomach and she rubs the skin trying to calm the baby.

1323.content:
Robin really wished she wasn't so short. Really undermines the dominance you try to achieve in an argument when you're only 5' 2", and your dad is a towering 6' 1". "Look, that's not gonna happen, Dad!" Robin shouted as her dad looked to her desperately.

"I-I know, sweetheart..." her dad began, rubbing his daughter's head soothingly. "But, your mother and I have been talking, and we decided that we need another child. Imagine having a baby sibling! You could watch over them, and play with them. We had you so young... We were unprepared." It was really hard for Robin to be mad. Despite his fearsome height, Robin's dad was a lover, not a fighter. His puppy-dog eyes forced her to look away, lest she actually say YES to this mad proposal.

"This hypothetical kid wouldn't even be my sibling! I'd be a mom at 15. 15, Dad! I'm only in tenth grade, dealing with all these bullshit AP classes, I don't need this much stress!" Robin, content with her ultimatum, begins walking back to her pile of clothes and furniture that she calls a room, when she feels those darn eyes burning into her skull. Must... not... look... she thought, trudging slower and slower back to her- GOSHDARNIT SHE LOOKED. He looked like, to push the puppy analogy further, a kicked puppy, sitting defeated in his old leather rocking chair. Robin stood in silence, glancing at the various dishes and dolls laying around in the kitchen/living room/dining room in her family's apartment. "I-I'll think about it..." Robin added, slapping herself mentally for letting her dad win. "Just let me sleep on it." she added finally before exiting to her room. As Robin lay on her bed, she thought Oh jeez, can I even win the argument if Mom joins in?

Robin dreamed of baby blankets and cribs that night.
1323.title: Robin Short Resist Chapter 1: WHAT!??

13231.content:
"I want all the details before I say anything," Robin said.

"The baby would not be yours," Mom said. "My eggs and your father's sperm have already been collected, and are waiting. When you're ready, the embryos will be implanted in your uterus. You'll go through a normal pregnancy, and you will be the best big sister anyone ever had."

That came as a relief. "Alright. I'll do it."

******************************


The next step for Robin was taking pills. One pill was to suppress her own ovulation; the second was to get her uterus ready for implantation. Robin's school had a zero-tolerance policy, so her parents took her out. They would have had to do it anyway, rather than make her deal with questions about her pregnancy.

After weeks of pills, Robin went into the doctor's office for the implantation. This was not as much of an ordeal as Robin feared: she had imagined a needle going into her belly, but the doctor just put the embryos inside her while she lay on the table, her feet in the stirrups. "We're implanting six embryos," the doctor said, "to give us the best chance of at least one taking."

After weeks of pills, and an hour in the doctor's office, came weeks of waiting. Robin thought that the waiting was going to drive her crazy. There was nothing for her to do, because there was nothing she could do. It was all out of her hands.

Finally, there came the first confirmation, when Robin's period didn't come. Mom and Dad took her to the doctor for the official word.

It wasn't long in coming: Robin was pregnant.
13231.title: Robin wakes up normally.

132313.content:
"And how are we feeling today, Robin?" asked Dr. Williams, as she helped Robin onto the examination table.

"I'm sick of morning sickness," the teenager replied. "And I've already had to start wearing bigger clothes. I thought three months was too early for a baby bump."

"It ought to be," the doctor said. "The sonogram will show us what's going on. It's time for us to find out how many of the embryos survived, anyway."

The sonogram hummed to life, and Mom and Dad oohed and ahhed at the image of Robin's womb. "There's your little one," the doctor said. Even Robin was stirred at the sight.

Then the doctor moved the wand, and everybody was surprised. "And here's another."

Robin gaped at her belly. I'm having twins?

Dr. Williams moved the wand again. "And still another."

Triplets?!

"How did this happen, Doctor?" Mom asked.

"We implanted six embryos in Robin's womb," the doctor explained, "to increase the likelihood of one implanting in the uterine wall. Three implanting is unusual, but not unheard of."

After a nurse cleaned her up, Robin rubbed her belly. "Triplets... "

"I know it's more than we promised," Mom said, "but we had no idea so many would take."

"I know, Mom," Robin said. "I guess we'd better get to the maternity store earlier than we'd planned."
132313.title: Big Sister to... THREE?!

1323131.content:
The family went to the next town over, to further reduce the chances of Robin's friends spotting her. After all, not everyone would understand if they learned she was pregnant with her own siblings.

As it was, the saleslady at Great Expectations kept her judgment to herself when she heard Robin was 15, but she couldn't hide her shock at hearing Robin was expecting triplets. Still, she conducted herself professionally, advising the young girl on what to look for in picking out clothes for the weeks and months ahead.

"There are strap-on pads in the dressing room," the woman said. "They'll help you get an idea of how you'll look as those babies grow."

Robin couldn't resist looking at herself with the pads in place. In a few months, she thought while looking at herself in the nine-month pad, I'll look like this on my own. And then I'll get even bigger.

This gave Robin pause, as she realized that she was actually looking forward to being that big, and not just because that meant it would be soon over. She was looking forward to getting big. To feeling the triplets moving inside her. And, while it was true that these babies weren't hers, she would still be the one who gave birth to them, and nobody could take that away from her.

When she and Mom left the store, she had several bags. "Got enough?" Dad asked.

"I'll need enough to get me through at least two months," Robin explained.

"Sounds like somebody's coming around on this."

Robin shrugged. "I guess it's growing on me." Just like these babies are growing in me.

134221.content:
It was a nice day outside. Hannah twirled a lock of her blond hair with her finger. The 15 year old was bored out of her mind. Her parents came to the bazaar to look for things for the baby. Well babies technically. Hannah's mother specialized in surrogacy and was pregnant with twin girls. Hannah grew jealous of her mother. She knew she was young but that didn't stop the urges of wanting to be pregnant.

Hannah browsed through various vendors until she stopped at a booth. She eyed a bracelet that was locked away in a case.

"Hey, how much for the bracelet?"

The seller walks over. "Oh! $10 for thing such as this," he says in broken english.

"$10 huh? I'll take it." Hannah hands the money over to the man.

"Careful with this, bracelet is magic. Wearer will be big in the belly with babies." He hands it over to her.

"Magic isn't real." She scoffs and walks to another booth.

The seller watches her. "Always the non-belivers." He shakes his head and disappears as if he was never there, booth and all.

The 15 year old walks around. "It's really pretty for a bracelet." She moves her wrist around to show off the piece of jewelry. "Ugh!" She thinks back on what the man said. "Might as well test this thing out." She walks around looking for a pregnant woman. After a while, she does! The woman had a decent sized belly that was too big on her. Hannah points the bracelet at the woman. To her amazement, the woman's belly begins to shrink. "What the-?" Then Hannah feels a gurgle and a feeling of nausea wells up in her. "Urgh! Now is not the time to get sick!" Unknown to her, her flat stomach swells up to the woman's size. It wasn't until her belly was big that Hannah looks down. A round mound sticks out in front of her. "Oh god! It really worked!" In her mind, she could sense the genders of the babies and who their parents where. Hannah was carrying twin boys who's mother was young. Their father was their mother's older husband and the boys have some siblings already. "Hey guys." A kick greets her. "Want me to take you back to your mommy?" Hannah's back was hurting and her breasts swelled uncomfortably against her bra. She could feel a baby right near her cevix, as if he was ready to be born. Maybe she could take a pregnancy where the babies aren't full developed. "Come on then." She starts looking for the babies' mother.
134221.title: Her?

1342211.content:

"Sure!" Macy took the carrier and watched Cousin Lucile skip away back down the lawn. She looked at the little baby boy. Oh... oh, she shouldn't. She really shouldn't do it. But the memory of the last time, the fun and mischief of the deed all started coming back to her. Well. It wasn't like there would be any real consequences...
143112211.title: Maybe try another unbirthing? What could go wrong!

choices: Enjoy the new changes for a while
Pass out, come to a few hours later...
1431122111.content:
Well, why shouldn't she have whatever she wanted? It had felt really interesting, the first time. And honestly, Macy was having a little trouble forgetting how she had looked in the mirror, with such a big belly. The round, heavy bump. She had never really wanted to have children. But that night had stirred something up in her. Now, sometimes it was all she could think about. When Lucile had shown up with her infant son, a part of Macy had burned hot with jealousy. She had seen his big eyes and his baby smile and really, really wished that he was hers.

And well, why couldn't he be? Just for a little while. And then it would be over, and nobody would even remember. Reality would switch all around again, as it had done last time. No harm, no foul.

Macy locked the door and shut all the windows. She undressed herself and the sleeping baby, and climbed up on her bed with him. Leaning back against the mound of fluffy pillows at her headboard, she spread her legs and reached down between them. She brought the infant to her entrance. She felt really warm suddenly. Her heart began to beat faster. In a moment, just a moment, the child would be inside her. She would be pregnant again. He was a bigger baby than her half sister had been, and it was a slow process. It hurt a little, a kind of burning too-tightness, like she might split right in half. But at last the head touched her cervix, and Macy took a deep breath and pushed hard and slow until the baby began to slip up inside her womb. She watched her belly this time. It rippled, bulging first a little bit as the head popped in. The shoulders were harder. She strained again, and gave a little shout of discomfort, but then it was done. The child slid completely inside her. It thrashed and shifted, and Macy rolled forward with her hands over her stretched middle, gasping as she felt fluid rush into her womb to cushion its new passenger.
1431122111.title: Do it, what's wrong with a little fun?

choices: Go down to the pool with Lucile
Daddy has a present for her
14311221112.content:
Macy lay back on the bed with a little cry of delight, running her hands up and down her stomach. It was hard and round. And bigger than it had been last time. This baby boy was heftier, and weighed a few more pounds than her half-sister had. She felt him turn and kick inside her. Macy looked down. The shape was like the moon. It didn't just stick straight up, it bulged sideways too. She tried to take a breath and found that she just couldn't get as much air as she was used to. Her lungs were too squished by her new cargo. Her hips ached with the new load settled on them. She could feel the pressure of the child deep inside her, weighing her down. She gave a contented sigh. And just like last time, a wave of exhaustion overcame her. She could do nothing but close her eyes and sleep.

It was only a few hours, this time. When she opened her eyes, the big roundness of her belly was gone. Everything was back to normal again. Macy felt an odd pang of unhappiness. It would have been nice if it could have lasted just a little longer.

There was a knock at the door. Macy leaped up from the bed, felt a little dizzy for a moment, and scrabbled to pull her clothes back on. She was in such a rush that she didn't really notice that her boobs hurt when she strapped on her bra... and she couldn't quite get her jeans to button closed.
14311221112.title: Pass out, come to a few hours later...

choices: Oh, wait... what if it is something else?
Nah. What could it possibly be but too many snacks?
143112211121.content:
"Hey, little cousin!" Lucile squealed. She tossed an armload of shopping bags down onto the ground as soon as Macy let her in, fished around in them for a moment, and then came up with a little pink bikini. "Here, put this on. Let's go for a swim. The pool is all perfect right now."

She didn't ask about the baby. There was no baby--everything had changed again. Macy didn't really want to go swimming, but feeling slightly guilty, she agreed. They pulled on swimsuits and then headed down the lawn and around the side of the house to the big, blue swimming pool. Lucile splashed in first. Macy threw off the towel she had wrapped herself in and dipped her toes into the water, testing it. And, looking down, she noticed that... there was a little pudge, right in the middle of her stomach. Her waist was thicker than usual, a little bloated. Ugh. Great. Well, she had been snacking more than usual lately...

"Getting a bit tubby, little cousin," Lucile said teasingly, swimming back to her. "You need to do more crunches. Maybe lay off the donuts awhile. Or is it something else...?" Lucile's eyes widened, glittering with shock and gossipy excitement.
143112211121.title: Go down to the pool with Lucile

choices: A knock at the door, Lucile followed her
Skip ahead a few weeks, her stepmother guesses
1431122111211.content:
Macy's mind flashed back to what she had just done, a few hours before. The baby she had taken inside herself, and how big it had made her. But then it had all disappeared. Hadn't it? Her hand flew to her stomach. Her abs had gone soft, and it was sticking out a bit. Like she had just had a big meal. And okay, maybe she had been snacking a lot lately. Having a few too many donuts, as Lucile had put it. And pizza, and bagels, and soft pretzels with cheese, and burgers, and... well, she had just been really hungry lately. So maybe she had put on a few pounds. Had she just not noticed, until now? Or... was it something else?

"Hey, you know what, I can't swim. I have... there's another thing I need to do." She scooped the towel back up around her, turned around, and ran back across the lawn.

"Oh my god, are you?!" Lucile shrieked after her. Macy just kept running. She got back to her guest house, locked herself inside, and ran to the bathroom. Scrabbling through the medicine cabinet, she found a pregnancy test. It was a stupid thought. It hadn't happened the first time. Why would it have stuck this time? And why had her belly shrunk down, if there was still a baby inside her? She took the test and stood glaring down at it, trembling a little. Her heart was hammering.

And, sure enough, two little pink lines appeared.
1431122111211.title: Oh, wait... what if it is something else?

choices: Tell her the truth about it all
Lie, this is all too weird
14311221112111.content:
Pregnant. She was pregnant. But how? It hadn't happened the first time, with her stepsister... Unless, she thought suddenly, with horror, unless it had. She hadn't checked. She had assumed, because her stomach had gone flat and the baby was missing, that the baby was gone. But what if it wasn't? What if neither of them were? Maybe both children were still inside her, but instead of staying huge, somehow putting them there had made them small and fetal again. Hidden, new. Her hands flew to her stomach. She pressed her fingers in hard against the muscle. It was as squashy as ever. Except... except low down, just above her pelvic bone, it wasn't. She felt something very, very firm and round there. Prodding it, with a feeling of excited panic, she knew what it had to be. Her engorged uterus. Full of fluid, full of a baby, maybe two. Just starting to be big enough that it was making her look soft and a bit full in the middle.

A hard knock startled her from her thoughts. Not a knock from outside the guest house, but from right outside the bathroom. Startled, Macy opened the door. Lucile stood there. "You gave me a key, remember?" she said. And her eyes went down to Macy's stomach. "You are. You're knocked up. How?" she demanded, sounding both shocked and giddy.
14311221112111.title: A knock at the door, Lucile followed her

choices: Lucile suggest... hey, what about another one?
Macy freak out, Lucile suggest a back (belly) rub
143112211121111.content:
Somehow, too shocked to lie, Macy told her cousin the truth of it all. First about her stepsister, and why she had come up with the plan in the first place. And then about the other baby, Lucile's own son, whom she had taken into her just a few hours ago.

She had expected her cousin to fly into an outrage. Or simply not to believe her. But a strange look came over her face. She seemed lost in thought for a few long moments. "I remember now... how strange, I had forgot him. I've never been on this side of it before," Lucile said, just bemused.

"Uh, this side?" Macy asked, unbelieving. She thought that if someone had just told her that they had vanished her son, she would be freaking out pretty hard. But Lucile didn't seem angry at all. And in a flash, Macy realized why. "You've done it too," she gasped. "You've put... inside you, but... oh my god. Does Dustin know? And what about..." A thought struck her. "Was it really your baby, then?"

Lucile gave a little shrug. "It wasn't to begin with. I took him from somewhere else. Dustin and I, we couldn't do it on our own." Her gaze flicked down to Macy's stomach. "Guess the little guy is yours now, huh? And little girl. Congratulations."
143112211121111.title: Tell her the truth about it all

choices: No, that's a dumb idea, two is plenty
Sure, why not just one more?
1431122111211111.content:
Lucile smiled, her eyes glittering, suddenly mischievous. "What if you did another?" she asked.

"Are you kidding? There's already two in there." Macy's hands leaped to cover her stomach. Twins... she hadn't meant to do that. And yet, she felt a weird rush of excitement knowing, as Lucile had put it, that she was knocked up. Her womb was tight and full inside her, and would only get bigger now as its new occupants grew. What was fairly hidden now, except in a bikini, would soon be impossible to keep secret. She hadn't meant to do it. Sort of hadn't meant to. Her thoughts raced back to her original plan. To have a baby, to be pampered by her Daddy, and then foist the kid off on him and dear old stepmom. That plan could still work. It would just be two babies, instead of one.

Was three really so different from two?
1431122111211111.title: Lucile suggest... hey, what about another one?

choices: Wait... maybe Macy wants to do this to Lucile, instead
Lucile totally does it to Macy
14311221112111112.content:
She wasn't sure why she finally agreed to it. What a stupid plan. But maybe... maybe she just wanted to feel it one more time. And anyway, three babies wasn't really that different than two, so what was the big deal? Macy was lying back in her bed, hands spread out over her stomach. It didn't go flat. Not even though she was lying down. It stuck up, small and round. And obvious. It didn't really feel a lot heavier. But there was a weird, tight, warm feeling really deep inside of her.

The doorknob rattled. Lucile reentered, carrying a bundle. She locked the door behind her, closed the blinds, and skipped over to the bed. She lay a sleeping baby down, unfolding its naked little body from the blue blanket she had swaddled it in. It was another boy. Big, strong, and cute. Lucile apparently had a specific taste in babies. He didn't look that different from the last little boy. When Macy asked her where she had got him, Lucile only smiled and shook her head, refusing to say.

"You lie back. And lift your dress up. I'll do it for you," her cousin commanded. Macy leaned back against her pillows. She had changed into a summer dress, a white one that had fit her really well before... all of this. Now, though the skirt was flowing and loose, the top felt tight against her chest. Hiking the folds up under her fatter, heavier boobs, Macy spread her legs wide open. "You're already all round," Lucile commented, making Macy blush. Her cousin's hand pressed down over her stomach. Really pressed, until she must have felt what Macy had felt before, the startling firmness of her pseudo-fertilized womb, just beginning to be detectable low down in her middle. "You're going to be totally huge. Oh well. Here it goes..."
14311221112111112.title: Sure, why not just one more?

choices: Try to undo this very bad decision somehow
It's done, better just accept it
143112211121111122.content:
Macy got a thrill of panic, feeling the bed shift and Lucile getting ready. It was going to happen. She should stop it, she ought to scream no way to all of this and stand up and not do it at all. But instead she lay still, terrified by what was coming, so excited she could barely breathe because of what was coming. She closed her eyes. Felt fingers spread her wide, and then draw away. For a moment there was nothing, only shivering waiting before this Really Bad Idea became something she couldn't undo. And then there was a warm contact between her legs. She gasped, as her cousin began to push the baby inside of her. She put her hands down over her belly. She could feel it from the outside. The sudden hard bulge working its way slowly, very slowly up inside of her. It was another big baby. Its mass stretched her body achingly taut. Just an inch at a time, and she could feel the weight of it both in her belly and stretching her abdomen up under her hands bit by bit. By the time she felt its head touch her cervix, she was jerking both her legs, trying to get them spread even farther apart, desperate to relieve the mounting pressure.

"Wait, it's too much..." she began, and broke off with a startled yowl as Lucile suddenly bore down harder, forcing the child's head to pop through into her womb.

And Macy panicked. The panic was overwhelming. This was her very last chance to get out of this, before it was too late. She shouldn't do it. Whose baby was this, anyway? She didn't even know. This whole thing was one big terrible decision, and she ought to be looking for a way to get out of it, not make it worse. How could she not want it, and really-really want it, so much at the same time?

"I can't!" she gasped. At the very same time that Lucile pushed really hard, there was an intense pain of stretching, and the baby's broad shoulders penetrated her cervix. The rest of it slipped inside of her uterus all at once, drawn in by a startled clenching of her muscles, and Macy felt her womb seal tight shut behind its new passenger. A few moments later there was that other feeling, the sudden rush of fluid. And then Macy was heavily, heavily full with child.
143112211121111122.title: Lucile totally does it to Macy

choices: Maybe best to keep this hidden for a while
Yeah right, like she even could...
1431122111211111222.content:
Macy groaned, putting her hands over her belly. It stuck straight out from her body, full and egg-shaped, so heavy that once again she had the strange sensation that she couldn't quite breathe. Hey bellybutton was even sticking out, a hard round knot that she could just barely reach with her palm. The child thrashed and kicked inside her, then settled down. It was done. She had made the mistake, and there was no getting out of it now. The passage the child had come through still ached from the ordeal. But the baby itself was snugly inside her. With, she remembered, its two siblings. Lucile had crawled up to lie right beside her. She was rubbing a hand over Macy's swollen stomach, staring at it in mischievous wonder. "Wow. If this is how big it is now, what will it be like when they're all developed together?" she asked.

"Screw... you..." Macy gasped, right before she fell asleep.

Lucile was still lying there when she woke up. As Macy stirred back to consciousness, her cousin did too. She touched Macy's belly again. The gigantic mound was gone, just like the last two times. But unlike the last two times, a little firm bulge remained. A pregnancy that was just beginning to be really obvious. "If this all started with the first time..." Lucile said. "Then you're probably like, three months along? Four? I don't know. But there's three babies in you, and you've got this skinny little body. So it's already sticking out, majorly. Are you going to try and hide it?"
1431122111211111222.title: It's done, better just accept it

choices: That sounds like a terrible plan
Well... just one or two more babies couldn't hurt...
14311221112111112221.content:
Macy nodded, hands cupping her twelve week pregnant stomach. "I have some looser things that I can wear. I think it will seem more authentic if I try and hide it for a while instead of just strutting in there pregnant with triplets and proud of it." SHe muttered, hands rubbing her stomach slowly. Triplets... was she really going to have to be the mother to them?

Lucile gave a little hum and nodded before stepping forward to put her hand on Macy's plump midsection as well. "I suppose you're right. You're not going to last long though. Just look at you." She chuckled before patting the bump. A smile tugged at her lips. "So, why did you do all this anyway?"

"So daddy's stupid little trophy wife and new baby wouldn't get all the attention." Macy grumbled, staring down at her stomach, acutely away that that very baby would now be her child.

"You know how you could get more attention?"

"Huh?"

"Go full octomom. Let's stuff a few more little tykes up in there and get you really, really, pregnant. You'll be the full center of attention. Then, I can take a few in me when they're born so they aren't your problem anymore!"
14311221112111112221.title: Maybe best to keep this hidden for a while

choices: Actually, Lucile should take them. Macy needs a partner in this
143112211121111122213.content:
"That's too much!" Macy said quickly, remembering the pictures that she had seen. Though as she ran a hand down her plump belly, she couldn't help but admit that she was finding herself enjoying this at the moment. And besides, Lucile had said she would take some of them so she wouldn't even have to raise them all. "Um... maybe just two more." She said after a moment, a pink flush overtaking her cheeks. Lucile grinned widely and nodded.

"You rest up and get yourself ready while I go and fetch us some more babies. You're gonna be great!" She assured before darting out the door. Macy stared after her a moment before going to take a quick soak in the bath so that she could loosen herself up and get ready for the process.''

It only took a few hours for Lucile to return with two more slumbering infants, both girls it seemed, though they were no smaller than the hefty little boys that Lucile seemed to favor. She picked one up and quickly undressed it as Macy climbed onto the bed and got ready.
143112211121111122213.title: Well... just one or two more babies couldn'...

choices: Go to the doctor to have it confirmed for sure
Don't bother hiding it as it progresses.
1431122111211111222131.content:
"Alright." Macy muttered, planting her feet on the bed with her legs spread wide as she got herself ready to have yet another baby shoved into her awaiting womb. Lucile grinned and knelt on the bed, bringing the baby's head to Macy's entrance. It took some coaxing, but eventually, her lips parted and Lucile was able to shove the little girl's head in.

"Not so rough!" Macy yelped, hands gripping the headboard as her body began to pull the child in. Lucile didn't seem to listen though as she pushed the baby further in. Macy gritted her teeth when the head bumped against her cervix and shook her head. "It's not opening." She groaned, only for her womb to open at another of Lucile's shoves. The woamn wasn't gentle and soon Macy was reclined on the bed, once again heavily pregnant.

She was only just catching her breath and getting ready to ask for a moment to get used to the the new child within her when she felt the other child's head shove into her channel. "I'm not ready!" She cried, hands grabbing her belly that already felt far too full.

"I need to do it while your womb is still open!" Lucile snapped. Macy cried out again as the shoulders were pushed into her and only one more push later, the head was being forced through her cervix. By the end of it all, the poor girl looked to be overdue with twins, great pregnant belly heaving over her. Lucile dabbed her sweaty forehead with a towel before she fell asleep from the exhaustion of it all.

It was morning when Macy awoke. Lucile had gone, leaving only a note saying she needed to get home in her wake. Macy's hips were sore from her experience the day before as she sat up, laying a hand on her greatly shrunken stomach. She licked her lips and took in the sight of the swell that jutted out from her body. Three months pregnant with quintuplets...

She slowly stood and felt the weight of it in her body. There was going to be no hiding this now.
1431122111211111222131.title: In go the babies!

choices: Continue to chill with cousin Lucile
Or does the belly rub have a strange effect?
1431122111211112.content:
"Both... they're both in there!" Macy all but shrieked. She started to pace around the room, bringing her hands up to fist in her hair, freaking out. She had got herself pregnant with twins. Two, growing inside her. Not even the short-term pregnancy she had planned to begin with, but almost... almost a real one. Like with a real baby, a real two babies, that were totally her own. That had started from nothing inside her and were now growing bigger and bigger. She was going to get so fat. What would she tell her Daddy?

"Hey, calm down! C'mere." Lucile caught her and brought her to the bed. Her slightly older cousin sat behind her and started to rub Macy's shoulders. Macy took deep breaths. She crossed her legs beneath her, and realized her belly was hanging out enough that she could feel the bottom of it's tight bulge against her ankles. She started to hyperventilate a little. Lucile rubbed her shoulders harder, in big circles, and made shushing noises. Her cousin had small, strong hands. They rubbed the upper parts of Macy's arms. And they came around (brushing her tight, swollen boobs, which made her wince) and then clasped over the plumpness of her belly. Lucile rubbed up and down the gentle curve. She tickled Macy's thick sides, and swirled a fingertip around her bellybutton. Which, Macy realized, was a lot shallower than it used to be.
1431122111211112.title: Macy freak out, Lucile suggest a back (belly) rub

choices: A trip to the doctor too
1431122111212.content:
"Something else like what?" Macy demanded peevishly, and hopped into the pool, splashing her cousin. Lucile squealed and splashed her back. They kept at it for a while, then swam circles around the pool chatting. Mostly about what Lucile had bought on her shopping trip, how Dustin's job was going, how annoying Macy's new stepmother was. Then they climbed onto inflatable pool floats and lounged in silence. Macy flipped her sunglasses down over her eyes. And she waited a long time, until Lucile had floated to the other end of the pool and seemed to be dozing, before she lifted the sunglasses back up and stared down at herself.

There was no doubt about it. She was getting fat. Not all over, but right in the middle. When had her abs gone soft? Even lying down like this, her stomach stuck up a teensy, looking soft, instead of flat and trim like normal. Ugh. Gross. She really did need to lay off the donuts. She had just been so hungry lately. For all kinds of junk food, donuts and cookies, burgers and fries, pizza and cake. So this was the consequence. Time to diet. And maybe...
1431122111212.title: Nah. What could it possibly be but too many sna...

What the heck? Complain to Daddy about this
143112211122.content:
It was her father. Though he was an older man, he was tall and handsome. His black hair and sleek goatee were streaked with silver. Muscles rolled beneath the shirt he wore buttoned partway down. "There's my princess!" he boomed, throwing his arms open wide. Macy flung herself onto him, squealing with delight. He had been gone on another business trip, and hadn't been scheduled to return for another week.

"Did you bring me a present?"

"Of course! Here, open it! Try it on." He gave her a box. She tore the ribbon from it and unfolded a beautiful white summer dress, and clutched it to her as she bounced and shrieked with delight. She obediently went into her bathroom and slipped into the garment. And noticed then that, oddly, she couldn't get the zipper in the back to zip all the way closed. Was it stuck? But the two sides of the metal teeth were straining to meet. Ugh, the wrong size. And it was only then, as she turned back around to look at herself in the mirror, that she noticed she looked a little different. Her face was maybe just the tiniest bit softer, her hips the teeniest bit wider, though she was still fit and skinny. But her stomach... it looked so full. It was bulging out just a little bit, the smallest curve. The dress was much too tight to hide it. Alarmed, Macy turned sideways, and saw that she looked... fat. Thick around the middle. With the barest hint of a potbelly.
143112211122.title: Daddy has a present for her

choices: Could she make her stepmother disappear, too?
But the next dress doesn't fit either...
1431122111221.content:
"Macy, honey? How does it look? Let me see!" Her father bellowed cheerfully from the other room.

Macy blushed a deep pink. This was so stupid. She couldn't let Daddy see her looking like this. She took a deep breath and sucked her stomach in. Alarmingly, it wouldn't flatten all the way. Like she had just eaten a big meal, and was too full to squeeze it down, especially low under her bellybutton. And, okay, maybe she sort of had been overdoing it on the snacks lately. Or possibly taking that baby inside had left her abs a little softened, an effect that would surely wear off soon? She had slept a whole night away last time she had done that, after all. Maybe the whole thing was still wearing off. There was no time to dwell too much on the problem right now. At least she managed to finally managed to pull the zipper all the way up, and shimmied into the dress. She let her breath out in a rush, though she tried to keep her stomach sucked in a bit, as she opened the bathroom door.

"Oh, Daddy, I love it! It's the cutest? What do you think?"

"Gorgeous!" He laughed, coming close enough to put his hands on her shoulders. She put her hands on his firm chest, smiling and excited. He looked down between them and... frowned, just a little. Macy's own smile faded. His gaze was on her, down low. She could tell he was looking at her stomach, which despite her best efforts to hold it in, still looked a bit plump. "Hm," he said, at length. "Doesn't fit just right, does it? Well. You know, if it's not the right size, pumpkin, we can give it to your stepmother. She has such an itty bitty figure, it would probably be just fine on her. I'll get you something else, how does that sound?"

Macy removed her hands and took a step back from him. Bubbling over with rage, she forced herself to smile brightly. "Sure, Daddy," she said. "If you think so."
1431122111221.title: How embarrassing, try to hide it from Daddy

choices: There is definitely a little hard bump there
Daddy walks into the room, back from his meeting
14311221112211.content:
That was the last straw. So he thought her stepmother was prettier than her, did he? No. Macy couldn't stand this. There was the whole stepsister thing, and she thought maybe she had solved the problem when she made that all disappear. But the problem was bigger than that. Macy didn't want to share her Daddy with anybody. Not a spoiled little sibling, and not a so-skinny-and-pretty trophy wife, either. She told her Daddy she would go see her stepmother right away, and ask her about the dress. Daddy said fine, he had to run to a meeting anyway, and kissed her on top of the head. When he came back, he would be all hers again. Macy figured, if it was easy to make one problem disappear, why not another? Why not a bigger problem? And then things would go back to the way they used to be. Just her and Daddy shopping, eating out, going on trips together.

She kept the dress on and walked up to the main house. It was quiet. She let herself upstairs and stepped into the master bedroom, and found her stepmother asleep. Perfect, beautiful. She was such a young woman. And what Macy really hated, more than that the woman was gorgeous, was that she was also really nice. One of those genuinely sweet, quiet, lovable people who were so rare. It was the worst.

One weird trait, though. The woman slept really, really soundly. Nothing could wake her. She only stirred a bit, as Macy tugged her loose clothing off gently and then climbed up on the bed with her. She pulled the dress up, hitching it over the stupid flubby swell of her stomach, and then spread herself open. She didn't want to think too hard about this. She didn't want to give herself a chance to calm down or change her mind. Daddy might love this woman as much as he loved her. She could see that now. It hadn't ever really been the stepsister that was the problem. This whole situation was simply not cool.

She wasn't sure if she could do it with a grown, large body. And in the end, she wasn't sure if she really had or not. She had only started to try when that sudden sleepiness came over her. She fell back on the bed, unconscious. The next time she opened her eyes, it was late afternoon. She grinned triumphantly. Her hands flew down to her stomach. And her grin faltered.
14311221112211.title: Could she make her stepmother disappear, too?

Her stomach was curved out. Just a little bit. Macy sat up in a hurry, clutching it, and watched as the bulge became much more noticeable as she hunched over it. A round, hard paunch. It hung out into her lap. She could feel the bottom of it, resting against the top of her thighs. A cool breeze hit her back. The zipper of the dress had broken, she realized. Or come undone. She pressed her hands against her stomach. It was hard. Not soft. Or rather, it was like there was something hard in it, low down inside her, about the size of a little melon. And it was making everything stick out. It was making her look pregnant.

143112211122111.title: There is definitely a little hard bump there

She'd helped out on the farm during her summers growing up but now owning it for herself had been a big shift for her. It was a breeding farm, meant to use the animals to make more animals and profit off their sale rather than the products she could get from them. But the problem was that her breeding numbers had gotten much much lower than she would have liked them to be.

She looked at the papers spread out over the table in front of her and wondered how exactly she was going to bring them up. Unfortunately, it seemed she was down to only one option left, throwing her own womb into the fray. She rubbed a hand over her stomach in thought. She hadn't exactly wanted to do this. There were some farms, she knew, where the girls of the family would have themselves bred to help with the numbers and such. It was never spoken of outside farm communities, though. Grandpapa had always denied the idea outright, thinking only his animals should be bred. Ellie knew she had no other option now though given the breeding numbers were slipping. It was going to make her chores harder but she really had no other choice if she wanted to keep the breeding numbers up.

The big choice was if she was going to breed herself through artificial insemination or..."the old fashioned way".

Though, the hair was smoother, so that was a plus. She didn't even notice her earlobes were longer when she looked in the mirror, or that they were higher on her head.

Ellie decided to tackle the chicken coop first. She knew her business in running a farm quite well, and he combination of her experience, steadfast care and cleaning, and reliable techniques like laying down fresh herbs and rose petals (as well as simply keeping good air circulation by way of a few smartly-installed box fans) meant that there was actually scarcely any of the typical odor associated with chickens one might expect if they were only familiar with other, less-cared-for coops. ...But even with that said, it didn't take much to set morning sickness off, and, if anything about the farm would do it, it would be even just a minor whiff of the ammonia-like scent of chicken manure. That said, she reasoned that fact only made tackling this chore first all the more logical. ...If she was going to have to deal with it anyway (and she was) then it was best to get over the roughest bumps in her routine straightaway, so they were over and done with. Thinking like that suited her work ethic and care for her animals just right.

Ellie's intuition about her condition turned out to be spot on, for, upon approaching the coop's exterior, the breeze shifts and - though it is only just the very barest, wispiest trace of ammonia that drifts from the coop to hit her nose, Ellie quickly finds her gait turning away from the gate of the pen in order to bring her round about over to its side, instead, whereupon she bends over a conveniently-placed bush (She knew she left that bush there for a good reason...) and - as quietly and reservedly as she can muster - retches a few mouthfuls of bile at the base of it. She fingered the bottle of raspberry-and-ginger infused water at her hip... then thought better of it for the moment. Oh, she definitely intended to drink her beverage in due time (Regular vomiting of any type made it all the more important to keep one's fluids up) but, that said, as long as she was about the coop's perimeter, the ghostly tint of its scent would likely lead to anything that she poured into her stomach just coming right back up on her. Her drink would keep within her sealed Nalgene bottle until she was done with the work with the chickens, at least, and then she could take a few to properly re-hydrate once she had put some distance between herself and the coop once again. Besides, as bad as her nausea was striking, it was still staggered out every few hours. Even a single hour would be more than enough time to take care of affairs here at the coop…

...Speaking of which, the ‘coop’, in this case, was really a building the size of a small warehouse - actually slightly surpassing the size of the main barn, slightly. Fortunately, for the sake of Ellie’s daily regimen, their farm - not being a specific egg farm - didn’t host an exorbitant number of hens or eggs, but, rather, was one of the few places about the country that hosted hens and eggs of a rather remarkably-great size.

You see, it was discovered a while back (and Ellie was proud that her family and those like her own - willing to tackle bold and experimental breeding tactics - had been both at the forefront and instrument to discovering this) that although the ova of humans tended to bond best with other fellow mammals in acts of strict conception, their adaptive genes and wombs nevertheless meant that they could still host and birth babies of more… exotic backgrounds - such as birds, lizards, and fish. In certain ways, the task actually less-complex than breeding with mammals, as all that the task really required, in most cases, as simply sliding up a living egg of the donor species into the vaginal canal of human woman, where muscular action would then pull it and nest it within the depths of her womb. This regarded in the birthing of strictly female offspring (as no masculine, Y-chromosomes were involved), but said children could were, regardless, fully fertile in-of-themselves upon attaining maturity, and could (and later, did) begin lines of further offspring of their own - female *and* male - after receiving fertilization from another source, like artificial insemination, or just good-old-fashioned sex. The only caveat was that the offspring of this form of ‘host fertilization’ would, invariably, take something of a rather wild wild and unpredictable turn right after womb implantation and gestation began, as - upon mingling with the variances of Human DNA - the genetic code of the child-to-be would undergo a dramatic shifting from the basic code of it’s non-human ancestors, and would invariably begin to grow and gestate at a fantastic rate (oft reaching full maturity within the human host-mother’s womb within a period of only a few weeks or even just mere days) and also typically being born far, far, far larger than normal when compared to the typical scale of their non-human heritage, with the resultant eggs in question often winding up being ‘laid’ after swelling to dozens of pounds (often anywhere between 45-60lbs.... if not even more, for certain species of beast) within the wombs of the human host-mothers. Often it struck researchers into the matter that the mingling of DNA between biological kingdoms set off something of a radical ‘throwback effect’ where the resultant offspring could be considered more akin to the (previously) extinct megafauna of Earth’s distant history rather than what nature produced today. These huge ‘throwback children’ could often hold great potential and unique options over their more-typical normal peers. Though the coop Ellie now approached hosted pens filled with several dozen normal hens, which catered to more 'mundane' egg production and sale, what made her family's farm stand out from the crowd and took up the majority of its living space were the one- dozen 'Mega-Hens' that it housed - Each one of which stood as tall as, and - if not for their shorter bodies and hollow bones - would weigh comparatively with a typical horse stallion, not-unlike Buzz. These hens regularly produced eggs of size and quality that put that of ostrich eggs to shame, and - so long as they were unfertilized - Ellie saw no particular qualms selling them to anyone about the community for the purposes of consumption. Ellie's own family had once hosted a huge free omelette/scrambled-egg breakfast bake-off for their community and neighbors, just to spread goodwill and word-of-mouth. Ellie herself was not the mother of any of these particular hens but they technically could be counted as her siblings; They having been laid by her own mother. The read had proven a very warm, fuzzy, feel-good experience for Ellie, and she hoped that, if she and her family ever paid a visit out to the coast, that perhaps she could make a point to meet both that woman and her daughter face-to-face.
