Nevertheless, each clucked softly to her in greeting, trotting their way up to the edges of their pens to give their greetings to Ellie, and receive their appreciated stroked and petting along their thick downy necks in return. Ellie gave each of her hen siblings a once over - doing a basic check to see if any showed any obvious signs of sickness or distress - and, seeing that all looked fine and hale, turned her attention to the smaller, normal hens, and the - ironically - larger and more time-consuming chore that they represented for her, what with most of them skirting about in their pens and being harder to corner and examine. Fortunately, none show any particular signs of distress, and, Ellie, quite pleased, turns her attention to sweeping the pens out of stray feathers and bird droppings - a task fortunately only very briefly delayed only once by another very minor retch of morning sickness - and easily tended to by waltzing over to a small waste bin she had presciently-placed over by the edge of the pen to sick just a few coughings of bile into - before following up with a good washing of the pens with the installed wall-tap and extra-long-length of rollable garden hose over by the coop's interior wall, before following things up with a spritzing of vinegar for disinfection, and giving things a fresh covering of herbs and sawdust bedding.

Now that the threat of tracking about or slipping in chicken manure was - thankfully - a non-issue, Ellie dusted her hands and set about the chore of gathering up all the eggs laid today. Now the shoe swaps to the other foot, a bit, on the front of challenge presented by each grouping of hens, for, while the collection of the eggs of the basic hens is a relatively simple (if repetitious) affair, easy enough to handle with a simple stack of egg-washing trays, each of the eggs laid by her mega-hen sisters (of which there were 9, today) were enormous, 4-dozen pound affairs. Of course, this was hardly her first rodeo, and Ellie had a tool specifically prepped for the chore in advance - A wide-topped wheelbarrow that had had its interior thoroughly padded to cradle each egg, and safeguard and carry it without too much rocking and rolling over to a prepping area back outside of the coop, whereupon they and the gathered regular-sized eggs were all given a thorough wash-down with the hose and moved into a refrigerated unit around the back of the coop for safe storage.

Now it was onto the favorite part of Ellie's daily task, both for herself and for the hens themselves, and that was feeding time. "Come help yourselves, ladies!", chirped Ellie, smiling widely as she filled up the hens' troughs with a nice, healthy mixing of oatmeal, sunflower, and sesame seeds, before topping the whole shebang with several helping scoopfuls of squirming mealworms that were kept in a large bin off to the coop's side. The hens - both normal and mega - all clucked delightedly as the feast was laid out before them, and as always, Ellie found herself clucking and whistling right along with them as she warmly watched them happily feed.

Of course, given that her Mom would always need some capable humanoid descendants to hand the running of the farm's operations over to, in time, it was actually quite a blessing that she got some human kids from all of her fun with the animals from time to time... Ellie herself wondered just which of the animals about here might wind up being drawn as the father of her *own* human children someday. Would it be Buzz, or one of the other beasts? Of course, she wasn't at all *against* the idea of taking actual *human* lovers, to fulfill the role, but, with her close bond to Buzz, there was the risk the stallion might well get just a bit jealous if she went out looking for a human boyfriend. Still, even if stallions had them beat in the goods downstairs, there were still very nice things and roles that only human men might possibly offer her...

...Mmm... Wait... What had she been thinking about again? Oh. Right. Calling upon her sisters for help. Anyway. Ellie's mother - always responsible - had made a point of discouraging her human daughters away from actual *sex* - either with human or beast partners - until they were of age at 18. but, that said, she still allowed her daughters the joy of experiencing pregnancy through the science of artificial insemination, and made sure that they knew it was an option for them to take pretty much right after each of the girls showed their very first periods. Though she might technically ask any of her three human siblings for assistance, she had a particular eye towards asking the twins, Faith and Hope, if they might be willing to tackle the challenge of assisting with the numbers of the Mega-Hens... Though the odd genetic quirkings of host-carrying eggs could often prove somewhat physically challenging to the host mother, the highly-accelerated speed of only two weeks of time or so mean that the girls would not be inconvenienced from school or homework for very long. Moreover, Ellie knew that Hope and Faith *also* happened to know several schoolmates who were enraptured by the notion of what their family did, and oft-wished that they could experience such pregnancies too. This would be a perfect intro-challenge for the set of them.
1451323111.title: ...Onwards to Part 2 of this option...

14513231111.content:
Ellie reaches in the back of her pocket for her phone. She first dials her second oldest sister.

"Hey sis," the 14 year old said. Unknown to Ellie, Rebekah was stroking her small bump.

"Hey Becca, I was wondering if you wanted to help with the numbers of the farm." Ellie says.

"Sure, whatever." Rebekah pulls her shirt up and places a hand on her stomach. "I'll be there." She hangs up and Ellie stares at the phone in disbelief.

The nerve of that girl! Ellie shakes her head then calls her twin sisters. Faith is the one who answers.

"Hi big Momma!" Ellie could hear Hope's voice in the background.

"You heard huh?" Ellie says.

"Kind of hard not to. All of the other farmers have said you looked like you were growing a little one or two."

"Actually, try a little three."

A pause. "Seriously? That explains why Becca decided to knock herself up with three calfs."

That's why she was so aloof. "Well, I guess she's helping out at the farm. That reminds me, how would you and Hope like if you became mommies? I need them for baby chicks."

"Uh...we'll think about it." A click. Faith hanged up!

"Well, back to work." Ellie sighs. She could go back to Buzz and Scout, her loins were aching for Buzz and Scout probably wanted to see how his siblings were doing.
14513231111.title: Ellie takes out her cell-phone and calls her si...

On to tend to and shear the farm's sheep...
145132311112.content:
Ellie most certainly *did* wish to spend more time with her strong and virile stallion-beau and the sweet and adorable young colt that they had jointly made together... But, then again, it was exactly thinking about the two most important men in her life like that wound up bolstering Ellie's work ethic. All of the animals on the farm - including Buzz and Scout - all owed their ability to enjoy their pleasant and comfortable lives here each day due to the work that she put into the place, everyday, and that her mom had put in before her... She couldn't let them all down by letting herself get fickle and careless just because her hormones were running a bit amok, at the moment. Of course, she couldn't (and didn't want to) deny that it just felt damn *good* to satisfy the urges of those hormones of hers, so she'd just have to make a point of pulling Buzz aside later and ‘playing’ every bit as hard as she had worked once the chores were all finally put out of the way...

Ellie intended to take care of the hay, next - It was always nice to have fresh reserves of it at the side and ready before tending to the all of the farm's grazers, and having the fresh-cut scent of it lingering about should help stifle her morning sickness at least just a bit... Perhaps not entirely but it should still certainly help... Ah. Right. Speaking of which, now that she had put the work with the chicken coop behind her, this was an excellent point to take just a few and get a bit re-hydrated, to help compensate for the fluids she had been sicking-up now and again since she had woken. Ellie leaned back against the post of one of the fences and took a long, refreshing draw off her Nalgene bottle. She idly rubbed a palm over the swell of her foal-filling belly as she let the tart-and-tingling flavors of mingled ginger and raspberry play over her taste buds.

As chance would have it, it was then that Ellie noticed her equine son, Scout, round the corner of the stables and she smiled tenderly as she saw that he was evidently coming to see her. “Hey there, Baby”, she cooed to him; Reaching out to hug him neck and give soft the soft hair of mane a playful ruffle, in greeting. Scout reciprocated by leaning into his mother’s embrace eagerly, and planting a lick of affection on her neck. “You come to check up on your mama and your baby brothers and/or sisters, Love Bug?” Scout nodded and whickered in the affirmative, but then made an addendum with a tapping of his hoof, as well as a tilting of his head alongside of a flicking of his tail. Though Ellie already technically knew just how smart her son was, it nevertheless always made her hear tingle in awe to see him put it on display. Though her son might appear to be a full-blooded horse to outside observers, his half-human heritage meant that he was smarter than common horses by orders of magnitude. Though Ellie would never in a million years dream of saying that his father, Buzz, was ‘stupid’, Buzz, nevertheless, was a typical horse at the end of the day, and he though, acted, and reacted more like an instinctual animal than anything like a human. He owed his own degree of ‘smarts’ and his ability to follow Ellie’s more complex desires due to a constant interaction with humans since his birth, as well as an exceptionally close familiarity to his mistress’s moods and wants at that. In contrast, Ellie would unreservedly say that her son was easily and objectively as smart as any human of his own age bracket. While his father could do the ‘old horse trick’ of keeping track of some basic counting, Scout could keep track of much bigger numbers and more advanced arithmetic, as well as showing indications that he could comprehend and follow human-oriented conversation topics whenever his mom, grandmother, and aunties were speaking around him. It was really only his lack of human vocal cords that kept him from more-actively participating in said conversations, and, even then, as he grew, Scout had been steadily developing a clever series of gestures and intimation which he could use to get his meaning across to others… Such as right now, as he indicated to his mother with his motions that he wanted to assist her in the chore of gathering the hay with her, by way of gesturing to the small horse-drawn hay reaper and buckrake, each set just under a small, protective lean-to nearby. “Well now. Aren’t you just the bestest and sweetest little boy that any mother could ever ask for?”, Ellie marveled with a grin. “...But ...Isn’t it a chore it’d be more appropriate for your father to help with. You’re growing up like a weed, but you’re not all the way there, just yet, after all.” Scout snorted and gestured his head and tail in another direction past the farm’s corral towards the fields, and - now that she was straining her ears and paying attention - Ellie could now make out the noises of mares whinnying out in heat… as well a a meaty-slapping of horse flanks as someoneeagerly went about tending to the needs of said mares. Ellie rolled her eyes. Of course Buzz would go off to go screw the farm’s other mares. ...Knowing quite well how the flow of farm life just naturally went since she was a little girl, she wasn’t at all about to get jealous over him going off to have fun with the other girls. She had already been mulling over the fact that Buzz was, in spirit, just a simple horse, after all, and that he possessed inherent urges and desires of such, as well. Buzz detected mares in heat around the farm about himself, and it was only natural that, as a healthy stallion, he go satisfy himself with them, and fulfill his compunction to help make little horses about the place. No. it was more like... she simply felt *exasperated* than truly upset. Just the thought of other girls getting to enjoy the touch of 'her man'... Well... Reflecting on her own thoughts, maybe she was ever-so-slightly jealous, but, then again, she *still* couldn't rationally blame anyone but herself for feeling that way, as she was the only party in this cuckolding triangle that could actually be expected to exercise anything like self-control. ...Well, perhaps she was feeling slightly jealous of the other mares, after all, at that. She sighed. Screw it. She might not be Buzz's only girl, but - nevertheless - she could still make sure that Buzz knew that she was his best by arranging some intense private time with him later tonight, after-hours. Work hard. Play hard, after all.

"Heh... At least I can count on *you* to be responsible, Scout. You might have gotten your good looks from your dad, but you got your brains and common sense from *my* side of the family. ...Alright. Sit tight for a moment. Mommy needs just a minute to get some fresh fluids for the little ones in her, but then we'll work on that hay together, K?", she tells her foal, scratching him behind the ears as she did so. Scout nodded happily and leans his face up against the slight swell of his mother's pregnant belly to cuddle up to his gestating siblings in affection. Ellie smiled and patted the head of her first-born tenderly as her thoughts dwelled on her yet-to-be-born deep within her. Even if his dad could be a slight bit of a flake, she knew she could and would never, ever regret choosing Buzz to love, for the sake of getting the blessing of both this beautiful little boy and whatever other wonderful little children she would bear for him. It also helped that though still not 'mature' for a horse, Scout was already quite large - already bearing about 80% of his father's mass - and should likely be able to help her work the reaper with little struggle. As he grew, Scout would also come to enjoy a great degree of hybrid-born strength and vitality over the proficient amount that standard horses already enjoyed, and even though he would grow up quite a bit faster than a human child would, that vitality of his would give him a longer lifespan and greater degree of vivacity over the course of his adult life... Like getting something of a fast-forwarded start on life, but making up for it with extra time provided later. After a few minutes time, Ellie had drained the lion's share of the contents of her Nalgene bottle and, setting aside about a quarter of it for later, she and Scout ambled over to the reaper and Ellie hooked her son into its harness securely before sitting her pregnant body down in the set of the device. "Right. Let's do it to it, Scout!", she merrily chirped, giving her son an encouraging pat on his flank. Scout, only too pleased to be of use, gave a happy nicker and clopping of his hooves before starting forwards and, with only a scant modicum of effort, pulling both him mom and the hay-reaper right along with him. Patches of hay began to topple over in fluffy masses behind them as the the mother-and-son farmers made their way through the pasture in strips of activity. Once that was done, the two repeated the process with the buckrake, and gathered up the fresh-cut hay into bales. That all finally accomplished the now enormously-proud and thankful Ellie made sure that Scout was set up with some delicious fruit in his feed for a treat and turned on the wall-mounted TV in his personal stable stall to some entertaining PBS (Scout being the only horse on the farm who actually held any ability to appreciate watching TV programming, at that).

Rose looked at the data as well as the video showing that they were safely transported where Jax, who was in the lab and Taz was in the garage as they successfully changed places.

"Nothing wrong with them I hope?" Rose asked her father. Her father patted her back for reassuarnce.

14522.content:
"Have a nice day!" Charlotte said to her last customer. Charlotte's bookstore was a hit with all the 6 old people in town who still read books instead of fancy new-fangled phoneymessages or texty mail. Despite being the exact age to be into all that, Charlotte wasn't into all that. All she needed to be happy was a good book.

Well, that and her spells.

It all started when she was at the old bookstore she ended up replacing. The age of their books trumped even hers. She used to joke with the owner, a lovely old woman, that she got the books from the old Library of Alexandria herself. Despite being a "haha you're old" joke, they both shared a nice laugh over it. On the last-day sale of the store about three days ago, Charlotte practically bought out her whole store. The most enticing book in her newfound collection, and the one she opened the moment she got home, was a particularly uniquely titled handbook named "Slews of Brews, and Some Swell Spells: A Treatise on the Arcane".

She set out immediately on testing each of these so called "spells". She was surprised to see them work. She cast a spell that made her lamp levitate above its stand. She brewed a potion that dyed her hair solid purple for a week. She got through the entire first chapter of cantrips and minor potions in one night. Then came the second chapter.

It was today that she moved on to the second chapter. The real deal. The spells that actually did things. Most of these spells, much to her dismay, were really hard to perform and required exotic materials with names in such obscure languages, even she couldn't get an idea of they said. There was, however, one spell that required ingredients she actually had:

"Bountiful Body?" Charlotte read aloud, confused at such a vague name. "What does that mean?" Charlotte asked, looking down at her... less-than-average sized body. Well, not just less than average. Charlotte was a twig. She had no padding at all, especially not in her feminine areas. If it weren't for her long, forearm length hair and sort of female looking facial features, she would be easily confused for a petite boy. Because of her "shortcomings", having a bountiful body piqued her interest. She had assumed that meant an increase in chest size. While she wasn't interested in appearance and all that, the idea of actually being called beautiful or even sexy sounded appealing.

"This is gonna be easy," Charlotte said, smirking. "Just a few chants, and I get to have a bigger bust? Sounds like a win to me! Here we go! Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet!"

A blinding light came from the center of her body, and...

145221.content:
The light faded as fast as it had appeared. Before it even had though, Charlotte knew something was different. Once she could see, she saw how right had been. A pair of breasts far beyond what she had possessed before pulled her shirt taut. A veritable canyon of cleavage was visible through the over strained collar. She was even more impressed when she saw that the spell had affected her hips and rump as much, pushing her pants past to their breaking point.

The young woman jumped for joy. Her new expanded assets shook and quivered from the sudden motion. Charlotte loved how that felt.

She was exploring her new body and giving slight thought to how she was going to cover up for the trip back home, when a curious sensation came over her. An odd bubbling and stretching feeling filled her middle, centered on her stomach it seemed. She furrowed her brow as she reached around her bust since she couldn’t see past it any longer. She gasped and jumped as her fingers brushed bare skin far soon than they should have.

She spun on her heel and dashed for the backroom, and the bathroom off of it. Flicking the light on, she jumped again, sending her curvaceous frame wiggling again. The cracked mirror over the sink wasn’t perfect, but it showed enough. She saw her gaping mouth, shock paling the usually chocolaty skin across her face. She saw her expanded bust straining against the tight confines of her shirt. And she saw her stomach peeking out from under the shirt.

Some small portion of her mind supposed that with her breasts taking up so much room in her shirt, it would only be obvious that the lower hem would end up raised. That didn’t account for all she saw though. Instead of the usual washboard flat stomach she should have been seeing, there was a rounded dome pressing out from her body. She felt light headed as she realized with a jolt that she could even see the dome expanding further and further.

Charlotte groaned as she could hear her shirt creaking and groaning as more and more stress added to the unfortunate garment. Beads of sweat started to break out across her face as she realized that her skin was starting to creak and groan as well. The surface of her belly was turning shiny before long. She thought for sure that she was going to pop or explode or any number of things as the tightness continued to build. Just when she thought she couldn’t any more, the growth stopped.

The experience left her panting for breath, though a slight moan built in the back of her throat. She could now see the mountain of her stomach rising beyond the closer hills of her breasts. Her hand trembled as reached for it. It was really there, her first tentative touches confirmed. The next touches went on a bit longer and she found that the surface was smooth to the touch. It felt almost like a balloon filled with air. She felt like a balloon that was for sure, but it wasn’t air filling it, that much she was sure of as well. The weight of the bloated ball that was her stomach was pulling on her back already.

It has to be that spell she thought. The whole “Bountiful Body” thing must not have meant what I thought it did.

She was reaching for the door to pull it open again, when another sudden feeling hit her middle. Her stomach became a cold knot as she thought she must be expanding again. But a quick glance in the mirror again showed that to not be the case. She scratched her head as she puzzled over the oddity. Then it happened again. This time, she was looking at her reflection, so she saw a lump of her stomach stretch further than the rest. It retreated as soon as it appeared. Several more followed in quick succession, each in a different spot. The icy chill in her stomach only deepened as the implications hit her though.

“I’m pregnant!?” she screamed as she fought to remain on her feet.

Some part of her sometimes fantasized about her body swelling up with life. But not yet, and certainly not like this either. She nibbled on her lip as she stared at the mirror. Charlotte did have to admit that the big belly did look good on her. A violent shake of her head cleared that thought away.

No, this is absurd. I have to fix this, there has to be something in the book about removing the pregnancy at least.

info.brief_description: Girls get pregnant young. Bellies and babies all around.
info.description:
Now offering gift points for quality submissions. Message Belle if you are interested.

Rules

Keep the ages of the characters between 10 and 19 as they are supposed to be young mothers.
No mpreg. Sorry folks.
No sex for characters under the age of 18.
Let's not kill people please.
Unless it is a choice chapter please give t least a few sentences.
Proper grammar and punctuation, or at least an attempt at it, is required. I reserve the right to delete or edit chapters to make them more easily readable.
Rapid pregnancy is allowed but let's keep things sensible. (No getting pregnant with hundred of babies at nine months in five seconds...)
Let's also keep the baby number in general sensible. Dozens of 20 pound children or whatever? No please. Not naturally anyway.
Other things may be in the womb like eggs and such but it must be in relation to pregnancy and not in the stomach.
Please no describing an under 18's breasts in a sexual way. If you want to say that they have grown them or are producing milk now that's fine but please no lengthy or detailed descriptions.
Unbirth is allowed but only over 18.
Birth is allowed but please do not be detailed about child emergence under 18.
You may reserve one of the routes on a chapter that you have added by adding a (R) to the end of the choice (I will remove this when you have added the chapter.). The reservation is valid for one month. It will be removed if not added to by that time.
